gyis chos thams cad la bslab par bya zhing/ des sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// tshul khrims srung kha na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims
bsrung bar bya'o// bzod pa sgrub pa na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgrub par bya'o// brtson 'grus rtsom pa na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kharnam par
bya'o/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o// shes rab sgom pa na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes
rab bsgom par bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na ma dmigs par 'gyur/ ji tsam gyis na dmigs par
'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ji tsam du gnyis yod pa de tsam du dmigs pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni mi dmigs pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis shes bgyi ba gang lags/
0 bka' stsal pa/ mig dang gzugs kyikhar dar/ yid dang chos kyi bar dang/ byang nub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du ste/ rab 'byor de ni gnyis so// gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis su
ma mchis pa gang lags/ bka' stsal pa// mig dang gzugs kyi bar du med pa dang/ yid dang chos rnams kyi lar ru med pa dang/ byang nub dang sangs rgyas kyi bar du med pa ste/ rab 'byor/
de zhiganyis su med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci dmigs su ma mchis pa mi dmigs pa lags sam/ 'onatadamigs su mchis pa ma dmigs lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab
'byor dmigs su yod pas mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ dmigs su med pas mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin mod kyi/ rab 'byor 'on kyang dmigs su yod pa dang/ dmigs su med pa mnyam pa
nyid ni dmigasasu med pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dmigs pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// de ltar slob pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa mdapar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te khyung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dmigs pa la mi chags shing/ mi dmigs pa la'ang mi chags pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
rab kyiyarol tuphyin pa la spyod pas/ ji ltaras nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas kyang/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
nyid thob par bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dang na soms dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dmigs pa la gnas shing sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs
par mi byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dmigs pa la gnas nas sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs ra ra byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa dang dmigs su med la/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med cing/ gshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'ang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sa
'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pos/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa'ang dmigs
su ma mchis/ byang chub kyang dmigs su ma mchis/ gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa de'ang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/ 'o na byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi la
rol tu phyin pa la spyod ra sa/ ngo bo nyid dang bral pa'i chos thams cad la 'di ni gzugs so// 'di ni tshor ba'o// 'di ni 'du shes so// 'di ni 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o// 'di/
ni byang chub kyi khar ro zhes ji ltar 'bangs rnam par dbye bar bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi thol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bams dpa' chen po ni ji ltar
byas pas gzugs dmigs pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs pa dang/ byang chub kyi bar dudamigs par 'gyur ba de ltachos rnams la rab turnam par 'byed par mi byed do// gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub
kyi bar du'ang mi dmigs lags n/ 'o na ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa 'jug par 'gyur/ byang chub so mas
pa'i skyon ma mchis par zhugs nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyis nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su
smin par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyis nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su
thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur lags/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyuralags/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas kyang sems
[F ]@#// can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bgyid par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs kyi ched du
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// byang chub kyi bar gyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi ched du'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par
mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma byas pa/ chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa sgyu/ shes rab kyi la rol tuphyin pa de'ang ma byas pa dang/ 'gyur la
med pa yin la/ byang nub kyang ma phyagatsang dang/ rnagyur pa med pa yin zhing/ byang chub sems dpar yang ma byas pa dang/ 'gyur ba med pa yin pa 'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar khyung chub sems
dma' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas pa dang/ 'gyur pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ma
nga gyis pa dang/ 'gyur pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi thog pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'di dag rnam
par dgod par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ma byas pa dang/ 'gyur ba med pa'i chos rnams la ni rnam par dgod pa gang yang dmigs su med do// mngon par 'dus byas pa dang/
mngon par bsags pa'i chos rnams la ni rnam par dgod pa dmigs su yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni phung po lnga la mngon par zhen te/ gardzu
kyi phung po la mngon par zhen par byed/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar la mngon par zhen par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bar la mngon par zhen par byed/ gzugs la rlom
sems urtsed/ gzugs la dmigs par byed/ byang chub kyi bar la rlom sems su byed/ byang chub kyi bar du dmigs par byed pa'i phyir te/ de'adi snyam du bdag ni byang chub mngon par/
rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur ro// bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thor par bya'o snyam du sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs dang/ byang
nub kyi bar gang yin pa dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa: na lngas kyang ma dmigs na/ skyes bu blun pos ngas rgyas la skur pa 'debs pa de dag ni/ sams can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su/
thar par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshodang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dus
gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan lngas kyang sems can gang dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bgyi ba dag ma
dmigs lags n/ 'o na da bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ji ltar sems can rnams yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang//
log pa nyid du nges pa dang/ ma nges pa'i phung po gsum du lung bstan pa mdzad lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ras 'byor ngas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
sangs rgyas nas/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa nam/ log pa nyid du nges pa 'am/ ma nges pa'i sams can 'ga' yang ma dmigs mod kyi/ rab 'byor 'on kyang sems can rdzas med pa la
rdzas su 'du shes pa 'di dag ngas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yang dag pa ma yin pa la 'dzan pa de las bzlogagi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pasadon
dam pa la bzhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa// 'o na rdzu
'phrul gyi rnam grangs la bzhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/ bka' stsalal/ de ni ma yin no// gsol ba/ bcom
ldan 'das gal te don dam la bzhugs te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam grangs la bzhugs te/
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'adas 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa 'am/ gcig tum 'gyur lags krang/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa khyang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi/ de ni 'dus byas kyi khams sam/
'dus ma byas kyi khams gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams gang
la'ang mi gnas mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de 'gro ba dang/ 'ong ba dang/ sdod pa dang/ 'dug pa'ang yod la/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang//
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tuphyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs taganas pa dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ dran

pa nye bar gzhug pa bzhi dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la sgom pa dang/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ mtshanam chod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ smonapa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nang stong pa nyid dang/
rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsu dang/ mi 'jigs pa
bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ snying rje chen po la sgom zhing chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar gyur la/ sprul pa des kyang sems can dpag tu med pa dag sprul nas phung po gsum du lung
( bstan par gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sngal pa des sems can 'ga' yang phung po gsum du lung bstan pa mor snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni lags so//
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu r mkhyen to/ sbrul pa lta bu r mkhyen nas sems can gang yang btul ba med do// rab 'byor
[/]de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang sprul pa la bye brag ni ci mchis/ tha dad du bgyi ba so mchis/ dgongs pa ni gang lags/
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i la
pa de bye brag ci'ang mad de/ tha dad du bya ba ci'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni bye brag med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrin las gang mdzad pa de ni sprul pa'ang byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sug
las bgyid lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzhugs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sug las ji ltar bgyid
lags/ bka' stsal pa// dga' byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zhi bas byang chub sems pa'am dmigs nas/ sprul pa sprul nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//
sprul pa des kyang phyi na bskal pa las lhag par sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/ des phyis byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes
skye bo rnams kyis kun tushes kyang/ la pa la ni skya pa'ang med/ yongs su myang n las 'das pa'ang med de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta ste/
chos thams cad sngal pa lta bu r mos par bya zhing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te sprul pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ma/
klu mchis na/ sbyin pa yongs su sbyor bar yang ji ltar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das sams can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba de dag ni/ phung po'i lhag ma mchis pa'i skya
ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi bar du nam yang bos par mi 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis sprul pa la yon
yul ba de dag kyang phung po'i lhag ma mchis pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyi bar du nam yang bas par mi 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos nyid gang gis de bzhinagashegs pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jigs rten sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i chos nyid de nyid kyi sprul pa'ang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/
gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no// rab 'a byor de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul pa lta'ang zhog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la yon phul ba lta'ang zhog gi/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu
'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byams pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed na/ de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma phyin par sdu bsngal gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur
ro// rab 'byor byams pa dang ldan pas yid la byed pa ltarang zhog gi/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gas de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byas shing nam mkha' la me tog snyim
pas 'thor na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma phyin par sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin pa 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byams pa dang ldan pas yid la byed pa lta'ang zhog/ nam mkha'
lame tog snyim pas 'byor ba la'ang zhog gi/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal bar byed na/ de dag thams cad kyang rim gyis sdug bsngal
gyi mthar phyin par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba ni de ltar mthu che ba dang/ de ltar phan yon rmi ba yin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos rnams
kyi chos nyid tshad mar byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bye brag cung zad kyang med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'ache/
0 @#// pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// chos rnams kyi chos nyid la bzhugs nas chos nyid de'ang rnam par dkrug par mi bya// 'di ni shes rab kyi
ro'abuphyin pa'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid do zhes rnam par dkrug par mi bya'o// chos thams cad kyi bar dag la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/
gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrug par mi bgyi ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ni gzugs so// 'di
ni rnam par shes pa'i bar ro zhes bgyi ba dang/ de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams kyang bka' stsal/ de bzhin du dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ khrag pa ma mchis
pa dang/ 'jig rtenapa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ thunamod dang/ thun mong ma lags pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang bka' stsal te rnam par
dkug par mdzad na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs par ma gyur lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ ngas ni ji ltar gzhan dag
gis khong du chud par 'gyur zhes ming dang mtshanams chos rnams kyi chos nyid bstanate/ chos rnams brjod par zad kyi/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid rnam par dkrugs pa ni ma yin no// gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das gal te gzhan dag gis khong du chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ming dang mtshanams chos rnams kyi chos nyid bstan chos rnams brjod pa mdzad na/ bcom ldan
'das ming ma ma mchis pa dang/ mtshan ma mchis pa'i chos rnams ji ltar ming dang mtshan mas rjod pa mdzad lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor brjod pa ni ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa ma

yin gyi/ rab 'byor gzhan du na sdug bsngal nyid brjod par zad de/ ming dang mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ni ming dang mtshan
ma la mngon par zhen pa med do// rab 'byor gal te ming la ming mngon par zhen par 'gyur ram/ mtshan ma la mtshan ma mngon par zhen par 'gyur na ni/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
pasnga 'gyural/ mtshanam med pa'ang mtshan ma med pa la mngon par zhen par 'gyur/ smon pa med pa'ang smon pa med pa la mngonapar zhen par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la mngon par
zhin par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha'o yang yang dag pa'i mtharnal mngon pa razhon par nagyur/ chos kyi dbyings kyapachos kyi dbyings la mngon b.razhenapar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas
kyang 'dus mkhyes la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ming tsam du 'od pas/ de dag ming tsam la gnas par ma 'gyur te/ rab 'byor ba la
sems dpa' sems dar 'a chen pos de ltar ming dang mtshan ma tsam la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya zhing/ de la'ang mngon par zhen par mi
bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas pa lags na/ 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi ched du byang chub tu sems/
skyod par bgyid cing/ byang nub pusems bskyodanas kyang 'du byed sna tshogs rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sbyin pa sol ba dang/ tshul
khrims srung ba dang/ brjod la sgrub pa dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ shes rab sgom pa dang/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang/ bsam gtan
dang/ tshad ma mchis pa dang/ gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas pa dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba rnams la/
gnas pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang/ smonapa ma mchis pa la gnas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa dang/ snying
chen po'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod gang 'di skad dugal te chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas na//
'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyid ces zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dus byas 'di dag thams cad ming dang mtshan ma
tsam du zad la/ ming dang mtshanam de dag kyang ming dang mtshan ma stong sku/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed la ) chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas kyang bsams can rnams theg pa gsum po dag/
gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed kyang/ ming dang mtshan ma de dag skye ba'ang med ) 'jig pa'ang mod/ gnas pa 'ang med/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba'ang med cing mi dmigs
so// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces gsung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces nga sla'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad shes pa nyid kyang bka' stsal cing/ de bzhin gshegs
pas lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mdor yang bka' stsal la/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bka' stsal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
gsum po 'di dag la bye brag ni ci mchis/ tha dad du bgyi ba ci mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni kun/
thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi'o// rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi'i// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyi lags/ ci'i slad du lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lags/ ci'i slad du thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
tsho rnams kyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor phyi nang chos gang dag ji snyad pa de dag thams cad ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang shes la/ lam thams cad
lha dang/ rnam pa thams cad nim yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyi lags shes zer pa ni/ ram 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni lamathams cad bskyed par bya zhing/ lam thams cad shes par bya dgos te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang
yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin pa'i lam de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya dgos la/ lam de dag gis lam kyi bya ba byed kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par ni mi spyod do//
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par mi bgyi zhing/ des yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi
bgyid lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po des/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas shing/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par
ma byas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam la gnas te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum
du bgyi lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam lags pa la gnas de lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ den pa yin no// gsol pa//
bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam dang lam ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'adas 'o na lam yang ma lags/ lam
ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa la gnas te lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nim yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos/ yang dag pa'i mthar mngon sum du bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor 'di yisnyam du sems/ khyod lam la gnas tshe/ len pa med par zag
bsnyams pa ams rnam par grol snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'o na lam ma yin pa la gnas su nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol
pa/ de men lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'o na lam dang lam ma yin pa la gnas he 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa// 'o na khyod lam yang ma
yin/ lam ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa la gnas te/ len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam ra ra grol lam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags ) bcom ldan nas
bdag ni gang caganas de yang zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems ni ji ltar gang la'ang mi gnas pas sems rnam ra grol lags so// bcom
ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang ci'ang mi gnas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya'o// rab 'byor gang yang rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni rnam pa gcig gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ 'di ltarazhi ba'i rnam pas so// rab 'byor yang rnam pa gang dag
dang ! rtags gang dag dang/ mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams stong zhes bya bar rjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag dang/ mtshan ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud
pas/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid dang/ lam skyinam la shis pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

gang lags pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum po 'di dag las/ 'di'i lo nga ba ni lhag ma dang bcas pa'o// 'di'i sbyor ba ni lcag ma ma mchis pa'o zhes bgyi bar nyon mongs pa sbyang ba la tha dad du bgyi
ba mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyon mongs pa spang kha la ni tha dad pa med mod kyi// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khagachags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa yin no/ nyan thos/
dang rang sangs rgyas ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad smras pa ma yin no// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyon mongs pa spangs pa na dus ma byas
bgyis lags sam/ bka' sal po/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bkyis labya brag dmigs su mchis lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'//
stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ 'dus ma byas la ni bye brag dmigs su ad do/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la khye brag dmigs su amachis na/ ci'i skad
gdu bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces 'di ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa yin no// 'di ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa ma yin no zhes bka' stsal pa
lags/ bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa ma yin te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag la 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dag dang khral
ba'ang yod mod kyi/ lus kyi 'gyur ba'ang 'byung ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur la/ nyan thos rnams la'ang ma yin te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
ma mnga' 'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te lam ang dngos po ma mchis la/ mya ngan las 'das
pa'ang dngos po ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// 'di na dgro macom pa'o// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas so zhes bshad/
sgyu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar gang yin pa de/
dag thams cad ni 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba yin no// gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dus ma ba kyis de 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar dag la gas so zhes rab tu 'byed par bgyid lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni rab tu'agyod par mi byed mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jig rten/
gyi tha snyad tshad mar byas te brjod par zad kyi/ don dam par ni rab tu dbye bar ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar 'di la tshig gi lam kyis gdags su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das phye ma'imag+ha' ji ltar gdags lags/ bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi tha snyad tshad mar byas taM/ gang dang gang dag gis mtha' chad pa de dang de dag la phyi ma'i mthar gdags kyi
don dam par ni ma yin no// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la/ sngon gyi mthar yang ma dmigs na/ phyi ma'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'chol/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la sngon kyi mtha' yang mi dmigs na/ phyi ma'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci dgos

te/ de ni gnas med do// rab 'byor 'on kyang sems nad gang dag gis chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par ma shes pa de dag la 'di'i sngon gyi mtha' 'o// 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' 'o zhes bstan pa

bad kyi/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med de/ 'ba' byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar rang gi mtshan//
[ve]// nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la spyod pa ni nang ngam/ phyi'am/ 'dus byas
sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ gang la'ang mngon par zhen par mi 'gyur ro// deskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
bcom ldan 'dun la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das
ci'i slad du shes rab kyis rol tuphyin pa zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rol dam pa ste/ de'i phyib shes rab kyi yarol tu phyin pa/
zhes khya'o// rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thamasacad dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasathams cad chosakhams cad kyi pha rol tuson pas na/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor yang don dam par chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i

don gang yin pa de/ shes kha kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas te// de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor yang shes ba
kyi pha rol tuphyin pa 'di'i de bzhin nyid kyang rgud/ mang dag pa'i mtha' yang nud/ chos kyi dbyis kyang rgyud pas/ de phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang dang yang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang yin/ bstan du yodapa 'am/ bstanadu med pa'am/ thogs pa dang bcas pa 'am/ thogs pa med pa'ang ma yin no//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dini gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa// thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa ni phyir ro// rab
'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad la spyod par byed cing/ spobs pa thams cad dang/ snang ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa ste// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyilha rnams dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis mi chod de/shes/

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhan mu stegs can phyir rgol ba'i bar dag gis kyang rnyed par mi nus so// deci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar spyod par byed pa gang yin pa dang/ gang gi sbyad pa dang/
sbyad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
rab 'a byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/
'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i don la sbyadapar bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi don la spyad par bya'o// bdag med pa'i don la spyad par bya'o// sdug bsngal shes pa'i don dang/ kun 'byung ba shes pa'i don dang/
'gog pa shes pa'i don dang/ lam shes pa'i don dang/ zad ra shes pa'i don dang/ mi skyo bshes pa'i don la sbyad par bya'o// chosapags pa'i don dang : rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i don dang/
kun rdzob shes pa'i don dang/ yongs su'adris ma shes pa'i don dang/ sgra ji bzhin pa shes pa'i don dang/ yang dag pa ji bzhin shes pa'i rten la spyad par bya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpan
sems dang 'a chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i don la/ don dang tshul gyis spyad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes thab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ar zab mo 'di la/ don dang don ma lags pa dmigs su ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dang 'a sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i don la spyod pas 'di ltar spyad par bya ste/ 'dod chags bdag gi don ce'am/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o// zhe sdang bdag gi don co'am/ bdag
la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyod par mi bya'o// gti mug bdag gi don co nam/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad pa mi bya'o// 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug bdag gi don nye 'am/ bdag
la gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o// log par lta ba bdag gi don ci tsa ma/ bdag la gnod pa zhes bya ba spyad pa ra mi bya'o// lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi bar du bdag gi donaci 'am/ bdag la

gnod pa zhes bya bar spyad par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang don kyang mi byed la/ gnod pa'ang mi byed pa dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i
de bzhin nyid kyang gang la'ang don kyang mi byed la/ gnod pa'ang mi byed pa'i phyir ro// gzugs bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o// gzugs bdag la gnod pa zhes spyod par mi bya'o// rnam par shes

pa'i bar du bdag gi don cis spyad par mi bya'o// rnam par shes pa bdag la gnod pa nyes spyad par mi bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o// byang chub bdag la
gnod pa zhes spyad par mi bya'o// de'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gang don dam gnod pa 'ga'
yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yod rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang/

chos gnas pa nyid dang/ tshes skyon med pa nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa 'di ni gang la'ang don dang gnod pa ci'ang mi byed de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar don dang gnod/
pa rnam par spangs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ra la spyad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to
bcom ldan 'das mi'i slad dushes rab kyi sngol tu phyin pa don kyang ma bgyid/ gnod pa'ang mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khaka' stsal ra/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin
pa ni 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang ma khyad pas/ rab 'byor de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la'ang don dang gnod pa mi byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma
bgyis sangs rgyasa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don ma lags sam/ bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos
'phags pa rnams kyi don yin mod kyi/ gang la'ang phan pa'am/ gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste// dper na nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang phan pa 'am/
gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang la'ang phan pa ma/ gnod par rtse bar gnas pa/
ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'dus ma [“]byas kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid thob pa mi 'gyur lags sam ! bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin te// de de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'dus ma byas kyi shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshiganyis su ma mchis
pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos thob lags sam/ bka'astsald// rnal 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na gnyis su mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis
pa'i chos thob lags sam/ bka' stsal pa// raga' byor de ni ma yin no// gsol ra// bcom ldan 'das 'on gnyis su mchibs pa'i ches kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos thob lags sam/ bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 2ba 'byor gang gi phyir gnyis kyi chog sa ma/ gnyis su med
nyid @#// pa'i ches kyang mi dmigasan/ de ltar dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ (shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyud stodapa
las/ chos gnyis kyi zhu ba mang po'i le'u zhes bya ste drug sku rtsa gsum pa'o////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa/
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tsherang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab lags so/
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'ang rkul la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag nisamasacanayang mi dmigs la/ sams
can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs pa dang/ sams can rnams kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyang chub la yang dag par zhugs pas dkar ba bgyid pa lags so// bcomalAn
'das 'di lta ste/ dpar brtsi na mi la la zhig gis nam mkha' rten ma mchis pa la yal ga gel ba bskyod par 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams
kyi ched du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
sems can rnams kyi ched du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug cing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rtogs nas kyang/ sams can thams cad chags pa las yongs su grol bar byed pa/
de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor dpar na mi zhig yal ga gel la bskyod par 'dod la/ mi des yul ga rgol ba de'i rtsa ba'ang mi shes[.]yal ga'i mdo dang/ la sa dang/ me tog kyang mi shes

bzhin du des yal gagal ba de ni sdong bu bskyed de/ bskyod nas kyang dus dus su srung zhing chus bran te/ rim gyis sdong bu de'i yal ga'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur/ lo ma'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur/
ma tog khyad phun sum tshogs par gyur/ 'bras bu'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur nas/ de sdod pu de ni lo ma rnams la spyod de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen po da

sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa de'ang rim gyis pha rel tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod cing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur te/
lo ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu lta bu r sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de la khyad chub sems dpa'i lo ma lta bu la brten nas sems can rnams ngan song gsum po dag
las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i me tog lta bu labarten nas/ sems can rnams rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu ]]
dpag dang/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba nas/ 'dus shes med 'du shes med min skye mchedakyi
bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ sems can de dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/
'god par byed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 3bras bu la 'god par byed do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed do// dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god par byed do// 'du byang chub la 'god par
byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang lo ma dang/ mi
tog dang/ 'bras bu lta bu r sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gang dag de la yon dbul ba de dag thams cad kyang thag pa gsum po 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi thag pa 'am/ rang sangs
rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ del
sams can yang mi dmigs shing/ sems can du gdags pa'ang med la/ sems can de dag kyang bdag tu 'dzan pa las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos/ gang dag gi ched du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i sems cananam/ sems can du gdags pa ci'ang 'di na mi dmigs so// zhes de ltar
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'a das byang chub sems dpa' stsams dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po la brten nas/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas lngams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun
chad par 'gyur/ mi khem pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ dbul po thams cad rgyun chadapar 'gyur/ dman pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad
rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin da/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ zla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs na/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da
ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tumangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing/ rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du
'byung bar mi 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i bar dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ soms can dmyal ba'i bar dag rgyun chad par mi
'gyur/ 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bar dag rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs panyid lags par [“]rig par bya'o zhes gang smras pa ni/rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs par gdugs pa'i de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa dang/ de bzhin/
nyidad nyid kyis 'phags pa thams cad gdags pa dang/ de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis gzugs su gdags pa dang/ de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i bar du gdags pa dang/ de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis
'dus byas kyi khams dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa dang/ de bzhin nyid de nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gdugs pa'i

phyir ro// rab 'khyor ci'i phyir de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin nyid 'di la gnas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur taM/ de bas na
de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na de bzhin nyid tshad ma byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor byung chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhimanyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la bslabs na/ soms can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par 'gyur zhing// dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba'ang shes par
'gyur ro// sems can rnams kyi las bdag gir bya ba shes na/son nas shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// smon nas shes pa yongs su rdzogs na/ dus gsum shes pa rnam par dag par byed par 'gyur
ro// dus gsum shes pa rnam par sbyangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing/ sems can rnams kyi don byed par 'gyuralo// sams can rnams kyi don byedan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob na/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
za 'gyur ro// chos kyi la khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu'agod par 'gyur ro// sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag la bkod nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i
mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur te rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dar 'a chen pos yon tan dang phan yon thams cad mthong bas/ bdag
kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed par bya zhing/ gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o// des
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa la 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du pa cas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhinate/ ji skad smras pa/

bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems par chen po gang dag ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de dag ni lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rtan gyis phyag
bya ba'i gnas yin no// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das soms dang po bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo dang// sems can thams cad kyi ched du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byar rgul mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'tshal ba de bsod namasaji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur tam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur/
na/ ci sems can de dag bsod nams mang du skyodadum/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis lags so// bde bar
gshegs pa tshad ma mchis lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi thig pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa rnams kyi bsod
nams skya pa'i dngos po gang yin pa dang/ sams dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa 'di gnyis la/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisgrig pa pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po des ni/ soms dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bya ba'i/
dngos po de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa rnams
ni byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas las byung pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ stong gsum kyi

stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sams can nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ji snyad pa de dag thams cad ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi

bsod nams kyi phye ba 'bum gi cha'i bar du'ang chu bar mi 'gro'o// rab 'byor stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyisams can nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams lta zhog gi/
rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams na// sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang/ de dag gi bsod nams/
gang yin pa des na sems dang po la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lasod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum kyi cha'i bar du nga bar mi 'gro'o// dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i la gnas
pa rnams lta zhog gi/ gal te stong gsum kyi stong chen po 'i 'a jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang/ de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa des
ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams bye ba phrag 'bumakyi chu'i khar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ brnyadapa'i sa dang/ mthong
ba'i sa dang/ bsrubs pa'i sa dang/ 'dod chags dang srol kha'is dang/ byas pa rtog pa can gyis dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du zhugs par gyur kyang/ de dag ki bsod nams gang yin pa
des ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsod nams kyi bya ba phrag 'bum gyi chu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khamasan/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur kyang/ de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa des ni byang chub la zhugs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de
dag thams cad byang chub la zhugs par gyur kyang/ de dag gi bsod nams gang yin pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi phyi la zag
khrig phrag 'bum kyi cha'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro zhing/ rgyu dang dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems dang po bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos ci zhig yid la bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems dang po bskyod pa'i spyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa sboms cad
mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ni ji lta bu zhig lags/ dmigs pa ni ci zhig lags/ dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/
rnam pa ni ci zhig lags/ mtshan nyid nigang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma 'byowas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po med pa// mtshan nyid med pa// mtshan ma med pa/ lcan gyis
grub pa/ skye ba med pa// 'byung ba mad pa'o// rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyidamigs pa ni ci zhig lags/ dbang bgyid pa ni gang lags/ rnam pa na zhig
lags/ mtshan nyid ni gang lags zhes zer ba la/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyidakyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'o// dbang byed pa ni dran pa'o// rnam pa ni zhi ba'o// mtshan nyid
ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni de yin no// dbang byed ra ni de yin no// rnam pa ni de yin no// mtshan nyid ni da yin no/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ 'on tegazugs kyang dngos po ma mchis shing/ chor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed
[j] rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ de bzhin du nang dang/ phyi'i chos rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa
bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs

lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par
thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen mo dang/ mngon par shes pa dang ngo dang/ mngon par shes pa gnyis ra dang dwagasum pa dang/
bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa dang/ drug pa dang/ 'dus byas kyi khams dad/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med do// gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med do/ Na'adusakhyas kyi khams dang/ 'dus
ma byas kyi khams kyi bar du'ang dngos po med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la ngo bo nyid med de/ rab 'byor gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po
med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyide med de/

gang la 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa de dngos po chod pa'o// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor yang chos thams cad ni stong pa'i ngo bo nyid do//

chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor yang chos thams cad ni bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i ma tha'i ngo bo nyid do// chos thams
cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du de ltar rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ ba com
ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ri bo 'de lags na/ sems dang po bskyod pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par

[zs/ ]bgyid/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan dang po nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang/ byams pa nas/ btang snyoms kyi khar dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
min skye mched kyi khar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid nas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dung/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad/

pa'i bar dang/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ mtshanamamed pa'i ting nge 'a tshan dang/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dgu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jig pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco pa rgyad dang/ snying rjen po dang/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid la/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams la'ang yongs su 'dris par khyed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed la/ sems na rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de//
@#/ sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing de dang/ sams can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yi/

par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod cing/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris nga ra byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
cing/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/

byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ byang nub/
kyi lam yongs su 'dris par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing/ byang chub kyi a ma yongs su 'dris par byedal/ byang chub kyi lam de'ang dngos lo
@#/ med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa de ji srid du de bzhinagashegs pa'i stobs bsu dang/ mi 'jigs pa

bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan par
ma gyur pa de srid du/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su 'dris par mi byed do// rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub kyi lam yin te/ de byang chub kyi lam 'di dag gis pha rol tu phying rdums sa la rdzogs
bar byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ra 'gyur re ratsho ba chags dang
mtshams sbyor ba dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad mi skya ba'i spong bas spong bar 'gyur ro// des sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen ngo 'a'ajig rten gyi 4 ma la rnam par ltas na//
dngos po med pa ra yang mi dmigs na dngos por lta ci smos/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dang la sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad la/ shesaMrab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor dngos po'ang mi dmigs na/ dngos po med pa lta ci smos te/ de'ang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dar ra chen ngo sa lam lasapa yin 4pa/

'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de sbyin pa de sbyin pa narnam pa rami rtog cing mtshan mar mi byedade/ dngas
dza dang dngos po med pa'i tshul nu yid la mi byed do// len pa por yang rnam par mi rtog cing/ mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do// sbyin pa lor5rnam
dpar mi rtog cing/ mtshan mar mi byed de/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed do// byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs shing/ mtshan mar mi byed la/
dmigs par mi byed de/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du'ang dag po dang dngos po yod pa'i tshul du rnam par rtog cing/ mtshan mar mi byed do//

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul du yid la mi byed cing/ rnam par mi rtog 'a/ yid la mi byed do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
kyi bar du'ang dmigs par mi byed cing/ mtshanamar mi byed do// gang mngon par rdzogs pa ra 'tshang rgyang 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba nam/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs

pa 'tshang rgyab de'ang dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtogs par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ dngos po med pa de'ang
sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas shing/ chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste 1 byed pa po dang bral ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos rnams ni chos rnams dang bral ba yin no///
gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos rnams kho na chos rnams dang bral ba lags na/ bral ba'i chos kyis bral ba'i chos dngos po mchis pa ram/ dngos po ma mchis par ji ltar 'tshal
bar rung ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi ngal/ dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi tshu dwangos
po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos bo ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung la/ dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyi kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshol bar mi rung lags na/ de ltarim 'tshal
ba'i chos thams cad la dngos po mchis shes bgyi ba 'am/ dngos po ma mchis shes bgyi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ston par ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bzung ste/ dngos po yod pa zhes bya panam/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston gyis/ don par
ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig lags la/ don dam pa'ang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig
gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan ma yin la/ don dam pa'ang gzhan ma yin// 'jig rten kyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin/ de bzhin nyid de [']sa can
@#/// dag gis mi shes shing ma mthong bas 1 de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dar la 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi dngos po yod pa 'am/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ston te/ rab
sba 'byor yang sems can 'di dag ni phung po lnga po 'di dag la dngos por 'du shes shing/ dngos po med pa racha shas te/ ltar byas na dngos po med pa rtogs par 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas/ de dag

gi don du chos rnams rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir de ltar ston par byed de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyad par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol
du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ yang dag par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'angs la/ tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang nub sems dpa'i spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de

gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byung chub semasadapa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// gsol ba/
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi spyod pa de gang la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs stong ngo zhes smyon pa dang/ tshor ba dang/

'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ de bzhin dukhams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ nad dang phyi'i chos rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ tshul khrims kyis rol tu phyin pa dang/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi larol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong

ya nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan dang po dang// gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang bzhi pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms stong ngo
zhes spyod pa dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang/ cig nga med pa'i skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang

dran pa nye khar gzhag ra ba'i stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ dbang po lnga stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ stobs lnga/

stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lakas brgyad pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon
pamed pa dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhidang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dus/

pa bco brgyad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ sa mas snyan yongs su smin par bya ba stong ngo zhes

spyod pa dang/ spobs pa rnams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ yi ge ba sgrub pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ yi ga rnams la 'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ yi ge rnams med pa la 'jug pa stong ngo zhes spyod pa

dang/ gzugs stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ 'dus byas kyi khams stong ngo zhes spyod pa dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams stong ngo zhes spyod pa sta/ ci nas kyang chub la gnyis su mi 'byed pa de ltar rtos su spyod do//
rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyodan byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasal/
tsho da ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas shes bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas shes bkyil de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i don ni sangs rgyas shes bya'o// rab 'byor la rem yangs pa chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas shes bya'o// rab 'byor yang des yang dag pa'i
0 don rtogs pas na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas shes bya'o// rab 'byor yang chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dumangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas shes bya'o// gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi na/ byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rmog bla dgas so// de ni

bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dgas so// de ni chos kyi dbyis kyi tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor yang byang chub ces bya ba de ni ming tsam gyi tshig bla dgas so//

rab 'byor yang byang chub kyi don ni yang dag pa'i don to// rab 'byor yang byang chub ni di bzhin nyid dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhanam yin la de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa'i rang bzhin te/

de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub de ni chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byorades na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi byang nub ste/ de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub
ces bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags na/ de'i dag pa'i rtsa ba gang
bsags pa'am/ 'grig ma 'am/ nyas pa 'am/ 'phal ba'am/ skyo ba nam/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa nam/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang la chen po gang byang chub 'ad la spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug/
la spyod pa dang/ rnamasal thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de ni/ chos gang yang bsags pa'i phyir ram/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/ nyams par bya ba'i phyir ram/ 'phel bar bya ba'i

phyir ram/ bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ram/ dgag par bya ba'i phyir ram/ kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ma/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni bsags pa'i phyir 'am/ 'grib par bya ba'i phyir ram/ nyams par bya ba'i phyir ram/ 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ram/ bskyed
par bya ba'i phyir ram/ dgag par bya ba'i phyir ram/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ra bya ba'i phyir ram/ rnam par byang bar bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nga la spyod nga 'i byang chub chos gang la'ang dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags

na/ byang nub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa spyod de dziltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzinam dang/ de bzhin du ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs
su'adzan pa lags/ ji ltar nanang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa lags/ dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa nas/ 2phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyidadad

mtshan ma med pa dang 1 smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pahu'i par la spyod pa dang 2 snying rje chen po'i bar la spyod pa lags/ ji ltaman byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po dag la
spyod pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'da' ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa 'jug pa lags ) de skad ces gsol pa dang 3 bcom ldan 'das kyis 1 tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang ba sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
@#/ la mi spyod do// de bzhin du sbyar te 2 gnyis kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la mi spyod ro gnyis kyi tshul gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi

spyod do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na)sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang ) shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
bar du ongs su 'dzin pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dus gal te gnyis kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa la mi spyong la ) de bzhin du gnyis kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod lags na ) ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyod pa nas nye
bar ba zung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam pa ra'aphel bar 'gyur zhing/ sems bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du ji ltar dge ba'artsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags ) de ska ces gsol pa da/
bcom ldan 'das kyis 1 tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor gang dag gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ de
ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gnyis la rten pa ni byis pa so so'i skye bothams cad de/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ni gnyis la mi spyod
pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ 'ge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing/ sems bskyed pa tha ma'i bar du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/
de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dganelha dang/ mi dang ) lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis gnan par mi nus so// mi dge ba gang dag gis thel gyis gnon par gyur pa ni nyan thos kyis 'am

rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bar 'gyur zhing/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dag gis kyang 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ de dag gis phyogs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pan/ dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis
rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sen sa dad sems
dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dang na sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod lags sam/ bka' stsal ra/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir shes rab
kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin la/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir yang shes rab kyi rab rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la
@#// bsnyen bkur ma byas sam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas sam/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis yongs su ma zin par ma yang byang chub sems
dpal soms dang 'a chen pos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid dang/ dgro ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang/ dug ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pas/ jiltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po soms dang po brgyad pa nas bzung ste// de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyan bkur byed cing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis mdo'i sdadang/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang/ lung du bstan pa'i smadang/

tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang/ ched du brjod pa ni pa dang/ gleng gzhi'i lho dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang/ dalta bu byung ba'i sde dang/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang/ rmad du byung ba'i chos

sde dang/ gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// bzunganus kyang tshogs gis yongs su 'dris par byas nas yid kyi rjes su rtogs par byed la/ lta bas shin tu

rtog par byed cing gzungs thob pa'o// gzungs thob nas kyang so so yang dag par rig pa skyed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bskyed nas/ de tshabarjes nas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar

du nams kyang chos de dag chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// der de bzhin gshegs pa dusbra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyod par byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs

su zin pas gzhan yang nganasong rnams dang mi khom pa rnams su mi skye zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang yongs su zin pas/ dgo pa'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang bsam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
dag par byed pa dang/ soms can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyura'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bzung bas kyang/ dag pa'i
bshes gnyes rnams dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos gang dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa
rnams dang nams kyang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur/
byas shing ! dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang brten par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sen
pa dang/ bstan pa dang// bsnyen bkur bya ba'i thabs kyi le'u zhes bya ste druganu rtsa lnga pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkurami bgyid cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang m spyod
la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyis kyang yongs su ma zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed cing/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen dag
gis yongs su ma zin pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byas shing// dge ba'i rtsa ba
rnams kyang bskyod la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen langs pa rten du zin kyang/ da dung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nusan ) sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas
shing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yodas su rdzogs par ma byas la/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la ma brten par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// rab 'byor de bas
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' samasarar chen pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan bkur bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten
par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan bkur bgyis shing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang
bskya dal/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten kyang/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa// thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir te// des sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag las thabs de ma thos la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ma bskyed de/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen gang dgade la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang ma brte napa'i
phyi'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs la mkhas pa gang dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid thob par 'gyur ba'i
thabs la mkhas par gyur pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la khyang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po nasoms dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin paspyod pan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ mir gyur pa rnams dang/ mi ma yin du gyur pa rnamal sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de rnam pa thams cad/

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ldan pas/ de sbyin pa la'ang sbyin pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur 1 len pa po la'ang len pa po'i 'i dushes su mi 'gyur/ sbyin ba po la'ang sbyin pa po'i 'du shes

su mi 'gyu'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa dang/ yongs su ma grub pa dang/ mngon par ma grub par mthong la/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid/
la'ang 'jug cing/ chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu mdacing mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pas dgu ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'phel

bar 'gyur ro// de dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par namel na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodan/ sams can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing/ sos

rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byedal/ 'khor ba na sbyin pa'i 'a khras bu yongs su longs spyod pa gang yin pa'i sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la'ang mi'i lta/ gzhan du na sems cad yongs su bskyab pa dang/

sems can yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i la thol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa drug
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ rnam
ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis tshul khrims de srung// de 'dod chags kyi soms dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba dang/
byang chub la bgegs byedapa'i ma dag kha'i rtsa ba'i chos gang yang rung pa 'di lta ste/ sor sna dang ) 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang/ 'khrug pa'i sems dang le lo'i sems dang/ dman pa'i sems dang
'khrul pa'i sems dang/ 'chal pa'i shes rab kyisoms dang/ nga rgyal dang/ b.ras pa dang/ ltag pa'i nga rgyal lam/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal lam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sams/

kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing/ chos thams cad ma byung ba dang/ yongs su ma grub ba dang/ mngon par ma grub
par mthong la/ chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste chos thams cad byed pa'i mthu med de/ mngon par 'du byed pa mang ba'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan/

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dag ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam pa ma'amolan/ tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod na/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang yongs su dag par byed la/ 'khor ba natshul khrims kyi
'bras bu yongs su longs spyad pa gang yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la'ang mi re so ! gzhan du na sams can rjes su gsung ba dang/ semasacan la mi gnod pa dang/ sems can la phan par 'dod
pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ tshul khrims kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o/ skado
nga zhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ sems dang po baspyod pa nas bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag
glu gis shes rab sgom par byed de/ de la 'dod chags kyi sems nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi sams kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar des chos thams
cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing/ chos thams cad ma byung ba dang/ yongs su ma grub pa dang/ mngon par ma grub par mthong la/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug ste/

chos thams cad byed pa la mthumed cing mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i phyir te/ thabs la mkhas pa de dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de
