kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu yin no// tshor ba thams
cad dang/ 'du shes thams cad dang/ 'du byed thams cad dang/ rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lta bu yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan gal te chos thams
cud sul pa lta bu lags na/ sul ba la ni gzugs ma mchis/ chor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis/ 'du byed rnams ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis ) kun nas nyonamos
ba ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis shing gangalasasems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyi ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba'ang ma mchis lags na/ 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
pa' chen po'i skyes bu'i mthur 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di jisnyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sngon byang chub
sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ gang sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam )gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ mi 'am ) lha dag las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i sems can 'ga'/
mang dmigs hUm mam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 'gas so// bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byorade de bzhin no/ de de bzhin ti/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos//
'a[/ ]gang khams gsum nas yongs su thar pa'abya ba'i sems can 'ga' yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltarades chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang sbyal palta bu r shes shing mthong la
rnam par rig pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang sbrul ba lta bu r 'tshal cing mthong la/ rnam par
rig lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ga don du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshod med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
bzhi dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ byang chub kyi lam la spyod cing ) sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par
bgyid lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis
chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang sprul pa lta bu r shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems
dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod pa zhig na/ 'ob 'byor 'di ltar sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad rmi lamalta bu dang sprul pa lta bu r mi shes te de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par phazol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed sas rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmilam lta bu dang/ mig yor lta bu dang//
sgyu ma lta bu dang/ mig rgyu lta bu dang/ sprul ba lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyang ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[“]phyin pa la spyod pas/ gang las skyod bar bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor sems can rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa'i ming dang mtshan ma dag la gnas pa na/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ de dag gi ming dang mtshan ma las spyod par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa/
rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags mtshan ma nigang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba
dang mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo bur du mang btags ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am ) rnam bar shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba
'a03 'am bu med ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am 3 bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal bzhes bya ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ gshin
rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba'am/ me zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi tshos shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'am )
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba de dag ni bcos mar ming du btags pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni ming ste/ gzhol ba'i phyir ro// 'dus byas
tha/ sa cad ni ming tsam du brang na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams de la chags pas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la
mkhas pas 'di skad du mang 'di'i yongs su rtogs pa kun nas bskyed pa yin pas rang bzhin gyis stong zhing/ dngos po med pa la khyed cig yod pa ma yin par yongs su rtogs pas chags pa
ma byed cig/ mkhas pa rnams ni chos stong pa dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do zhes kun nas 'bral bar byed de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
sbyin pa la spyod ba/ thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston bar byed do// rab 'abyor mtshanam gang zhen/ rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni
gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang/ gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor de la gzugs
sa: kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs gang ci'ang rung ste/ rags pa 'ag/ brab lam/ bzang ba'am/ na pa dag ste/ gang skad cig pa'i chos dedag thams cad la yongs su rtog
pas 'dzin par byed pa de ni gzugs kyi mtshanam zhes bya'o// gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhen/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang ci'ang rung ste dmtshan mar gzung zhing yongs su brtags
pa las nyon mongs pa skye ba de ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams chags pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi parol tu
kA phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas de dag mtshan pa de dang phral nas/ mtshanam med pa'i dngos pol 'jug cung 'god par byed de/ ci nas kyang 'di'i mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med
! pa'o zhes gnyis su mi lhung ba de ltar 'dzad cing deltar 'god par byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas ]
bawa ] ]pas/ de ltar sems can rnams mtshan mdang phral nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings la 'dzud ceng 'god par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad de tsam du bas ti/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ma mchis pa tsam du byas pa lags n/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// ji ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams kyis bye brag tu la bogs bar 'gyur la/ ngagazhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams kyis bye brag tu
'bogs pa la 'god par bgyid ba dang/ sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing sems can rnams kyang de dag nyid la sbyor bar bgyid lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gal te mtshan ma dngos po zhig yi na te/ dngos po med pa ma yin par gyur na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dge ba'i chos rnams kyis khyad par 'thob par mi 'gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang khyad par 'thob pa la 'god par ma
gyur ba zhig na/ 'ab 'byor 'di ltar mtshan ma ni dngos po ma yin zhing dngos po med de/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha lol tu phyin pa la spyod
dpa mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
su rdzogs par byed do/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ mtshan ma med pa'itshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
do/ sbyin pa'i pha rolatu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshad med pa rnams dad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dung/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
pa'abyed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi stong pa nyid longs su rdzogs par byed
rgyudo phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag longs su rdzogs par byed do/
rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mthar gyis gonas ba'i snyoms par 'jugapa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su rdzogs bar byed de/ des dge ba'i chos de dag
yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ) mtshan ma med pa'i tshulagyis gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor bar byeg do// rab 'abyor gal te chos rnams la tha na skra'i kye mo'i cha shas
bzhag pa tsam gyi mtshan ma zhig yodapar gyur na'ang/ thob 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ dran pa med
pa dang/ yid la byed pa med pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur la/ sems can rnams kyang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin nyid du 'god par yang
mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni zag pa med cing/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ dran pa med pa dang/ midal byed pa med pa yin te/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing )dran pa ma mchis la/ yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa
lags na ) bcom ldan 'das 'o na 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thunamong ma
bas/ @#// min pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thokyi chos go// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldama'angs kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'abyor
'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la) nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dor ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/
ba/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin sum mam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mamu/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni malags
sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'on mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/
'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bka' stsal pa/
rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa'i chos de dag thams cad la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ b.rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med ba bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ) dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par sbyong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lAdang/ byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cud kyi bar dag gis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med ba dang/ smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par/ bslab par bya ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa
nyid yin no// mtshan ma dang bral ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med ba yin no/ mngonapar 'du byed pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa yin te/ rnam par thar pa'i
sgo gsum po de dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phung lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bcobargyad
[H]slob yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa na/ 'phags pa'i bdenA ba bzhil slobapa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung b.lan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/
nang stong ba nyid la slob pa min/ phyi stong banyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i dobo nyidi stod pa nyid kyi bor la slob pa yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sa
lo'i tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yanalag brgyad pa'i bar la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob
ba yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin no/ nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bshesarab kyil lad tu phyin bal skyod ba jit+taranye bar lenakhadzi'i du ba lta bu dag la
slob pa lags/ bka' stsal ba/ 'ab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyil ro na tsaphyin ba la skyodab/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang/
[/]gzugs ji ltar 'gog pa dang/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'ang rab tu shes so// gzugs ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbu ba rdos pa la snying po med ba de
bzhin du/ gzugs kyang shes shin tu gse chags dang/ shin tu gsang ldeng dang/ shin tu snyid po med par rab tu shes so// gzugs kyi skyab ji ltar rab tu shes shan/gzugs ni gang nas kyang

'ong ba med la/gzug ni gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong// gang du'ang ma 'gro ba de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba rab tu shesaso// rab 'byor gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du'ang ma song ba de ltar gzugs

kyi skyeb dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so// gzugasakyi de bzhin nying ji ltar btushesasha na ) de bzhin zhing la skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ 'ong ba med pa dang/ 'grob med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa
med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba med pa dang/ 'phel ba med pa dang/ 'grib pa med pa de ltar de bzhin 'di rab tu shes so// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin
nyid yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid cesabya'o// de la log pa nyid med pa// de'i phyirayang de bzhin nyid ces bya ste/ deltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so// tshor ba ji ltar rab tu

shes/ tshor ba'i skye ba ji ltar rab tu shes/ tshor ba'i 'jig pa ji ltar rab tu shes/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid jiltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste ) dper na chu'i chu bur gyi skye ba dang 'jig pa gsog
datu 'dug pa de ltar tshor ba rab tushas so// de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing )gang du'anga' gro ba med pa med pa de ltaratshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so// tshor
ba'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes shi na/ nge bzhin nyid de ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so// 'du shes ji ltar rab tu shes she na 3 'di lta ste/
dper na smig rgyu'i tshogs la chu shin tu dmagasasu med pa de ltar 'du shes rab tu shes so// de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing 2 gang du'ang 'grob med pade ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig
pa rab tu shes so// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shesangashe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid rab tugs so// 'du byed rnams ji ltar rab tu
gshes she na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chu shing shun pa so sor phye na ni snying po mi dmigs pa de ltar 'du byed rnams rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa ji ltar bab
tu shes she na/ de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab
tu shes she na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan
gyis sbal pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ji lta ba de ltar rnam par shes pa rab tu shes so// de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing ) gang ngu'ang 'gro ba med pa deltar rnam par shes pa'i/

skye ba dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so// rnam bar shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de ltar rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shesate/ de ltar na/
rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rab tu shes pa yin no// khams rnams ji ltar shes she na/ mig gikhams ni mig gi khams kyi ngo ba nyid kyis stong ba de ltar mig gi khams rab tu shes
so// gzugs kyi khams ji ltar shes she na/ gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba de ltar gzugs kyi khams rab tu shes so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i//
khams ji ltar 'ab tu shes rab na/ mig gi rnam ba shes pa'i khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ngo ba nyid kyis stong ba de ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes
sa/ rna ba'i khams dang/ sgra'i khams dang ) rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ sna'i khams dang/ dri'i khams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lce'i khams dang/
ro'i khams dang/ lce'i rnam bar pa'i khams dang/ lus kyi khams dang/ rig bya'i khams dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ yid kyi khams jiltar rab tu shis gzha
mad kyi khams ni yid kyi khams kyi ngo bod kyis stong ba de ltar yid kyi khams rab tu shes so// chos kyi khams ji ltar 'ab tu shes she na[.]chos kyi khams ni chos kyi
khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar chos kyi khams rab tu shes so// med kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ji ltarab tu shes shen/ mid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams na yid kyi rnam pa'
shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa de ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rab tu shes te/ de ltar na khams bco brgyad rab tu dgos pa yin no// skye mched rnams ji ltar rab tu
shesashen/ nang gi skye mched rnams ni nga phyi skye mched rnams kyi stong la/ phyi'i skyed mched rnams ni phyi'i skyed mched rnams kyis stod pa de ltar skye mched rnams rab tu shes sa// 'phags
zla pa'i bden pa rnams ji ltar 'ab tu shes she na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes pa dang 8 kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rab tu shes
pa'o sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden par ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ sdug bsngal du rab tu shes pa dang/ bdon par rab tu shes pa dang/ 'phagasal rnams kyi bdenaba'o zhes lab tu shes
la gnyis los rnam par grol zhing/ gnyis ma yinab ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yin par rab tu shes pa ste/ kun 'byungaba'ang de bzhin// 'gog pa'ang de bzhin/sdug bsngal 'gog par

'gro ba'i lam yang de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden par rab tu shes so// sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab tu shes she na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid yin pa de ltar sdug bsngal/
gyi de bzhin nyeng 'batushes te/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes so// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji ltar rab tu shes shin/ rten rnying
'brel par 'byung ba ni skye ba med par rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang/ chad ba med pa dang/ rtag pa med pa dang ) de gcig pa ma yin
pa dang/ don thadad pa ma yin pa dang ) 'ong ba med padang/ 'gro ba med pa dang/ sbyos pa med pa dang/ zhibar rab tu shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan
ba rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poshas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa phan tshun bA dad pa'i chos dedag de lta
rab tu 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na des chos kyi dbyings rnams dkrugs par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings
su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan 'ga' zhig ngamigs su yod na ni/ rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur na/ 'ba'abyor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa gang dmigs pas/ chos
kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan ni gang yang dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i
chos gzhanani/ de bzhin gshigs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis kyang/ gang yang ma dmigs pa'i phyir te ma dmigs pas na/ chos kyi dbyings sum
gtogs pa'i chos gzhan 'ga' tsam zhig dmigs su yod do zhes 'dogs par mi byed de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bal spyod pas/
de ltar chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan ba rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slobapas gang la bsrubs pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la bslabs pa yin no// deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'bo 'byor 'di ltar chos thams
cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/ bka'astsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams byung yang rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung/ chos rnamA kyi chos dbyings 'di ni dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ste// rang 'byor chos kyi dbyings de'ang 'di lta ste//
dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi bar gyi chos thams cad yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslabs na chos thams cad la bslabs pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasal/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
'de skad ceso gsel to// bcom ldan 'das gal te tshes thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
'ol tu phyin pal ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin du ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ jiltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar

brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ dbazhin du ji ltar byang chub
ja mu dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsam gtan dang po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ bsam gtan gsum pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la bslab pa
1// bgyi ! de bzhin du ji ltar byams pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sAng rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms la bslab par bgyi ) de bzhin du ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha'
yas skye mched dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin du ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi de bzhin du ji ltar yang dag
par sbyong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang ) 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgya de la bslab par
bgyi/ jiltar snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin du ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcul bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ se so
yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ) byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen bo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab bar bgyi/ jiltar mngon par shes pa drug dang da
skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bsgrub pa'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs shing
0 sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltarabram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bsab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim bdag
gi rigs shing sA la chen pa lta bu dag tu skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ jiltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sum
cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi ji ltar 'thab bral dang 3 dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
dang tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs 'khor dang 3 'od chung dung/ tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dgo chung dang ) tshad med
dge dang/ dge rgyas dang/ 'bras bu che dang/ 'du shes ma mchis pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar der mi skye bar bgyi ba'i smad
du bsub par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma mi che ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ shin tu mthong ba dang/ gya nom snang dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab bar
brgya ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang ) 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi da ji
ltar gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dad lnga pa dang/ drug pa dang ) bdun pa dad/ brgyad pa dung/ dbadu pa dang/ sems bas+sed pa bcu pa
la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyis la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par
bgyi ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la bsub par bgyi/ji ltar gang la bslab pas pa chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i khyad chub kyi lam la bslab
par bgyi/ bcomaldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das po'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log
ga spyod pa 'am/ ma spros pa spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyangs la ni rnam par rtog pa dadag ma mchis pa'i slad
du ste: gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags la gzugs
ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dud/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis ste/ gzugs nyid
kyang chos kyi dbyings lags la// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs lags so// rnam par shes pa'i bar nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings lags la/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par
shes pa lags so// ji ltar nang gi chos bsgres pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'abyor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ rab 'abyor gzugs nyid chos kyi dbyings so// tshor ba dang/
'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba dang/ 'du
shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ste/ rab 'byor byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// gal te chos
kyi dbyingasasu ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ 'di ltar chos thams
cad chos kyi dbyings yin te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings
su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'ab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos ngo dag thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag/
pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tushes nas kyang/ ming med pa'i chos rnams la 'dini gzugs so// 'di ni tshor ba'o// 'di ni 'du shes so// 'di ni 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam
parashas pa'o zhesakhya ba dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di'i byung chub bo zhes bya ba'i bar du ming dang brdas ston par byed do// rab 'abyora'adi lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyum/
mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pazhig gis rdzongs kyi rnam pa gang yang rung ba zhig la byin gyis brlabs na/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs
sam/ glang po che'i gzugs sam ) rta'i gzugs sam/ glang gi gzugs sam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga'i ra ba nyams dga' ba dag gam/ chu klung nyams dga' ba dag
gam rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dag nye bar ston te/ der gding ba dang ro dbyangs sna tshogs bting ba dag kyang nyabarab stan nas/ me tog dang/ me tog 'phreng gi yon tan dang/
bza' ba dang/ bca' bdag kyang kun tu bstan/ glu dbyangs dang rol mo mang pos skye bo dga' bar byed pa dag kyang kun tu bstan nas/ sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'am tshul
khrims srung ba 'am/ bzod pa sgrub pa 'am/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par rtse ba 'am/ shes rab sgom par byed pa 'am/ des der rnam pa de lta bu
dag gis rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gam/ bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gam/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag kyang bstan tam/
rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag bsten tam/ ri rab bstan tam ) sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag bstan tam/ 'thab bra lam/ draga' ldan nam/ 'phrul dga' 'am/
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dag bstan tam/ gzugs med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha dag bstan tam ) rgyun du zhugs
pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gang yin pa de dag bstan tam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ) bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ sa dang po la spyod pa dang/ sa
bcu pa'i bar la spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams mngonaba'i sgrub cing/ de dag gis rnam par rtsa ba dang sems
can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang 2 sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed ba dang/ bsam gtan dang da rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms
par 'jug pa dag gis rnam par rtse ba dang/ yan lag dang nying lag dag yongs su gtong ba dang/ dka' ba spyod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgrub par byed pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams drang/ byams pa chen po dwang/ snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub
pa dag bstan tum/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lagadanganying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dag bstanA na/ del sems can byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag ni/ 'disAm du kye ma/
mi 'dis ci tsam du 'di lta ste/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang ) de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i bar dgabastan pas/ skye bo 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin cing/ ci
0 nas kyang mdzes dgusha stugs byedapa ni shin tu legs par bslabs pa yin no snyam du shes so// de nas mi gang dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gsal zhing yid gzhungs la/ gzugs
de dag la spyod pa dang ldan pa de dag ni sAmadu 'dil chos gang yang dmigs su med na/ mi 'dis yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyis skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag dga' bar byed pa dang/
'di ltar 'di ni de dag la skye bo 'di dag ni rdzas med pa la rdzas su 'du shes pa yin no snyam pa'i shes pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no snyam mo// rab 'byor de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogasaM pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi mthong na/bshes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa khasemA can dang sems 'dug dgas pa'ang mi dmigs mod kyi/ de thabras la mkhas pa dang ldan pas bdag kyang sbyin pa sbyin par byed la/ gzhan dag
kyang sbyin pa la spyor bar byed cing 3 sbyin pa'i bsngags pa'ang bad la/ gzhan gang dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang rjod cing ) rjes su dga' bar byed
do bdag kyang tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bdag kyang bzod pa sgom par byed/ bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/ bdag kyang bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog
)pa'abyed/ bdag kyang shes rab sgom par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang shes rab la sbyor bar byed cing/ shes rab kyi bsngags pa'ang brjod la/ gzhan gang
dag shes rab sgom par byed pa de dag gi bsngags pa'ang rjod cing/ rjes su dga' bar byed do// de bzhin du spyar te/ bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang drag par 'dzin la/
gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam langadag par 'dzin du 'jug cing/ rjes su dga' ba'i bar du byed do// bdagakyang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag par 'dzin par byed cing de rjes
su dga' ba'i bar du byed do// bdag kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la gnas par byed cing/ rjes su dga' ba'i bar du byed do// bdug spyod bsam gtan dang po
dang : bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang 1 btang snyoms dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dad 'du shes med
'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag bsgrubs te gnasangashing/ rjes su dga' ba'i bar du byed do// bdag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ 'bags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyud pa'i bar dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 3 mthar gyis gnas pa'i goms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis drang/ dwape byad bzang po brgyad cu sgom zhing rjes su dga' ba'i bar du byed do// rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings ston ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin ma yin la )
bar dag tu'ang de bzhin ma yin du zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas chos kyi byedas rjod pa dang/
sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings ni sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang re
bzhin la/ bar phu'ang de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas/ sems
can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba khri brgyud stod pa las/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i le'u zhes
bya ste bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can
de shin tu dmigs su ma mchis la/ sems can du gdags pa'ang ma mchis na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bgyid lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'od skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' tshad mar byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan//
sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan pa zhig yin na ni 1 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ bab 'byor 'di ltar yang
dag pa'i mah+pha' yang gzhan ma yin la/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yinate/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pa
sol tu phyin pa la sdod par byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang ga pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug pa med pas/ sems
can rnams yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das gal te yang dag pa'i mtha'anyid kyang sems can gyi mtha' lugs na ) 'o naji ltar ya nga dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i rma tha'aganas par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das gal te yang dag
pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas par 'gyur na ni/ de ltar na ngo bo nying lobo nying gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ngo ba nyid la rdzob nyid gnas pa ni ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god par bgyid lags/ ngaskad ces gsol pa
dad bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ang dag pa'i mtha' la mi gnas la/ ngobashad kyang kho nyid la
mi gnas mod kyi/ rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas sems can gyi mtha' yang dag pa'i
mtha' la 'god cing/ yang dag pa'i mthu' rnam par 'khrug par yang mi byed de/ rab 'abyor de ltaran yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin la/ sems can gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
te yang dag pa'i mtha' dang sems can gyi mtha' 'di ni nga/nyis su med de gnyis bu khyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das//
la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi Tha rol tu phyin pa/
spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas/ sems can rnams la nga dag pa'i masha' la 'god kyang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khrug par yang mi bgyid pa'i byang chub
[“]: soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/ de skad rkyes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste// sems can rnams
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'god par byed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod nas kyang ) sbyin pa de sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i ma tha' dang/ dbus ston par byed de/
ngaltar sbyin pa 'di'i sngon gyi mtha' yang stongal/ phyi ma'i mahra'i ya nga stong zhing/ dbus kyang godapa de bzhin du/ spyin pa 'di'ang stod do// sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang stong ngo//
sbyin bdag kyang stong ngo// len pa po'ang stong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na don de dag thams cad na yang dag pa'i mtha' la yod pa ma yin gyis/ sbyin pa'ang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i
tha[c/ ]'bras bu'ang gzhan no sAm du ma sems shig/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhan la/ len pa bo'ang gzhan 'o sAm du ma sems shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ sbyin pa'ang gzhan la
sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan no snyam du mi sems la/ sbyin bdag kyang gzhanal/ len pa po'ang gzhan no Am du mi sems bde'i tshe/ khyod kyi sbyin pa 'di ni gnyis ka la bdud
tshur 'gyur te bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang/ bdud rtsi'i ma tha' sbyin par byed kyis/ khyed spyin pa 'dis gzugs yongs su ma 'dzin nug/ tshor ba dang/ 'dungushes dang//
'du byed rnams dang rnam par nges pa yongs su ma 'dzinacig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar khyod kyi snyan pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i ngob nyid kyis stong/ 'bras bu de'ang 'bras bu'i ngo bo
nyid kyis stong/ sbyin bdag kyang sbyin bdag gi ngo bo nyid kyis skyong/ len pa po'ang len pa po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas no/ stong pa nyid la ni sbyin pa'ang dmigs su med la/ sbyin
pa'i 'bras bu dang/ spyin bdag dang/ len pa po'ang dmigs su me da pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i sgyur zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis shin tu stong pa'i phyir no
zhes ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas sems can
u/ rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'god de/ rigs kyi bu tshun shog/ khyod kyis srog gcod pa spongs la/ srog gcod pa las phyir ldog par gyis shig/
de bzhin du sbyar te/ khyod kyis log par lta ba'i bar du spos la/ log par lta ba las phyir ldog par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag thams cad la ji lta ba khyod kyis yongs
su brtags pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin gang yang med kyis/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag la gung srog gcad par bya ba'i srog chags dang/ gang gis srog gcad par bya ba'i chos de dag gang
yin zhes nye bar rtogs shig/ log par lta ba'i bar la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes ston te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu'ang stonal/ sbyin ba'i 'bras bu dang/
tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bstan pas/ rigs kyi bu des sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang/ tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de dag 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong par
riganas/ de la mngon par zhen par mi byed do// mngon bar zhen pa med pas rnam par g.yeng ba med pa bskyedanas shes rab skyed par byed do// shes rab des bag la nyal dang/ kun
ba[z/ ]ldangab thams cad spangs nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin bgyi/ don dam par ni ma yin
no[：]de rtse'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ni gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'am/ gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ gzhan du na de'i yos
sumya ngan las 'das pa de na/ 'di lta ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yin no// kashesab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'aphags pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po/
lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa////rab 'byo'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan
dag phan tshun 'khrug cing gnod sems su gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di skad du 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed do// rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ gang khyed gnod sems su byed pa'i chos de dag
bla mas cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin gyis/ khyed cag bzod pa sgrubs shig/ bzod pa sgoms shig/ dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can du gyis shig/ kyegang la gnod
sems su bya ba dang/ gang gnod sems su byed pa dang/ gang gis gnod sems su byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du zhu bar rtogs shig/ rang bzhin
gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni nam yang mi stong par mi 'gyur te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos
rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams rang/ dri za rnams dang/ mi 'am ci rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen/
pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar gyi lha rnams dang/ tshangs ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas kyi bar dag dang/ gnas gtsang
ma rnams dang ) 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar dag gis kyang ma byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang la gnod sems su bya ba dang/ gang gnod sems su
byed pa dang/ gang gis gnod sems su byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin par nye bar rtogs shig dang/ stong pa nyid ni gang la'ang gnod sems su
byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams rang
bzhin gyis stod pa nyed la sbyor bar byed cing/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la 'ang sbyor bar byed do//rang bzhin gyis stong pa nying la sbyor ba na/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
bas: byang chub la yang dag par dga' bar byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed ) 'god bar byed de/ de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni gang thob par bya ba dang/ gang thob par byed pa dang/ gang gis thob par byed pa'i chos de dag thams cad dmags su med
pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag pa'i mtha' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ni/
rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/ de la ni sems can yang mi dmigs/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni
sems can gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems
brtson 'grus zhan pa dag mthong na thabs la mkhas pas lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/ rigs kyi bu rang bzhin stong ba rnyed la ni gang la zhum par
'gyur ba dang/ gangazhum par 'gyur ba dang/ gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang yod pa ma yin te/ chos de ngag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid las rnam
dpar mi 'da' ba yin gyis/ khyodalus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed cing le lo spangs la/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos sbyin pa 'an/ tshul khrims sam/
bzodapa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ ting nge 'dzin tum/ shes rab bam/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par sngar nga dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/
dran ba nye bar gzhagakha rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dgagam 3stod pa nyid dam/ mtshanam med pa 'am/ smon pa med pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos thams cad kyi bar dag labartson par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid kyis chos de dag sgrib pa med par ltos shig dang/ slebe ba med pa'i chos rnamasal zhum par 'gyur ba
gang yang med do zhes/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas de ltar sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis stong pa
nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing/ 'dzul 'god par byed de/ ci nas kyang gnyis su med pa de ltar 'god par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni
gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ gnyis su med pa lani zhum par 'gyur ba gangayang med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan mngakhyang chub sems dpa' sems
sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can rnams rang bzhin gyes stong pa nyid kyi brtson 'grus la 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed de/ rigs kyi bu tshu shog
sprin pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa 'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ ting nge 'dzin tan/ shes rab bam/ dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams sa// 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa'i bar ram/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar ba dang/ ting de 'dzin dang/ soms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'am mi
'jigs pa bzhi 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba'i 'am/ byams pa chen po 'am/ sIr rje chen po 'am// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la brtson par
gyis la/ chos de dag la gnyis su'ang yid la ma byed cig/ gnyis ma yin par yang yid la ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ba ste/ bud
bzhin gyis stod pa la neganyis dang gnyis ma yin par yid la bya ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad ba spyod pa na sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ yongs su smin par byas nas kyang/ rim gyis rgyun du zhugs
[@#// pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed/ phyir mi 'o dba'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed/ dgra bcom pa nyid la/
'god par byed/ rang byang chub la 'god par byed cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rang 'god par byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dba' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don byed cad 3 ting nge 'dzin sgom pa la 'jug par byed de/
rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ khyod rnam par g.yeng ba'i 'du shes su'ang ma byed par ting nge 'dzin sgoms shig/ daci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa
ste rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni gang rnam par g.yeng ba 'am/ rtse gcig tu bya ba'i chos gang yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ khyod ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas shing ) rang
bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la spyod na ) lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid kyi dge ba'i chos gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ sbyin pa gtong ngam/ tshul khrims srung ngam/ bzod pa spyi/
bas brtson 'grus rtsom mam/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam ) shes rab sgom mam// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyod dam 'phags pa'i lam yon
lag brgyad pa'i bar dag sgom mam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu 'am/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'am/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dam/
skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sam/ dpe byadabazang po brgyad cu 'am/ nyan thos kyi lam mam rang sas rgyas kyi 'a ma ma ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam
mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam rang
byang chub bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenopa nyid sgom mam/ sems can yongs su smin par byed ngam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang rung ste 2 khyod kyis dge
ba'i chos de dag tshogs chung ngus grub par 'gyur ro zhes/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas bas
sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sems dang pobaskyed pa nas gzung ste/ nam du'ang byab ma yin pa mi byed par dge ba ci yin zhes tshol zhingo/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas
cad @#// bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos
zla gang thos pa de'ang bu na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs brjes su zinakyang nam du'ang chud mi za bar 'gyur zhing/
ga rtag tu gzungs 'thob pa 'am/ lus kyi dbang po'am/ ngag gi dbang po 'am/ yid kyi dbang po'ang rung ste/ dbang po rtul bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des
rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu bskyoms pa'i phyir te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide shin tu bsgoms pa des/ lam thams cad kyang shin
[@] tu bsgoms pa yin te/ nyan thos kyi lam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam mam/ sangs rgyas kyi lam dag kyang8shin tu bsnyegs pa yin no//
mngon par shes pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la chud mi za ba'i tshul gyis ldan par 'gyur ba de dag kyang shin tu bsgoms pa yin te/ de rnam par smin pa las
byung ba'i mngon par shes ba de dag la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi don byed do// 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang
[chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas te sems can rnams kyi don byed do/// rab 'byor
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen podashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid laganas nas/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams
kyi don byed de/ de shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pashin tu bsgoms pas/ sems can rnams la 'di skad 'doms shing rjes khu ston par byed de/ rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ khyod
lus sam/ ngag gam/ yid kyis las gang byed kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du so sor rtogs shig dang/ khyod kyi las de dag bdu cir 'gyur zhing/
bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang/ bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni gang mngon par zhen pa 'am/ yongasasu nyams par 'gyur ba'i chosagang yang dmigs su
med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur la/ rang bzhinagyis stodapa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos gang mang
med ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni dngos po'i rim yin/ dngos po med po'ang ma yin pa'i phyir te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
@#// chos rnams las ci zhig yongs sunyams bar 'gyur zhes ) ba 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen porashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de
ltarams can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston par byed de/ rang bzhin gyis stong ba nyid la 'dzud bar byed do// de de ltar 'doms shing/ de ltar rjes su ston pa dang//
rang bzhinagyis stong pa nyid la 'dzud par byed pa'i tsho/ nam du'ong bya ba ma yin pa mi byedade/ de bdagakyang rtag par rgyun du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin par byed la/
gzhan dag kyang dgib bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ de bzhin du bdag kyang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ) yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong gi bar dag
laganas bar byedal/ gzhan dgakyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ bdag kyang bsam gtan dang pol snyoms par 'jugal/ gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan dang po la
snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag la snyoms par 'jul la/ gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag la
snyoms par 'jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ de bdag kyang rtag par rgyun du byams pa la gnas pa yin zhing ) gzhan dag kyang rtag par rgyun du byams pa bsgom pa yang
dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ bdag kyang btang snyoms kyi bar dag sgom la// gzhan dag kyang btang snyoms kyi bar dag bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ bdag kyang 'du shes/
me da 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar dag la snyoms par 'jug la/ gzhan dag kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la
snyoms par ru jug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jugago/ bdagakyang dran banye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sgom la/ gzhan dag kyang dran ba nye bar gzhug pa bzhi bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du
'jug ste/ 'dul zhing 'dzung lagod par byed do// bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag skomal/ gzhanadag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i bar dag
bsgom pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slobal/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab pa yang dag pa 23 dzin
du 'jug ste/ 'dulazhing 'dzud la 'god par byed do// bdag kyang dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cu'i bar ga la sgrub pa la slobal/ gzhan dag kyang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu bsgrub pa yang/
dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste ) 'dul zhing 'dzud la 'god par byed do// bdag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'khrasaM bul shes pa skyed cing de la gnas par yang me tre tse ga0 ka
kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pal 'god par byed do// bdag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dag gingashes ba skyed cing ) de la gnas par me byed la/
gzhan dag kyang dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi shes pa la 'god par byed do// bdag kyang rang byang chub kyi shes pa skyed cing ) la gnas par mi byedal/ gzhan dogakyang 'ang byang chub kyi
shes pa la 'jul zhing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam skyed par byed la/ gzhan dag nga lamade lar domasashing rjes su
ston pa dang/ 'dul zhing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ 'ba' byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pathabs la mkhas pas nam du'ang
bya ba ma yin ba mi byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyisa'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin
gyis stong pa lags na/ rang bzhin gyis stong ba nyid la ni sems canayang mi dmigs/ chos dang lam yang ma dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen bo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
nya rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni sems can yang
dmigs su med/ chos dad lam yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stod pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bo rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas )rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi chos ston par nang mi
'gyur ba zhig na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong la ) rab 'byor tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis
stong sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong/ dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cu'ang rang bzhin gyis stong/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spyas pa'i bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rab 'byor gang gi phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong
ba de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pa bung po lnga po dag rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya ba'i chos ston to// skye mched
bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyadarang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar chos ston to// bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang )gzugs med pa'i
snyems par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dag rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar chos
ston to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba dgu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang//
ma 'i rigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ dpe byad bzang po
brgyad cu'i bar dag rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar chos ston to// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'brasa'u dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra
bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapanyid dang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar
chos ston to// rab 'abyor gal te nang stong ba nyid rang bzhin gyis stong pa ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya
0bar chos ston par ma 'gyural/ de bzhin du bu stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stod pa nyid dang 3 de bzhin du sbyor ste/ dngos po yod pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag rang bzhin gyis stod pa
ma yin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar chos ston par yang mi 'gyur te/de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa re
kyad bshig par 'gyur ba zhig na/ rang bzhin gyis stong ba nyid ni 'jig par yang mi 'gyurazhing/ ther zug tu gnas pa'ang ma yin te 2 phyes med par 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i
phyirazhe na/ de ni yul na me gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas shing/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin ) gang du'ang 'gro ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de ni chos gnas pa nyid yin te/ de
la ni 'phel ba 'am// 'grib pa 'am/ sogs pa 'am/ 'jig pa'am skyo ba nam/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nyon mongs pa 'am// rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yang dmigs
su med do// de ni chos rnamasakyi rang bzhin yin te/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
gnas kyang/ chos gang yang 'jig par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo// chos thams cad ni gnas pa med cing ) 'jig pa med pa ste/ de ni chos rnams kyi chos gnas
pa nyid yin no// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par/
mthong bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ de ci'i phyir zhen ) 'di ltar des chos gang la'ang sgrib ba'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/
des chos thams cad sgrib pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis stong ba nyid de la bdag mi dmig shing/ bdag tu 'dug sa par ng mi
dmigs la/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ skye ba po dang/ shed las skyes pa dang/ shid bu dang/ gso ba po dang/ gang zag dang/ byed pa po dang ) byed du 'jug pa
podang 1 slong ba po dang/ kun nas slong ba po dang/ tshor ba po dang/ shes pa po dang ) mthong ba po'ang mi dmigs/ mthong ba por gdags pa'ang mdamigs/ gzugs dang
tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang ) 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang mi dmigs/ rnam par shes par gdags pa'ang mi dmigs/ de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos
rnams kyang mi dmigs/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag kyang mi dmigs ) dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur gdags pa'ang mi dmigasan/ bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshum bya bar 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas sprul pa'i dge slong ngam/ ) dge slong ma 'am/ dge
bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma zhig la/ bskal pa khrag khrig snyed du rgyun ma chad par chos bstan par gyur na/ rab 'byori'adi ji snyamedu sems/ sprul pa de dag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i
'bras bu 'thob pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'brasabu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa 'am/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i skal ba yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la dngos
pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// chos thams cad dngos po med pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos gang zhig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid ngam/ 'ang byang
chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzud par bya ba'i sems can yang gang zhig yod de/ gzhan du na phyin ci log gis kun nas dkris pa'i skye dgu rnams
phyin celog med pa la 'dzud cing 'gog par byed do// rtog pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ phyin celdog gang yin pa de nyid phyin ci log ma yin pa ste/ rtog pa mad
cing phyin ci log med pa'o// gang la phyin ci log med pa de la ni bdag med do// sems can med do// shes pa po dang/ ma shong ba po 'i bar dug med do// de la ni gzugs med do//
tshor ba med do// 'du shes med do// 'du byed rnams med do// rnam par shes pa med do// de bzhin du sAr te/ byang chub kyi bar dag med do// gang la bdag med pa dang/
shes pa po dang/ mthong ba por bar dag med pa dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ tshor ba med pa dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ 'du byed rnams med pa dang/ rnam par shes
pa med pa dang/ byang chub kyi bar dag med pa de ni rangabazhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
cing sems can phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams sems can gyi 'du shes las grol bar byed do// gzugs kyi 'du shes dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyi bar dag las grol bar/
byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te[） ]zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams las rnam par grol bar byed do// zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag kyang ) 'di lta ste/
mtha3 dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhidang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phagasu/
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de'ang de la don dam pa ji lta ba bzhin
du ni ma yin no// de ltar 'dus ma byas dang/ ma skyes pa dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stod pa nyid yin no// de ni sangs rgyas ga[u0f7c ]ma ldan/
'dasa rnams kyi byang chub yin te ) de labadag medado// sems can med do// shes pa po dang/ mthong ba po'i bar dag med do// gzugs med do// tshor ba med do//
'du shes med do// 'du byed rnams med do// rnam par shes ba med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag med do// byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de yongs su shes par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par/ lam gyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par mi nyung
do/ gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de'ang sngon gyi mtha' ya phabazhin gyis stong ba nyid yin la/ de ni phyi ma'i mtha' dang/ dbus su'ang 'od bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin te/ de ni
la'u/ nam ang rang bzhin gyis mi stong pa nyid ma yin no// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa
la gnas na// sems can rnams sems can du 'du shes pa dang/ 'du shes thams cad las dgrol ba'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sprod par byed do// de lam gyi
rnam pa'8shes pa nyidal spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi lam dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang/ lam thams cad la'ang spyod
pa yin no// rab 'byo'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ sems can rnams ngas su smin par byas shing
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rtogs pas nga la 'tshong rgyu'o//
de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi za/ khyod rdo 'di lta ste ba zhin gyis stong pa nyid 'di ni
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yin no// rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dge 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa de sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin gyis stod pa nyed 'a de yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams dang/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs
rgyas kyi tshul yang 'di lta ste rang bzhan gyis stong pa nyid 'di yin te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las byung ba ma gtogs pa'/ gzhan
las 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyod na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bde ltar
rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa ! bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/
rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la spyod la/ gzugs kyang gzhan zhing 3 rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma la gas/ tshor ba'ang gzhan/ 'du shes kyang gzhan/ 'du byed rnams kyang
gzhan ) rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan zhing/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags la/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang byang chub kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhing/
[g ]/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags la/ bang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang gzugs lags shing/
byang chub kyi bar nyid kyang rang bzhin gyis stongapa nying lags la/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyang byang chub lags par/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de'ang rnam par 'khrugs par ma bgyid

shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yin la/ rang bzhin gyis stong banyid kyang rnam par shes pa nyid yin/ byang chub kyi bar dag kyang

nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rang bzhin gyis stong panyid la ni rnam par 'jig pa 'am/ ther zug
