snyad gang yin pa 'du ni rnam par btags pa'i gzugs so// 'dani rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba'o// 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i 'du shes so// 'dodig ni rnam par
btags pa 'i 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni rnam par btags pa'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'di dag ni rnam par btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 7bar dag go/ gang de
(bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yod rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yod rung ste/ chosanyid 'di niganas pa nyid dang/ chos gnas pa 'i dbyangs
dang gang kun btags nga 'i gzugs de rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang/ thar zugs ther zug gi dus su de ba 3de med pa kho na dang/ chos la bdag med
ba dang/ de bzhin nyidi dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'ad ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so// 'dano chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'o//
'di dag ni chosad kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag go/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das gzugs gsum po 'di deg las/ rjes su ma mchis pa lta ba'i gzugs ni gang lags/ rdzas sumachis pa ni gang lags/rdzasu ma mchis pa'ang ma 'a gas la/
rdzas su mchis pa'ang ma lags shing/ don dam pas rab tu phye ba ni gang lags/ tshor ba gsum po 'di dag dang/ 'du shes gsum po 'di dag dang/ 'du byed gsum po 'di dkad
dang rnam par shes pa gsum po 'di dog dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gsum po 'di dag lasadz+dzas su ma mchis pa dgan gang lags/ rdzas mchis pa dag ni gang
lags/ rjes su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/ rdzas su mas pa 'ar ma las shang/ don dam pas rab tu phye ba ngagan gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa// bums pa dang kun tu brtags nga 'i gzugs de nas sumed par blta bar bya'o// rnam par btags pa'i
gzugs gang yan pa de ni/ rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa'i phyir rdzasasu yod par blta bar bya ste// rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yanin// gang chos nyid kyi thugs de nas/
su med pa 'ang ma yani/ rdzas suyod pa'ang ma yin zhing/ denadam pas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o// gang kun btogs pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
rnam par shes pa dang/ gang dag kun btags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi b.ru de dag na rdzas su med ra ra pal+labs bya'o// gang rnam par btags pa'i tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ gang dag rnam par btags pa' sangs kyi chos rnams kyi par de dag ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas su yod pa 'a phyi'i rdzas yod par blta
par bya ste/ rang dbang du 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// byams pa gang chosanyid kyi tshor ba dang/ 'du shas dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ byams pa
ka shubya// gang dag chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar de dag nirdzas su med pa'ang ma ya'il/ rdzas su yod pa'ang ma yin zhing/ don dam pas rab tu bye bar
blta bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs bab
wA (tu dbye ba'i btags pa'ang mchis la/ de ltar tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byuda rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba'i
btags pa'ang mchis na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya bden gnyis su med nga 'o grangs su byas pa'o// 'di lta ste/ tshor ba zhes bya ba dang 'du shes shes bya ba dang/
ny+nyo 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang/ rnam bar shes pa zhes bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyichos rnams shes bu ba'i bar 'dra naganyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes ! bcom
ldan 'das kyis gangakhaka' stsal pa de bcom ldan 'das kyici ladagongs nas/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de na gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di lta ste/ tshor
tshu bzhes bya ba dang/ 'du shes shes bya ba dang/ 'du byed rnams shes bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bar zhes bya ba de na gnyis su med
pa'i grangs su byas pa'ozhes bka' stsal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bka' stsal pa/ khyams pa 'di rje
snyam du sems/ kun btags pa'i gzugs la rdzas su med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs yin nam/ 'on te ma yin/ gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das den mi lags so//
de la gzugasashes bya ba'i mang dang/ 'du shes dang/ btags pa dang/ tha snyad tsamanyidi gang yin pa de dza ga gzugs yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcomaldan 'das dan ma
lags se// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis gang kun btags pa'i gzugA da gzugs kyang ma yin la/gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/gdagazugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma
yin pabang ma yin pa de na gnyis su med pa ste/ ngas 'di las dgangasanasa'adi lta ste/ gzugs shes bya pa da ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig pa rabya'o//
byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la brten nas gardzugs shes bya pa'i mang dang/ btags pa dang/ tha snyad du 'gyur ba rnam par btags pa'i gzugs rdzas su yod pa
nyid gang yin pa de jagi gzugs ma yin pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na ma lags so// byams pa 'di jisnyam du sems/ rnam par btags pa'i
(gzugs de nyid la kun btags pa'i gzugs des de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin zhing/ de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de gzugs yin nam/ lus
btsam ldan 'das de ni ma lags s/ dbyams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar gang rnam par btags pa'i gzugs de'ang gzugs kyang ma yin la/ gzugs la ya ni pa'
ma yin te/ gang gzugs kyang ma yinal/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa dganyisasu med pa ste/ des de las dgongs nas/ 'dalta ste/ ba b+ha ma ka sa sa
'tshe ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par rig par bya'o// byams pa 'di jo snyam du sems/ gang chos cha di kyi gzugs bdag med pas rab tu phyi pa
ts+tshA gzugs rdo jag gzugs yazhinam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de na ma lags so// chos nyid kyi gzugs de nyid kyi gtsugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa na/[']
yani pa de yin nam/ gsol pa/ ! bcom ldan 'das da na ma lags so// byams pa rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de'ang ba/ khrugs kyang sku
gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/gagazug kyang ma yin la/ gzugs ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa de gnyis su med pa ste/ ngos de las dgongs nas/ 'ad/ su :
gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes bka' stsal par ragi par bya ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par
shes dpa dang/ sangs rgyasakyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar tharabya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// de ltar gzugs la gnyis su ma mams pa'i mtshan de la mkhas
shing de ltar tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mkhas pa mtha'
gnyis spangs nas/ dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa'i yongasasu 'tshal ba'i mtshan nyid na ji ltabu/ sbyong ba'i mtshan nyid ni ji lta bu / mngon sum du bgyid pa'i mtshan nyidan ji lta bu //
bsgom pa'i mtshan nyiden ji lta bu'i blta bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dang 'khyams pa la bka' stsalar// byams
pa byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtha' gnyis spangs nas/ 'di ltar dbu ma'i lam du zhugs pas gang gzugs yosasu shes pa'ang ma yani/ yod sa
su ma shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa 'o// gang tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ sas rgyas
kyi chos rnams kyi bar du yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/ yongs sumapishes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid da'i yongs su shes pa// gang gzugs sbyong ba'ang ma yin/ masdong bar/
ma yin pa de nyid de'i srid ba'o// gang tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du sprad pa'ang ma yin/
masnyed pa'ang ma yanapa de nyid pa'i stong ba// gang gzugs spyod ba mngon sum du'ang ma byadal/ mngon sum du mi byed pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o//
gang gzugs smad pa'i phyir lam sgom pa'ang ma yin/ ma sgom pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
zlu: par shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bya'o// deskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dnga'akhyoms pas
N+NaM 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub semasadapo' shes rab kyi pha rol tu na ba laspyod pa/'di lta bu yongs su'atshal ba dang/ sbyong dang/ mngon sumadubatsad pa
dad sgom pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la bka' stsal pa//
byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyamya dan las 'das pa ni bal po// mchog tu zab bo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ltar rdzapa pa dang/ mchog tu rdzas pa lags ! bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi mu dan las 'das pa ni/ 'daltar mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yani/ mya ngan las ma 'dasala'ang
ma yon to ro'ar thapa pa dang/ mchog tu rngab pa zhes bya'o// daskad rtsos bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dang 'khyams pa 'di skad ces gsol tu/ bcom
ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chung san sa dang 'a rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma lags/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
ba[”]/lta su'ang/ byams pa gzhan gyi don las btsamasata/ 'khor ba yo sasu mi gtod pas mya ngan las 'das pa 'ad ma yin/ bdag gi don las btsams te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ma
gtong bas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'angam yan no// de skad ces po' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dusal/ byang chub sems dang 'a byams ra sa 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don lasaratsams te/ 'khor ba yodas sumi gtong na/ de'akhor ba yongs su ma gtong bas/ 'dis ji ltar ngan
t+tA las 'dus pa yongs su gtang bar ma'agyur/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi don las btsanas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa yodas su ma gtong na/ 'dis ji
ltar 'khor ba yongs su gtang ba ba ma 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
'khor ba la'ang 'khor ba nyid du rnam par ma rtog/ mya ngan las 'das nga la'ang mya ngan las 'dus pa nyid du rnam par rtog ste/ de de ltar rnam par ma rtog pas/ 'di lta ste/
'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de dag mnyam pas mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de 'khyer ba las 'khor ba nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas/ 'khur ba las
byung bar ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin dumya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mya nganalas 'das pa nyid du ma rtog pasaM/ mya ngan las 'das pa las nyams par yang ma 'gyur te// da bzhani/
du 'kher ba na'ang ma nyams so// de ltar rnam par ma rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa de rag pa 'dis 'khor ba'ang yodas su ma gtang la/ mya ngan las 'das pa cad yongs su mi gtong
bar rig par bya'o// de sladaces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan das 'o na byang chub
sams dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnamar ram rtog pa'i dbyangs la gnas pas/ 'khor ba ji ltar ma nga tang ba de ltar blangs pa 'ang ma mchis shing/ mya ngan 5sa 'das
ja ra ma btang ba de ltar drangs pa yang ma mchis par ma 'gyur lags sam ! bcom ldan 'das gal te byung pa ma mchis pa dzaltar ma btang pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal nga/ byams pa nga na 'di ltar 'khor ba len te zhu 'am/ ma yin te zhes ma sna'i// byams pa 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par ma
rtog pa'i dbyings la dmags pa'i ye shes kyis sems la dbang thob pa// thabs la mkhas pas 'khor ba bstan pa'i pa'i/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'dzag rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor ba yongs su ma gtang ba'o zhes nga sma'o// stong pa nyidi midamags pa'i dbyangs 'gonas
pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ma gtong ba'o zhes nga sna'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
byams pas 'daskad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma rtog pa'i mtshan nyidi 'dus par dza ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams
pa gzugs gang yin pa dang/ tshor ba gang yin pa dang/ 'du shes gang yin pa dang/ 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos rnams kyi bar du gang yin pa dad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang/ chos de dag dang/ stod pa 'di de'i dngos pa dang dngos po med pa
gang yin pa dang/ sngos pa med pa gang yin pa de na/ byams pa rnam par mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dus pa na blta'o// de skad ces bka' sul pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la
byang chub sems dang 'khyams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adus rtsanyan thos chos thams cad gacig tu nges par gtan du mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags sam/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa de na ma yin na// da ci'i phyir zhin/ byams pa 'jig rtan 'dan khams sna tshogasal/ khams du ma pa ste// khams
sna tshogs pa// khams du ma pa'i 'jig rten de na sems can gyi rogs dang/ rang bzhin mad du dmags te/ byams ra gang thog ma danas pazang po' bye brug don du gnyen te/
bzang po' bye brag nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu 'ang yod/ gang theg ma 'dunas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te/ dman pa nyid theb la/ de nyid kyis
chog par 'dzan pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa de lta bu 'ad yod/ gang thog mnyi nas dman pa'i bye brag don du gnyer te dman pa nyid blos: shAnapar shes nas/ 3 de sa chog par
ma'adzan gyi ! da'i 'og tu bzang po'i bya drug chol zhing/ bzang po thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bye brag de lta bu 'ad yod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang ! bcom ldan
'dasal/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'dir ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasasems can rnams kyi rigs rnam pa gsum pa gang lags pa de dgra bcom pa nyid thong nas
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzordzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer kyang/ skye ba ma mchis pa ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ bsgrub pa nyidi de'i skye ba lags par na/ bcom ldan dus kyis bka' ma
stsal pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa de'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gi 'gyur bar ni nga na ma 'dogs kyis/ de'i skye ba bsam gyis mi/
[r ]// khyab pa dang/ sprul pa dang/ yongs su bsngos pa 'o zhes 'dogs sa// de skad ces bka'astsam pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
byams ra sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'daltar thogamanyidi nas bzad pa'i phyi bragadan du gnyer zhing bzang ba'aphyi braganyid thob par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
san sa dpa' chen pa'i bsam pa rlabs po che dang/ che ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni de ma tshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das khyang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyi bsam pa rlabs pa chen
gang lags/ cha ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa byang chub sems dpa'a rnams brgya byani tIdi dang/ tshangs pa dang/
'jig rten skyong ba nyid dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ba nyidi thams cad dang/ 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thums cad don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ de dag la ma chags shing ma 'dzan pa 'di
ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa rlabs po che'o// byang chub soms dang 'a rnams 'di lta ste/ 'du byed yongs su mgatong bas de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang/ 'dzan
ba med pa'i bde ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du bya bar 'dod cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo bar byed pa gang
yan pa 'di nadi dag gi che ba nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam par blta bar bya'o// de skad ces ba ka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'i chos rnams ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags so// byang chub sems dang ldi paslab pa ni ngo mtsha2 rnad du byung ba lags so//
bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ ragasakyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba rnams slob par 'tshal bas/ bla na med pa khang du dag par T+Tha'os pa'i byang chub
tu sems bskyed par bgyi lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyan pa khri brgyud stod pa las 3 byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnapa dbu ba'i le'u zhes bya stang rgya chu rtsa gsum pa'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor bzhi pa de dag yang dag par nang du dga' bar mdzad pa'i phor dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston snying/
de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// dga' dang gus dang dod pa mchog 'dir gzhan ste/ sgrib pa nyon mongasajim bsal nas bzhi bas )'gro don mngon bzhus sadas
nga li shes rab dang 'olaspyan// gad 'a dang 'a rnams spyod pa de namanyan par gyis// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chu klung ji snyed 'bab pa dang// ma nges gnas ra'i klu dbang klu btul pa/ pardzun nas/
ma tog 'bras bu sman dang nags tshal skyed byed de// de ni klu bdag de yi dpal gyi mthu yin no// rgyal ba'i nyan thos pa dag ji snyed chosaston dang// 'chad ring 'gi
pa dag dang ldan par brjod pa dang/ dbad pa mchog dang byed dang de yi 'bras thob pa// de dag kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes pa'i mthu// ci'i phyir zhe na rgyal pas chos tshul gang
bstan pa// de la mi mchog slob mar gyur pas mngon bslabs shing// mngonasum byas nas bslabs pa ji bzhin ston byed de// sangs rgyas mthus byed rang gi stobs dang ma thus ma yin//
gang la shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mu dmagis shing// byang chub sems dang 'a ma dimags byang chub sems mdamags// de skad thos nas rmos pa med cing ma skag pa//byang chub sems
dpa' de na bde gshegs shis rab spyod// gzugs med tshor ba med cing 'du shes sems pa med// de la rnam shes gnas kyi rdulatsanam snyed pa// dwan chos kun m gnas gnas mod rgyu ba ste/
yongs su gzung med bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub shog/ de nas kun tu rgyu bcazo sbangs phyi rol// phung pa rnam par 'jag rung shes la dmigs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'
gang zhig de ltar chos shasashang// mya ngan 'das par ma ga de ni shis rab gnas/ (gzhan yang shes rab 'di nigang yanagang ga phyir// gang las 'byung zhes chos 'di thams cad stong par
[/ ]rtog nya bar brtags nas zhum pa medatsang skyag med pa// byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub nye ba yin// gal tam shes bzhin du gtsugs dang 'du shes dang/ ! tshor pa sams ra/
rnam shes phung por spyod byed cing/ phunga'adi stong zhes yongs rtog byang chub sems dpa' ni// mtshan mar spyod de skyemed gnas la sngog ma yin/ gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes sems
pa dang// rnam pa shes pa ma spyod gnas med gang rgyu ba// shes rab bstanadaskyed ces khas lenam cid de//skye med blo yasazhi ba'i dpe'adzin mchog la reg/ byang chub sems dpa' de
lta 2ba zhi 'di'i gnas te// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstan yani// bdag ni ma nyam nga ragazhagaces 'am 'a sa shas rlom se na sa na da// na phyir zhe na don ches
rang ngazhin yongs shes phu'i// de ltar stod na bde gshegs rnams kyi shes zab spyod// de phyed dwang maspyod rab tu shes pas na// chos gang spyod pa de yang dmigs par ma 'gyur te/ 'di
nibs rab pa rol pa na pa'i spyod mchog yani// gang zhig yod pAm yin de na med ces bya/ byas pa rnamasakyis de brtags med dang yod pa bcud:/ yod dang med pa 'di
gnyis med pa'i chos yin to// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dashes de nges 'byung// gang 'dir phung po lnga dag sgyu ma 'di'i shes shing// skya ma gzhan dang phung po gnas chu
ma byed la// sna tshogs 'du shes bral zhing nye bar zhi spyod pa// de shes na pa pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// dge ba'i bshes dang ldan zhing lhag
mthong ldan gyur pas// rgyal ba rnams kyi yum thos skyag pa yongs ma 'gyur// gang zhagasnag pa'i grogs ldan gzhan gyi drang 'jog nga// de ni snod sa ma gtang chus reg nug
pa bzhin// ci phyir 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bya zhe na// chags pa 'a byed pa kun la chags pa gcod 'dod pas/ rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub chags med rgyus la reg/ des
na 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i mang 'thob bo// ci'i phyir de nasems dang 'a chozhes bya zhen// 'dan sims can phung po chen pa'i mchog 'gyur dang// sems can khams kyi lta gyur
chen nga gcod pa ste// de phyir 'di nasems dpa' che zhes brjod pa yin// gtong ba che dang blo cha ba dang mthu che dang// rgyal bo rnams kyi thig chen mchog la zhugs pa dang// bdud
kyi g.yo sgyu gdul phyir go cha che bgos pa// de yi phyi na sems da nga 'a chazhes brjod pa yin// dpe can sgyu ma mkhan gyis bzhi mdor sprul byas te// skye ba phal che mgo mang bye ba gcod
par byed// sgyu ma tsa'adra de 'drar sems canade kun shes// 'gro kun sbrul pa 'dra bar de la 'dzags po med// gzugs dang 'dushes tshor ba dang ni sems ba dang// rnam par
shes pa ma bcings ma grol yod pa man// de ltar byedachub 'jugatsang zhum pa'i sems med pa// 'di ni gang zag dam pa rnams kyi chama'o/ su phyir rAd nga ba theg che sa
zhe na de na gang zhan sems can thams cad mya ngan zlo// theg pa 'di ni gzhal med khang chen nam mkha' mtshungs// dga' skyaraM ba na sa thog bye bra ga ma chog zhen
nas gang zhig phyogs su 'gro ba ste ma de mgas// mya ngan 'das par 'gro bar gsungs na 'gro na dmags// dper na na sha de yi 'graphyogs rgyu sa sa gzhan dang ba dan gyi ngan 'das shas
brjod pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar yang// byang chub sems dpa' ma de gis dus gsum dag pa ste// gang dang de nas da sa yan spros med de: 'di ni
shes rab pha rol byin pa'i spyod mchog yin// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang tshagang dus na// skye ba med par bsams te de ltasaM bdud tshesna'apha7 pa sems
can 'du shes med/ 'don shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yan// gal te sems can 'du shes sngag bsngal 'du shasaskyod dolcag bar nad+d+hA spru[%]nga 'gro ba 'am sta/
bdag dang sems can yong rtog byang chub semasadapa' ste//'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'phyid ma yini/[“]bdag ca'adra ba de 'drar ris thams rtsodapa sems canaThams
da/ cad rtsa 'dra de 'drar chos kun shes// skye ba med dang skye ba gnyis kar ma rtog pa// de na shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// 'jig rten dag na chos
mang dza snyid yongs brjod pa// skye ba kun las yang dag 'das shing thal byas nas// 'chi med ye shes mchog thob de la gzhal med do// de phyir 'ad ni shes rab pha rol phyin nas
sgyu bya byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig dogs med 'deltar spyod/ dad ni thabs dang shes rab gnas ra ra nas ra ra bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med par yongs su shes gyur pa// 'di ni
shesarab pha rol phyin ba'i spyod mchog an// gang zhagi gadrugs lam gnas tshor la ma gnas shang// gang zhig 'dushes ma gnas sams par ma gnas la// rnam shes gang mi gnas
zla pachos nyid ma gnas te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'ispyod mchog yin// rtag dang ma rtog bde dang sdug bsngal sngagam sdug/ bdag dang bdag med de bzhin nyid dang stong 'di dang//
'bras bu thob dang dgra bcomasal mganas shing// rang rgyal sa dang sangs rgyas sa la ma gnas te// jaltarasnyene pa 'dus ma byas khams ma gnas shing// de bzhin 'dus byas la
yang sa gnas gnas med rgyu// de ltar byang chub semasadapa' gnas la gnas med gnas// gnas med gnas yana'adan rgyalabasaganas shes gsungs// gang dag bde gshegs kun
thes 'gyur bar bya snyam dang// rang sangs rgyas dang chos rgyal 'gyur bar byed 'dod pa/ bzed pa 'di lam brten thob par ma nus te// dper na phel tshu le na kyi dgas pa
bzhin// gang zhig chos nyid 'gro dang gang bshad thos pa dang// 'bras bu thub dang rang rgyal de bzhan 'jag rten mgon// mkhas pa gsal bumya ngan 'ad000 ba 6 pa
thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas sras su gas+sags// gang phrag bzhi pod dag de la ma skrag ste// rgyal sras bdenal mkhas dang phyag ma ldog pa dang// dgra btsom sa sa[:/:]kyang
som nyirti spangs pa dang// dge ba'i bshes kyis yongs su smani byas bzhi pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de ltar byed pa ni// dgra bcom sa ma slob rgyan rtag ra ma
sleb thams cad mkhyen nyidi chad dusangs rgyas chos la slob// bslab pa ma slob tshul rgyas slob pa de bslab yani/ gzugs 'phel ba dang yongs 'bri yo ga ba na
sna tshogs chosa rnams yongs su gzung pa'i bslab pa mazhi// de ltar slob pa thams cad mkhyenanyidi yongs 'dzanatsang/ ngos 'byung 'dra ni yin tun dga' ba'i bslab pa yan/ la thunapa
nishes rab m yin gzugs pa shes rab med// tshor dang 'du shes sems dang 'a dag dang rnam par shes// 'di dag shes rab m yin dkar shes rab med/ ba[， ]1
bu@#// mtshungs tha dad yod ma yin// dmagos pa rnams kyi rang bzhin de ya pha mthur med// sems can bad bzhin gang yand yang pha mtha' med// nam mkha'i
khams kyi rang bzhin de yang pha mtha' med// 'jig rten mkhas nga 'i shas rab de yang pha mtha' med// 'du shas tshu rol yin zhes 'dren pas yongs su bsgrags// rnam shes
rnam par shaganasasbeng ba pha rol 'gro// gang dag de la 'du shes bral ba rjes thob pa// de dag pha rol phyin nas ston pa'i bka'al gnas// gal te gabya'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal
bzhugs te// ston pa 'du yas sems can zhes bya'i sgra brjod kyang// gcod nas dgapa'i sems can skye ba ga la yod// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i skyedamchogayi//
gang tshe nga ni shes rab pha rol phyani' da dang// mthun par sma gyurade tsho ldan gyi skyes mchog gas// ma 'ongs nga yi dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes// dul lungobastan rgyud ces
rgyal ba de skad gsungs/ shes rab pha rol phyin gang mgon po rnams snod nga// 'don gang zhig rtags 'dzan kun tu chus byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang me dang chus mtshugs//
bdud dang nga dud kyi phyogs kyis sgrags kyang rod ma'agyur// la las bad pa/ shegs yongs su mya ngan 'das pa po// mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod khyad la//
[re ]bud gshegs mchod rten gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// de dag rnams kyis bye ba phrag stodazhing bkang ste// yongs su brtag gzung zhing rnams bye ba mthob yas na// sems can ji/
snyad 'khodapa de dag thamasad kyis// las gzhan ma byed lha ya ma tog sdes rang dang// drug pas dus gsum bskul pa'am de bsag mchod la// gang zhig gang las
rnam 'drenaskabs bcu 'byung 'gyur ba// bde bar gshegs pa'i yum 'di glegs bamadras byas te// 'chang zhang me tog byug pas bsta stang byed gyur na// mchod rten byas mchod
bsod nams des na charam yod// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rig sngagasan// sems can khams mang mya ngan sdug bsngal ches zhi byed// gang dag 'das dang gang dag thugs
bcu'i 'jig rten mgon// rig sngags 'di bslabasasman pa 'irgyal po bla med gyur// gang dgakhan dang snying brtse bcas ba spyod spyod pa// rig sngags 'di bsubs nas ma khasang byas
chub reg/ 'dus byas bde dang 'dus ma byas bde gang yAn pa// bde ba de kun 'adi las 'byung bar ga par bya// sa bon btabanas sa la gnas nas 'byung 'gyur ba// tshogs pa/
rod nas rnam mang gadzugs dag rnam par bskyod// pha rol phyin lnga byang chub yon tan ji snyed pa// de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol ni lasaskye// 'khor lo sgyur rgyu lam dang
nas na rtag 'gro ba/ lam de nyidi nas rani chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun// grang nas rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di 'gro// de nyid nas na yon tan/
chos kun 'gro bar 'gyur/ rgyal pas brgya byan dra bayodas selAn gsal pa// gal te gang+ga'i klung ga byed snyed sangs rgyas zhing gyur la// de kun rgyal ba'i rong bsal byur bur
bltams gyur kyang// bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyidi lan// casmad tsi nusku gdung mi shus bodag ma lags/ 'on kyang shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas mchod pa'i 'gyur/
dang 'a na rgyal re rten ma rim gro kun theb ltar// sangs rgyas range bsel shes rab ra ri la phyin la brtan// nor bu 'an chen yon tan kun ldan rini tang mad// gab tsho gang du sul bar
na phyag bgyi 'os// de phyung rgyur kyang gab rtse la ni dga' bgyid de// yon tan de dag nor bu rin chen de ya lags// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin mchog yon tan gyis/ rgyal nga
mya ngan 'das pa'i dri bsrel mtshon pas brnyes// de ltas gang zhig rgyal pa'i yon tan 'dzan btsal des// shes rab pha la phyin pa 'di ni zab pa lags// smon pa sbyin pa'i sngon
du 'gro ba shes rab ste// tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin no// dge chos rgyud ma gsan par yongs su 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni chos rnams rnams
0 cad tshul gcig ston par byed// dper na 'dzam bu gling na shang mang bye ba stong// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ba rdzogs ldan pa// grib mar gyur pa'i grangs su brjod
pa ma gtogs par// grab ma sna tshogs med tsang bye brag yod ma yin// de bzhin rgyal pa'i pha rol phyin lnga 'di dag kyang// shes rab pha rol phyin pas yongs su bskos gyur te
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir yongs su bsdos byas na// byang chub bsngos bus drug kun 'da'i na tshul gcig gyur// byang chub sems dpa' galate yodas su ma shis bzhin//
gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba sems dang rnam par shes// ma rtag yongs su brjod pa chos la spyod pa ste// mkhas pa nam yang chos rnams chud gsan ma byed do// gang la
gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma dmags shing// rnam par shes pa dag dang sems pa ma dmigs la// chos kun skye med stod nga 'i tshul du ra ba shes pa// 'di na shis rab pha rol
phyin nga 'i spyod mchog pa ni// ga 'i klung gi bye snyed zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de snyedasems can la las dgra bcom 'di btul bas// gang gis shes rab pha rolakhyan 'ad yig
bris te/ tse/ sems can gzhan la thogs byin bsod nams khyad par 'phags/ su phyi'i zhe na skya mchog de dag 'dir bslabs nas// chos rnams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du 'di
ston byed// du thos nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg/ rang rgyal byang chub dang na sangs rgyas byang chub re ga/ lcag ma med par stod 'byung 'jig
rten yong med na// de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras bu ga la 'byung// byang chub sems medargyal 'byung 'jig rten yod medan// 'bras bu brgya byini tshangs pa nyan thos gal 'byung/
nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dra ba brgyad// de tshesems cano las byed brtson pa de bzhin du// mkhaMs nga 'a shis phyi'i 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis nasems can
yon tan chos dang ldan// dper na ma dros mtsho la bdag med gyur pa na// chu klung 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i 'bab par ga la 'gyur// chu klung med na mi tog 'dras bu 'byung ma'agyur//
rgya mtsho la yang rin chen gzugs mang med par 'gyur// de bzhin 'di'i yang byang chub sems med bde gshegs kyi// ye shes 'jig rten 'ad dog kun tu ga la 'byung// ya shes/
med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub med// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di'i srin bu me khyer ji snyed pa// kun gyis snang bar bya phyi'i 'od
rnams phyung ba bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gcig phyung ches mchog ste// me khyer tshogs kyi 'od rnams kun gyis char mi phod// nyan thos tshogasa rnams dzisnyid sbyin dang tshul
khrims dang// sdom dang rab tu ldan pa'i nga sod nams bskyed pa yang// byang chub sems dpa' rjes su ya rang sems gnag la// nyan thos tshogs kyi bsod nams phung nge sa char/
mi phod// 'das dus sngan gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang// zhing mang mtha' yas dag na bye stong gang zhugs dang// gang yang m donu'adas pa 'jagi rten mgon po rnams //
sdug bsngal zad par par rani chen chos ston to// dang po byang chub mchog tusam spyadang skyod pa nas// rnam par 'drin pa rnams kyi dam chos rbad kyi dus// de bar rgyal ba de dag bsod
nams gang yin pa// pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas gang dag dang// gang yang sangs rgyas srasa rnams dang ni na thos dang// slob dang ma slob dgo ba zag bcas zag med pa//
bsdus nas byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yarang byad// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub rgyu phya'i thams cad sde// yongs bsngo gal te sems dang 'du shes gnas byed cing// byang chub 'du
shas yongs bsngosems can 'du shes pa// 'du shes dang nalta bas soms gsum ldan par gnas// dmags pa yod pas yongs su bsdos par chud ma yan// galate 'di'i
chos rnams 'gags shing zad ra dang// gang du mngos su bsngo ba de yang zad pa dang/ chos kyis chos la nam yang ma bsngo shes gyur na// de ltar rab tu shis pas yongs su bsngosaM
ma @#// pa yin// gal te mtshan mar byed na de nibasngo ma yin// rtsa sa mtshan ma med na byang chub bsngo ba yani/ ji ltar dug dang 'dres ba'i kha sa bzang za ba//
dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs// de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo ba bslabaca ste// ji ltar rgyal ba de dag dag khar rab mkhyen pa'i// rnam pa gang
wA dang 'byung gang mtshan nyid gang yan la// rjes su yi rang de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo// daltar bsod nams byang chub yongs su sa byed na/ dug med sangs rgyas pa la khams pa ma
sbyong rgyalangs gsungs pas// de ltar yongs bsngo dpa' bo 'jig rten dmigs can gyi// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de yis zil gyis gnon// dmus long dmagis bu med pa
bya ba khrag khrig rnams / de lam yang ma zhus grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur// shes rab med na mag mud pa 'al phyin la 'ad// dmags bu med pas byang chub chog par nus ma
yan gang tshe shes rab kyis na rab tu rngan gyur na// de dag mag red gyur cing 'di dag mang thob bo// dper nar mo'i lasan yongs zani mug med pa// mig ma byas pas de tsho sman pa
mthob bzhin// gang tsho 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang dkar nag chos// shes rab rnam par zhig nas rdul tsam mi dmigs tsho// 'dzag rten dag na shes 'thapha rol phyin grangs 'gro//
nam mkhar gar ma gnas pa ci yang med pa bzhin// gal te bdag ni rgyal pa'apishes ra ba sbyad bya zhing// sams can sdug bsngal rig pa khrag khrig mang skyel sems// sams can
'du shes yongs brtags byang chub sems dpa' ste// 'di ni shes rab sel phyin pa 'i spyod mchog yin// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon spyad spyod pa 'tshe// ma de la phyin
'dor spyad pa mkhas ba soma'amed// thos ma thag tu de ni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed// de yabyang chub zhi ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur// sngon spyod tshon sangs rgyas khrag khrig bkur
byasu spyod// rgyal ba'ishes rab rol phyin la ma dad na// de nadaparan tshong pa rin chen gang song la// thodro rnams zad par byas nas phyir ldog byed dang mtshungs// de lta bas nagal
te sangs rgyas ye shes mchog/ reg par 'dod na rgyal ba'i yuma'adi'i dad par gyis// thos nas blachung gang zhig 'ad ni snang byed pa// de spong nas na mnar med 'gro sa skyabs med 'gyur//
gzugs kyi dag pa'abras bu'i dag par rug par bya// 'dus bu gzugs dus thams cad mkhyen nyid dgu par gsungs// thams cad mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag pas gzugs kyang
dag nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs shing gcad med dbye ba med// dpa' bo shes rab ra rol phyin pa 'di'i spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum yang dag 'das gyur cing//
nyon mongs bsal bar gyur kyang skye ba ston par byed// rga dang na dang 'chi ba med kyang 'tsha'apho ston// 'gro ba 'di dag 'dod mang gzugs kya'adam la thogs// til
gyisa'akher lalta bu'i 'khor ba'i 'kher ler 'khyam// 'gro ba 'khrul pa ni dgas rgya 'du shes gyur na// shes rab ldan pa mkha' la bya bzhin rnam par rgyu// spyod pa yongs dag gang
zhag gzugs la ma spyod cing// rnam shes 'du shes tshor ba sems par ma sbyidan// de ltar spyod pa chags pa thams cad yongs su spyodaso// chags las rnam par grel ba bde
gshegs shes rab spyod// de ltar sde ra 'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// chagos pa bcad nasa'ajage rten chags pa med par 'gyur// nyim sgra gcan gza' bral lcang
nger 'dug pa dang/ dme ba tang rtswa dang shing dang nags tshal bsreg pa bzhin// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin dag par yongs rtogs shing// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol
phan mtheng na// byed pa po yang ma dam kas chos kun ma demagis te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa'ispyod mchog yin// rgyal ba la ni lha rgyal brgya byin gyis zhus pa// byang chub sems
dpa' shes rab spyod pa ji ltar brtson// phung po khams la rdul tsam brtson par ma byed pa// phung por mi brtso na de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson// gang zhig chos 'di sprul dang sgyu ma'adra
[dl) ]thos na// som nyi med cing bslab la phya'i zhing sbyor byed pa// sems can de na rang nas thag zhugs rig par bya// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig mang la lhag byas yani// dpag mod
mang ngo ra dgen pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i mos// gnag rtsi mtshams dang nags tshal phun sumatshogs mthong na// 'ad de grong dang grong khyer nye ba'i rtags snyam ste// dbugs pa na rnyed
bar gyur tsare chem rkun 'jags pa med// de bzhan byang chub yongs su tshol tshe rgyal rnams kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin 'dam nyan pa gang thob pa// de na dbugs phyin thob par gyur cing
'jags med de// dgra bcom gal ma ya na rkyen rtags sa la man/ dmi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba yis// gal te shing dang nags rnams mthong na da dung 'ang// cos ma
mthong rgya mtsho che de ma ring ste// nye bar gyur pa'i rtags yin snyam du som nyid med// de ltar byang chub dam par rab zhugs ragi bya ste// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'ang nyen ra Na
rnam par 'dren pas mngon sum lung bstan ma gyur kyang// ring por ma thogs sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyug/ dpyid dus bzang 'byang rtswa dang lo ma yal ga rnams / dalo ma
'bras bu me tog yang dag skyed par byed// shes rab pha rolan 'di su yalag thobar// rong por ma thogs 'dren pa'i byang chub mchogo thob 'gyur// dper na bu med snum pa'i
sdug bsngal nyin gyur na// de na di yabatsa' ba'adus par shes par bya// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i shes rab kun// 'dunapa rtog cing myur du byang
chub reg par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin mchag spyod tsha rnal 'byor pa// gzugs kyi 'a phal ba dang na yongs su 'grub ma mthong// chos dbyings chos dang chos man rnams su mi
mthong ste// mya ngan 'das la ma rig de na shes rab gnas// gang zhig 'di'i byed sangs rgyas chosa rnams ma rtog sta// stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang byang chub zhi mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog
rtog bralabyin gyi rlabs kyis spyod// 'di ni shesarab pha rol phyin pa'i spyod mchog yin// sna ba'i zla ba sangs rgyas la ni rab 'byor zhus// ston pas bar du gcod par 'gyur ba mang
gsusan// yon tan dga' bams kyi bar du gcod gang lags/[” ]/de lacung bzad tsam zhig yongs su brjod par bya// rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'ad yig bris tshe// spobs
pa tha dad rnam pa du ma 'byung 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i danam byas par glog bzhin myur du yang// yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba 'ad ni bdud kyi las// 'ad bshad tshan kha cig somanyib
lo 'gyur te// 'drenapasaM'adirin bdag ga mang yang yos ma brjod// rigs dang sa dang rus kyang yongasasu ma brjod ces// de na nyin par ma 'gyur spong 'gyur bdud kyi las//
doltar rtsa ba thabs ni yongs su ma shes pas// blun po de dag yal kha 'dab ma tshol bar 'gyur// glang po red kyang glang po'i rjes ni tshol ba ltar// shes rab pha rol phan thos mdo
'tshol de bzhin no// dparan la la ro brgya ldan pa'i zas rnyed la// zas mchog red nas drug cu pa dgatsholakhyed ltar//[C] ba sems dang 'pha rol phyin pa 'di rid nas// dgra bcom
sal byang chub tshol byedade bzhin no// bsti stang 'ded par 'gyur zhing rnyed pa 'dod 'gyur dang// lta ba'i sems dang bcas te khyima'adres byed ldan zhing// chos btang nas chos
man bya ba spyod 'gyur pa// lam bar lam gol song ba 'di ni bdud kyi las// gang dag do yi tshon chos kyi dam pa 'di// nyan par 'dun cang dad pa bskyed par gyur pa las// de dag
chos sku phya ba man dang ldan nug nas// dga' ba med par gyur cing yid kyang ma bde bas// de yi tsha na bdud kyi las 'di'i byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang bar chad 'gyur ba
rnam pa du ma ste// de tsho gang dag gas ni dge slong mang dkrugs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di ni 'dzan ma byed// rin chen gang dgaranatang med mang dkon gyur pa//
de dag la ni rtag tu dgra yang rab tu mang// de bzhin rgyal ba'ishes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ dkon mchog rin chen la yang gnod pa byed pa'ang mang/ thago pa gsar
[p]/ ku'u// du zhugs pa sems can blo chung ba// gang zhig dkon pa'i ranichenabad ni ma red ba// de la bar chad bya phyir bdudan spro bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyas 'di dag yongs su 'dzanadad ldan// ma zhig na bar gyur la bun mang yod pa// de kun yid ma bde zhing de la 'am gro byed// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams
kyisangs rgyas kyang// yum 'gyur shes rab dam pa 'del dgongs pa mdzad// gang dag 'das dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon gang dang// ma 'ongs dusan 'byung 'gyur
du dag 'dalas byung// 'jig rten ston pa bskyed brgyal ba rnamasakyi yum// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed// 'jig rten de bzhin 'di dang dgaM bcom
de bzhin nyidi// rang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang rgyal pa'i de bzhin nyid// gcig pa nyidIdadangosazul gzhan mni de bzhin 'di// shes rab pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegs
pas mkhyen// mkhas ba'adzagi rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang rung// chos nyidaskyon med chos rnams stong pa 'ad gnas te// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid
'di rjes su rtogs// de phyir de bzhin gshegs shes sangs rgyas mtshan gsol te// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyam
'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'ad lan te// sems can sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las yongs 'don kyang// de dag nams kyang sems can 'du shes 'gyur ba med// dper na
si ri sul brten nas 'jags med par// ra dgas phra moskrag par byed tsang sgra sgrog ltar// ma yasangagashes rab pha rol phyani brten nas/ mu stegs can mad sbag byed
'jigs med sgra yang sgrog/ dper na nam mkhar gnas pa nyi ma'i 'od zer ni// sa 'dasnyims par byed pa'i gzugs kyang rab tu ston// dubazhani chos rgyal shes rab pha
rol phyin brten pa// srid pa'i chu klung skyems shang chos kyang rab tu ston// gzugs rnams ma mthong tshor ba dug kyang ma mawong zhing// 'du shes mthong ba med lasems bam
mthong zhing// gang la rnamapar shes dang sems kyang mi mthong ba// 'di ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tu
rab brjod ba// namamakha'ajaltar mthong ba don 'dirtogasashag ltar// de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// mthong ma dpar ni brjod par nus pa ma yin no//
gang gsad ltar mthed po de ya chos kun mthong// rgyal po btang snyoms 'dugatsang blon po kun byed ltar// sangs rgyas mdzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad
0 bya// shes rab pha rol phyin pa khyod// rgyal pa grong dum 'gro yula'akhor ma'agro la// rang gi yul lasu'adu ba thams cad sdud pa ltar// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di
gang du'ang ma g.yo la// sangs rgyasas ya yon tan gang yanithams cad sdud// gang zhig bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dad brtenazhing// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog la
bsam sbyor bu// nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyisashan tu 'das byas nas// zil gyis mnan rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du thob// dper na rgya mtsho'ajug pa'i gru na chag gyur la// mi gangar 'am
rgyu rtswa'am shong na ma 'dzan pa// chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te ngegs su phyin ma'agyur// gang zhig 'dzan pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de ltar gang dag dad ldan dang ba rnyed gyur pa//
shes rab pha rol phyin pa rnam par sbyong ma byed// de dag thams kyi yon tan shes rab yongs gzung ste// mchog tu rmad byung pa de gshegs byang chub myur du reg/ dper na la las dzra sa ma
btang chu skyed na// nyam chung phyir na myur du 'jig par rig par bya// sebatang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jag pa yi// 'jigs pa med pa' bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur// gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang// shes rab rnam par nyams na myur du 'jig par 'gyur// dad pas shes rab de na yongs su zin gyur na// sa gnyis shan tu'adas te byang chub
mchog thob 'gyur// dper na bcos legs ma byas spu na rgya mtsho'i nang// nor dang bcas shing tshong par bcas te 'jig par 'gyur// gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur nas
su 'dzag nor dang bcas pa ngogs su phyin par 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgoms kyang// shes rab med na byang chub las ni myanyams 'gyur// de skad
shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan n// ma smras mnyams rgyal ba'i byang chub reg par 'gyur// le brgya lishu len te rgas shing sdug bsngal ma// las kyang bdaganyida'agro bar nus
pa ma yin te// de ni g.yas g.yon gnyis nas ma yas bsten byas n// 'gyal ba'i 'jigs pa med cing bde blag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dang shes rab stotA
chung ba// rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang rab tu 'jag par 'gyur// de nyid thabs dang shes rab mchog gas yongasazani na// ma'adzags de bzhin gshegasakyi byang chub reg par 'gyur//
byang chub sems dpa' dang po'alas kyi sar gnas gang// lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchogazhugs pa// slob ma bslad pa bla ma dus dang rab ldan pa// mkhas
de dag gis dge bshes rtag tuparten par bya// ci phyi'i zhin mkhas pa'i yon tan de las 'byung// de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su ston// sangs rgyas chos rnams dge ba'i bshes
la bsten to zhes// yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal ba de skad gsung// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang// bsam gtan shes
'babyang nus yos su sde bar gyis// phung po zhenAnas mchog tu 'dzani par ma byed ces// dang po'i las can dag la de skad bstan par bya// de ltar spyod pa legs mtsho sa ba'i zla ba
rnams // 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang na gnas yin te// rten dang blo dang gling dang yongs 'dren don 'dod dang// gsal khyed sgron ma chos mtshog skya ba ma 'khrugs bzhin//
grags chen ldan rnams bya dka' ge mgyon byed de// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams kyi go na mni// theg gsum 'du shes phul zhing yongs su gzung ba med// ma ldog g.yo ba med
cing chos rnams 'khrugs pa med// dadaga'adi'aphra'i chos dang ldan zhing spros pa med// som nyi yid gnyis 'byed dang bral zhing don dang ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin pa thos nas mnur ba//
gzhan gyi dra'i ma 'jog tsang maldog rag par bya// 'dun pa rnams kyi chos 'du zab ste mthong bar dka'// sus kyang rtogs pa med de thob par gyur med pa// don gciganyid du rtogs
sgo nas phan byed snang brtsor 'gyur// blo chung sems can tshogs sus 'ad ni shes par 'gyur// sems can rnams na gnas la dga' zha'i yul rnams 'dod// 'dzin la gnas shang ma mkhas
blun rmongs mun pa bzhin// thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzani med de/ bdane'ajamig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin// nam mkha'i khams na shar gyi phyog dbalho phyogs dang/
da bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pha mtha' yas// steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu ja snyadarnamasan 'ang// lha dang gyur pa medatsang bye bragagyur pa med// 'dus pa'adi bzhin nyid
dang ma phyin de bzhin nyid// da ltar de bzhinanyidi dang dgrwa btsam de bzhin nyid// chos kun de bzhin nyidirang rgyal ba'i de bzhin nyid// de ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid du bye brag med// bde
gshegs byang chub smadad chos dang bral gyur pa// 'ad ni byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig thob 'dod pa// thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor// 'dren pa shes rab
modan 'thob par 'gyur ma yani// bya zhigalus cha dpag tshad brgya pa yod gyur tam// dpag tshad lnga bcur gyur pa'i gshog zad stobs med pa// de na sum cu rtsa gsum
gnasanas 'dzam glang 'dir// bdag nyidi mchongs na de nitamanyes 'gyur ba yan// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lta 'ad yang// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por
bsgrubs byas shing// smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bsten kyang// thabs med shes rab bral nga nyan thos nyid du ltung// sangs rgyas theg pa 'del
nges par 'byung 'dod pas// 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pha ma'i 'du shes dang// phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i yid dang brtul ba dang//
tha ba med tsang drung la tsheg 'jam sa bor bya// 'jag rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs zhus pa// yon tan rgya mtsho nyon mongasam mchis rtags brtan gsol//
b+hU mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog ma 'gyur ba// de ltar yon tan phyogs tsamargyal bas lung bstan gsal// tha dad 'du shes bral zhing tshig dang ldan par sna// dag sbyong dag
dang bram ze gzhan la rten mi byed// mkhas pa dus gsum rtag tu dranasong gsum po spangs// de dag dag ba banu yi las lam mngon par brtson// nga thong med par 'gro la
chos rjes su ston// chos la gcag tu dga' zhing 'jam pa'i tshog dang ldan// 'gro 'chag nyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gnya' shAng gang tsam lta zhing 'gro la
sems 'khrul med// gtsang byas gtsang ma'i gos 'chang gsum pa dben zhung dwag/ khyu mchog rtag tu chos 'dod red pa 'dod ma yani// bdud kyi yul las 'das shes
gzhan gyi dring ma'ajog/ bsam gtan bzhi la bsam med bsam gtan der ma gnas// grags pa 'dod pa ma zhi khro bas sems dkras med// khyim par gyur na rtag tu
[4 ]dngos po kun m chags//'tsho ba'i lengs spyod ma mthun 'tsho ba'i bsam pa med// drag shul stod sngags bud med ster ba'i sngags ma byed// rtsa'am 'dod par ma las las rnams
lenam byed/ khang tu dban pa shes rab ra rul phyin mchog brtson// 'thapa dang rtsod dang bral zhing byams pa'i soms kyang brtan// kun mkhyen 'dod cing brtan la rtag tu gzhol
sems ldan// mtha'a'akhob kla klo'i ngo'i yulamatha' rnam par spangs// rang gis la dogs med rtag tu ra'ib 'dra// chos phyir srog kyang 'dor zhing rnala'abyor rab tuphartson/
mi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin ra ra shes par bya// gzugs dang tshor dang 'dus shes sems pa rnam shes rnams // zab cing rang bzhin mtshan ma med de rab zhi ba// shes rab kyis
ni phung pa brtags pas gtang ma rtogs// dper na mda' yas rgya mtsho'agating thugatshol dang mtshungs// byang chub sems dba' gang zhing zab mos 'di lta bu r// don dam gos pa med
pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa ste// gangan phung po med cing khams dang skye mched med// dul bsod nams sogs pas ja ga ga la byed// dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa 'i skyes pa
zhig/ bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad rnam rtog pa// da ninyin gcig sems kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal par byang chub sems dpas rjes su rtogs// byang chub sems
dpa'agang zhig bskal mang bye stong du// sbyin pa sbyin dang tshul khrims dri med srung byed kyang// gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i mchog/
rjod pa'i legs la sbyin dang khrims kyis cha ma yod// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab mchog bsgoms te/ 'di las langs nas gol ba med pa'i chos brjod rung// de yang
'gro ba'i don dubyang chub rgyur sngon// dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jagi rten gsuman med// ngasodanams de yang gsag dang dengazhin stong pa dang// gseb dang ya mgar dang snying po med par snang//
de ltar spyad pa spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod// de ltar spyod pa bsod nams dpag med yongs su 'dzani// sangs rgyas rab bshad pa mdzad cing gzung mdzad cing// chos de thams cad
brjod pa tsam du zad par shes// bskal pa bye ba khra khrig mong la brjod byas kyang// chos kyi dpyangs la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// gang zhig rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rol phyin 'di
dang mang tsam tshad par yongs su brjod pa'i chos de drag yongs snga rlom sems med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na/nyams pas med rung sangs rgyas byang chub mchog reg 'gyur//

'bru mar snying po 'bar ba phrad pa dang po yasi// sAng po tsheg mni de med pas kyang chog pa min// me lce phrad pa thamasasnying po tshagi mnal// me lce tha ma med pa snying po ga min ltar// dang po'i
00/ sems kyis byang chub mchog reg ma yin la// de med pas kyang de la reg par nus ma yani// tha ma'isems kyis byang chub zhi 'theb nus ma yin// de med pas kyang de 'thob nus pa ma ya no/
sa bon las na myu gu me tog 'bras bu 'byung// de yang 'gagasal de med par yang shang de med// de bzhin dang po'i semAkyang byung chub rgya yane ta// de yang 'grogs 'di med par yang
byang chub med// chu ya rdzogs pa dang po chung ngu chung ngu yang// ma skyes thu mas rdza ma yongs su gang bor byed// de bzhin dang po 'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgyu ste// rim gyis dkar
pa'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// stong pa mtshan med smon pa med par chos spyod cing// mya ngan 'das la ma rig mtshan ma la spyod pa// dpon mnyan pamakhas pa phar 'gro
tshur 'gro yang// mtha' gnyis ma gnas rgya mtshor gnas pa med pa bzhin// deltar skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dasnyam bdag/ stobs bcus byang chub reg par lung bstan
snyam masams// 'di latsa yang med ces byang chub skug pa med// de ltar spyod pa bde gshegs shes rab spyod pa yani// dgon pa'ilaman le zhes nad bcas 'jag rten rnams //
mthong na skyag pa med cing bsgral ba'i gi rgyan te// phyi ma'i mur mthar rtag tu brtson zhing ra ba shes nas// yongs su skyo ba'i yid kyi rngul tsam skyedapa med// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
ba'i shes ra ba spyod byed cing// phung po 'di dag gdod nas stong zhing skye med shes// mnyam par ma gzhagasems can khams la snyadi rje 'jug/ bar skubs
dar ya nga sangs rgyas chos las yongs mi tems// dparan skyes bu mkhas pa yon tan kun ldan zhing// stobs ldan ma thub sgyu rtsal brtson byas tshul shesal// 'phong dang bzoganas
mang po'i pha rol phyin sgyu cang// stsamabasgrub shes 'gro don rab tu 'dod pa zhig/ pha dang ma dang chung mar bcas pa yongs bsdus nas// dgu byed mang po dgon pa'i lam du phyin
ba dang// de yis dpa' zhing brtul phod kyis bu mang sprul nas// bde bar song zhing phyin yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar// da bzhin di tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang//
sams na khams rnams kun l snying rje chen po bskyed/ bdud bzhi dag dang gnyis las kyang rab 'das nas/ tang 'dzana'adal gnas shing byang chub regam phyid/ 'kha'
lazung rten de la chu yi phung po rtan// las chen 'dirten de la 'gro ba rten// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu 'di 'dra ste// dond mkhu' la gnas pa yin par bsam par khyed/
da bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyidi gnas pa// bya ba rnam pa sna tshogasa'agro larab ston cing/ sems can rnams kyi shes dang smon lam thabs skabs te/ mya
ba00 ngan 'das la ma rig stong par gnas pa med// gang ga tshon byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal ba// stong pa zhi ba'i tang 'dzani dam pa 'dapyid pa// bar skabs der na/
mtshan ma bsgom par ma byi ste// mtshan ma med par gnas shang zhi la rab zha spyod// bar snang 'phur ba'i bya la gnas yod ma yin te/ de na gnas pa ma yan sal ltung ma 'gyur//
de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam thar sgo phyed pa// mya ngan 'das la marig mtshon ma skyod ma yin// dper na 'phrod bsubs skyes bus rgyan du mnga' 'bangasate// mda'i
gzhan dag gis gtsag nas gcig tu ling btags nas// snga ma'i mda'adesal ltad ba'i skabs ma byed// mi de 'dod na mda' de sa la lhung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes rab
pha rol phyin pa mchog spyod pa// shes rab thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam rgyu zhing// dedag dag pa'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de srid stong nyidi dam pa de ni sgrib me
byed dper na dge slong 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig/ nam mkha'i gnas te cho 'phrul zung dag rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang 'chag pa dang na nyil dang 'dug/
pa ston// de nasdig pa med cing de la skyo ba med// de bzhan byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stong gnas shing// ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha rol sen la gnas med rgyu// 'gre ba/
khyab @#// dag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' yas ston// bskal pa bye ba nyams pa med cing skyo ba med// dbar na ma 'ga' g.yang sa chen por 'dug byed cing//
lag pa gnyis kas gdug gnyis 'dzin cing ji mi snyam// dus mni rlung gis g.yang chen par phulaphyas kyang// bdag 'dir nagayad du ltung bar 'gyur ba med// de bzhin byang
chub sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdug na yongs gzung ste/ chos rnams stong pa mtshanamed smon pa med rtag mang// mya ngano
'das la reg pa med la chos kyang mthong// dpar na rin chen 'dod pa ni chen gling song ste/ rinachen rod nas phyir yang khyim du 'ong bar byed// ded dpon de na de la bde bar 'tsho yod
kyi 'on kyang gnyen bshesatshogasakyi sdug bsngal yid la 'byung// de ltar stong pa nyidi kyi rin chen gling seng ste// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dbang po stongs thob pa/
mya ngan 'das la reg bar mngon par dga' mod kyi/ 'on kyang sdug bsngol sems canasdug bsngal yid la 'byung/ tshongam gang zhag grangakhyer nang nas grong rdal dang// grong du bya ba'i phyi'i dag
lho shes bar bya phyi'i 'gro/ der yang ma gnas chen gling du 'ang[W]gnasal// mkhas pa khyomi dumaginas lam lemakhas pa'a'agyur// dbazhinarang rgyal bcas pa'i nyan thos rnam grol shes//
kun labyang chub soms dpa' gsal ba mkhas par 'gyur// de lam gnasasas rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin// lam mkhas cho ga shes pa 'dus byas gnas ma 'gyug (gang tsho'agro/
labyams pa rjes su 'brel byas nas// stong pa mtshan mod snyenapa med pa'ating 'dzin spyod// gal te ma dran 'das la reg byed de la med// de lta med kyi don thob pa'abyed kyang nus//
dper na sprul pa'i mi lus mi snang ma yinazhing// den mong gis gdags par bya bar zhus po ste// de bzhin byang chub semasadapa'irnam thar sgor spyado pa// denamang gis gdags
nus nam po gzhanang man// gal te spyod pa dang ni dbang pa yongs drasal// byang chub sems dpa' zab chos yongasasumanyin te// stodapa mtshan ma med dang mi ldog chos rnams kun// ma'achad do ni
lung bstan ma yin rig par bya// dgra bcoms dngarkyenargyasasangs rgyas ye shes dang// khams gsum dag la rmi lam na yang mi 'dod cing// 'gro la chos ston mdzad pa'i sasargyas rnams
mthong ba// denam ldegalung bstan yin par rig par bya// rmi lam na nAsems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong// skad cig de la ngan song rgyun gcad smanalam btab// bden pa'i byin gyi rlubs
sam yi phung pa zhi// da na mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// ma ya'ajig rten 'byung pa'igadon dang nadamad pa// phan dang snying brtse ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis zhi / 'on kyang rlom
sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa// de namaldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// byang chub semasadaba' bdag lung bstan snyam rlom semasasam// bden pa'i byin gyi/
rlangs kyis rnam pa grub med dam// pha rol lung bstan yinasnyam rlomasems 'byung gyur na// rlom sems gnas pa de ni blochung rig par bya// ming gi gzhi las bdud ni'u bar 'ongs gyur nas/
'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang// khyod kyi bdun mas brgyud kyi bar gyi ming yin zhing// 'doni khyod kyi sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming yin zhe 'am// spyas sdoms pa'i dra brtson parnal
'byar ldan de la khyed sngon yon tan tshul yang 'adizhes rjod byed do// da skad gung thos rnyemasams byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongasasu bsang zhing blo chung dge par bya// rab tu dben
pa'i grong dang grong khyar sul dang// dgon pa dban pa nags khrod rab tu sten byed cing// bdag bstod gzhan la smon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bsrung zhang blo chung
rig par bya// rtag du grong dang yul 'khor grong rdal gnas byed cing// byang chub ldan pa sems can sman khyadam gtogs par// da ni dgra bcom rang rgyal dag la 'dod med pa// 'di ni bod par
gshegs pa'i sras kyi dben pa gsungs// gang zhig dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa'i ri ya sul// sbrul gyis gang bar la mang bye bar gnas byed kyang// dben pa 'di moshis pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' de// ltag pa'i nga rgyal red nas 'dra bar gnas pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don brtson bsam gtanadang// stobs dang dbang po rnam thar ting 'dzin slob rnams la/
'danodiganadaben sbyod pa man snyam sems byed pa// de dgon pa'i spyod yul min zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig khrod dam 'an te dbon ra ra gnas kyang rung// theg ra gnyis kyi
sems bral byang chub mchog nges na// 'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyidaben pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' de ni bdag nyams gzhan ma yin// de lta bas na mkhas pas nga rgyal
bcos byas te// bsam pa drag pos byang chub dam pa tshol ban//nad pa shin tu gso pa'i smanapa bsten pa ltar//g.yol ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/sas rgyas byang chub
mchog zhug byang chub semAdang 'dug/pha rol phyin dang mtshungs ba'i dge ba'i bshes su bsten// de dag nanatan sa 'di rjes su ston pa yin// rnam pa gnyis kyis sangs rgyas byang chub rjes su rtog//
rgyal ba 'dus dang ma byon phyogs brgyun gang bzhugs pa/ kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'du yini gzhan ma yin// pha rol pa ni 'di byung chub mchog la zhugs rnams kyi// gsal dang sgron dang/
snang dang ston pa yin zhes bstan// jiltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtshan gyis stong/ de ltar mtshanadang chos 'di thams cad su shis shing// chos rnams stong zhing mtshan nyid med par

rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gachos gnyis yod tshaniskyod pa ste// byis pa rnams kyis bdag la nam mkha'i mdud 'ad bcings// dbar na dogs pas 'du shes kyisanadug blangs pa//
zhwa dug de lta bar song ba ma yi'on kyang 'gyel// de ltar byis pa bdag dang bdag gyis khas blangs pa// 'du shes skyes pas 'chiyang rtag tu yod ma yin// dza ra'adzan pa de ltar kun nas
nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang bdag ga'i ma dmagus rnam pa dag par gsungs// 'dil na mongs rnam dag gang yang yod mni ra ra// byung chub sems dpa'ashes 'ba'ol napas/
rtogs// 'dzam gling malus dag na semasacan ji snyed pa// de dag khyams dang byang chub mchog tu sems bskyedanas//lo stod bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin byas l// kun kyang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang/
b+he chub rgyur sngo yad// gang zhig shes rab pha rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa// than tu ma gcig gcig rjesasu mthun byedun// bsod nams de la sbyin pa'i phung pos mnam bod// de phyi'i
lho g.yel med rtag tu shes ra ba 'jug bar bya// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa'i rnal 'byon pa// snying rje chen po bskyedacing sems can 'du shes med// de tshomakhas pa 'gro ba kun gyi
la sbyin gnas 'gyur// rtag tu mu la 'a khor bsod nams don yod yongs su spyod// lha ma sems can rang nas ngan song gsum 'brel ba// yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa'i byung
chub sems dpa' de// shes rab pha rol phyin patani mtshan brtson byed pa// lam yang 'adanagi mas can khams kyi 'bab stegs ston// ma zhig sngon chad ma rnyid pa ya'on
chen mchog/ dus gzhan zhigan rnyed par gyur te dga' ba las/ red ma thag tu ster te bag med gyur pas na// skor bas sdug bsngal rtag tu ni chen mngon 'dod pa// daltar
byung chub mchog zhugs rin chen mtshungs pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor don ga ca// rin chen rnyed nas 'dzan bar byed cing ma phyin na// rjes su 'dzan par khyad
cang myur du dbang du 'gyur// 'od zer 'phreng bas mun pas dkrugs pa'i tshunanag kun// sal bar byedatsadi sngon medumakhar ga sha'an/ srog chags 'byung pa'i srin bu me
khyab thams cad dang// skar ma'i tshogs dang zla ba'i 'od kun wal gyis non// dultar shes rab pha rol phyin mchog sbyod pa ya// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas ba lta thabs
sol byed cing// 'gro ba kun dang dgra bcoma'ang rgyal zalargyas non/ khyang chub semaMs dpa' stong pa mtshan med 'o dos spyod phyir// dper na rgyal pa'i bu zhaganor gdong don
[s ag]// 'dod// kun gyi gtso bor gyur te mngon par 'gro bya 'os// 'di ni da ltan yang sems canadaga' byed na// thabs thob gyur nas rgyal srid gnas na lcosa'i
dgos// de ltar spyod pa spyod mkhas khyadachub sems dpa' yang// bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang ma rnams dga'// 'anod lta na yang semasacanamang phan brtson/chos kyi rgyal
b+h+yA borag par gyur nas smos ci dgos// de la tshon bdudan zug rdu ldan par 'gyur// mya don sdug bsngalanyam thag mthu chung yang ma pad/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'ad yodi nub 'gyur zhes/
'jigs pa sten phyir phyogs rnams bsreganang skar mda' gtong// gang tshe mkhas pa de dag bsam pa rab ldan zhing// nyin mtshan shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog don la// rtag tu lus dang
soms na mkha' 'gro bya ltar gyur// de la nag po'i rtsa lag glags red ga la 'gyur// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur cing// phan tshun ma mthun khrosar 'i sems
dang ldan gyur pa// de yi tshe na ba dud na deg 'a zhing mgu bar 'gyur// de gnyis rgyal pa'i yi shes lasan song du 'gyur// de gnyis 'di du 'gyur zhing sha rdza 'dra bar 'gyur// de gnyis rang
gi dam bcas nyams par byed pa'i 'gyur// snang zhing brjod dang bral la byang chug ga la yod// de ni bdud rnams dga' zhing bdud la thub mi 'gyur// lung bstan ma thob byang chub sems
dpa'al la zhig/ lung bstan thob la sems khras rtse da pa rtsom byed na// tha ba skyon ldan sems kyi skad cig jasnyadapa// desnyad bskal par phyi'i yad go cha bgo dgosas// sangs
sa kha zad pa'i pha rol phyin ras byang chub reg/ de snyam sems shange ma legs snyam pa'i blo skyed de// so sor 'chag par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed la// bral bar gyur pa de sangs
rgyas chos 'di'i slog/ gang zhig slob la bsleb pa gang du slob med cing// slob par re dang bslab pa'i chos rnams ma dmags la// bslab dang bslab pa ma yin 'di gnyis ma rtog pa/
da ltar gang slob de nasangs rgyas chos 'di'i slob// byang chub sams dpa' gang zhig bslang 'das la de ltar shes// denang sapa nga nyams dang tshul khrims 'chal pa gzhar ma'agyur//
danitis par byed cing sangs rgyas chos 'di'i slob// bslab pa ma khasangasheng dmagis pa med par gyur pas slob/ mkhas pa 'od byed rnams kyis shes rab de ltar spyod// dge ba ma yin
sems gtsagatsam yang skyed ma byed// nyim par snang lan 'aglobar byed pan// bod rjes snang bas mdun na mun pa ma gnas bzhin// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bslab por byas rnams kyis//
pha rol phyin pa thams cad 'dapin 'dus par 'gyur// 'jig tshogs lta bar lta ba drug nugazhis 'dus ltar// de bzhin padal phyin pa 'di dag 'dus par 'gyur// dper na sreg gi
nubang po 'gags nas dbang po gzhan// gang dag ji snyed yod pa khyad par 'gag par 'gyur// de ltar shes rab spyod ba mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi// pa'ol
phyin pa thams cad 'di'i na 'dus par gsungs// byung chub sems dpa' gang dganyan chos yon tan dang// nga rgyal yon tan kun la bslabs par gyur pa rnams // de dag de la mi gnas
'dod pa ma skyod de// 'di ni bdag gi bslab byu yod snyam de phyir sleb/ ma log byang chubo mchog la rab tu zhugs pa yi// sems bskyed pal bsam ba thag pas yi red bas// stongagasum
ra ba srang la gzhan nas tshad gzung rung// rjes su yi ra nga dag ba de ni de ltar min// dge ba don gnyis thar 'dod semA can ji snyed pa// kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yang gyur//
de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i yon tan thob gyur nas// sdug bsngal zad par byaphyir 'jig rten tshes spyanabyed// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhag ma steg chos rnams kun// stong dang mtshan ma med
par skyes med yongs shes la:/ shes rab bsamo ba thag pas byang chub ma tsholas// rnal 'byor pa de shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// namamakha'i khams dang khams gnyis tha dad
'gyur dun// de dang de la gang ces kyang bye brag ma/ de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang// nam mkha' mtshungs shing dran pa nye bar zhi bar spyod// skye ba
dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dasnyim du// skye bo 'di dag mgu bya masims bya ba med// g.yo sgyu sna tshogs rab tu ston pa de yang mthong// 'on kyang de la lus med sems med mang yang/
med do khazhin shes rab spyod pa rnams kyang 'disnyam du// byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro ba yongs su sgrol ma soms// rang gi skye bcu kha sna tshogs ldan pa'ang ston// sgyu ma lta
bu'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'i spyod// dpe nasangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed// den zhig bya snyamadu yad sems ma skyed// de bzhin shesarab sbyor mkhas myongachub
sems dpa' yang// sprul pa skya ma gzhan du bya la thams cadoston/ shang mkhan tre bo mkhas pas shang ga 'khrul 'khor byas// skyes pa bud med 'dra ste phya pa thams cad byed//
de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhos byung chub sems dpa' yang// rnam par mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed// de ltar spyod mkhas rnams lalha tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar
ga 'dud cing phyag kyang 'tshal par khyad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas ji snyed kyang// yon tan bsngags pa'i 'phreng bas yongs su brjod par mdzad//
gapa'i klung ga phyi snyed zhing na sems can rnams // de kun bdud du gyur par yongs su brtag bzung ste// ba spu nyag ma re re dzasId sprul byas kyang// de dag kun gyis mkhas
dal bar chad bya ma nus// rnam bzhis byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stobasaldan pa// thub par dka' zhing bdud bzhis bskyod par ma nus te// stong
par gnas dang sems can yongs su ma gtong dang// jiskad smras bzhin byed dang bde gshegs byani bslabs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs yum shes rab pha rol phyin pa bdu// 'chad
tshabyang chub sems dpa' gangazhagems byed cing// bsam pa thag pas bsgrub par mngon du brtson byed pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi'imangon zhugs rag par bya// da bzhin nyid kyi
gnas su chos dbyings ltar ma 'gro// dpa' na bar snang sprin ni gnas med gnas pa bzhin// rig sngags 'chang ba dmigs med nags semasamakha' 'gro tshe// ma rtag shing phyir
sngags kyi stobs kyi byin rlabs byed// de ltar spyod pa byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsalapa// rtog par byed dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmags ma 'gyur// 'chad par byed dang
chos nyid mthong ba ma dmigs pa// 'di ni zho'adod yon tan dga' ba'i gnas pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kyi dgra bcom rnam thar ma gtogs par// goms pa 'di non blos
rang rgyal bcas pa yi// gnas pa zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rab zhi bde ldan pa/// ja nyid kun gyi mchog dang gong na med pa yin// 'dab chagasanamamakhar gnas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ma
yin nyanachun gnas kyang 'tshubs te 'chi ba mad// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan stobs dag gis// pha rol son pa stong gnas mya ngan 'da' ma gyur//
sams can kun gyi yon tan mchog 'gregang 'dod pas// chos kyi sngan par b mchog dam pa sbyin bya zhing// phan mdzad rnamasakyi gnas pa mchog 'di'i sten cig dang// sangs rgyas
ye shes mchog tu rmad byung mchog reg 'gyur// bslab pa 'di ni 'dren pas bslab pa yongs brjod ba// bslab pa ji snyed kun gyi mchog dang gong na med// mkhas pa gang zhig bslab
kun pha rol 'gro 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bslab pa shes ra ba pha rol phyin 'di slebs// chos mdzod dam pa 'di ni gter gyi phul du byung// 'jig rten dgan sangs rgyas rigs kyi bde
spyadi mdzod// 'das dang ma byon phyogs ba'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams // de dag 'dul byung ste chos dbyangs rnga ma 'gyur/ @#/ shing dang 'bras bu me tog nags tshal ji snyed pa//
de dag thams cad sa la yang dag byung zhing 'thon// 'on kyang sa la zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// skyo ba med cing yongs su mnyems rnam rtog med// sangs rgyas nyan thos rang rgyal bcas
pa ji snyed dang// 'jig rten kun n lha dang bad skyid chos yod pa// de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung// shes rab nams kyang zad pa med cing 'phel pa med// sems
[u ]@#// can tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur ji snyed ba// de kun ma 'galas byung bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// rkyen rnams tshogs nas sdug bsngal 'khrula'akhor rab tu/
byung// 'khrul 'khor zad pa med cadi ma rig 'phel ba med// ye shes tshul sgo thabasakyi rtsa ba ji snyed pa// da kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog lasaM byung// rkyen rnams tshogs
nas lasakyi 'khrul 'khor rab tu byung// shes rab pha rol phyin pa zad pa 'am 'jal ba med// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byung 'di// shas rab kyis
ni 'byung med zad med rtogs pa de// dper na sngon gyis sgrib med nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar// ma ga 'gebs pa bsal nas rang byung thob par 'gyur// mthu chen ldan pa dag na bsam
gtan bzhi'i gnas kyang// rten par byed pa ma yanaganas par byed pa med// 'on kyang bsam gtan bzhi pa 'di dag rten yin zhing// thob par gyur nas byang chub dam pa mchog
kyang 'thob// shes rab mchog thob pa dge bsam gtan gnas pa myong// gzugs med ting 'dzin dam pa bzhi po rnams kyang myong// bsam gtan 'di dag byang chub mchog la
zla phan byed gyur// byang chub sems dpa' zag pa zad phyir slob pa mnyid/ bsam gtan ting nge 'dzan la gnas nas mtshan ma med/[u0f8b ]/de la gnas rnams gal te lus zhig gyur nas[7]
bsam pa ji bzhin 'dod pa'i khams su yang spyi ste// 'di ni yon tan sogs pa'i ngo mtshar rmad byung zhing// dper sna'adzam gling ma zhig sngon chad ma red pa'i /lha yul lha yi khang pa/
dam pa rnyed rgyu cang// mthong nas de yis der ni yul rnams yongs bzung ba// de dag gnas par ma byed phyir yang 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yon tan
mchog 'chang ba// rnal 'byor brtson pa bsam gtan ting nge 'dzan gnas nas// phyir yang 'dod pa'i khams su gnas te gos pa med// chu la bad+ma bzhin du byas pa'i chos mi
gnas// sems can yongs sun par bya dang zhange byang dang// pha rol phyin 'di yongs su rdzogs bya mgatogs par// bdag nyid chen po gzugs med khams su skye ma phyid//
byang chub yon tan pha rol phyin rnams nyams par 'gyur// dper na mazhig rin chen gter rnamasarnyed gyur cing// de la 'dod pa'i blo ni bskyed pa ma byas la// des kyang dus gzhan
zhagi nad dug yongs slangs shing// blangs nas khyim du bcug ste chags par byed pa ltar/ de bzhin byang chub sems dur 'a thabs mkhas bsam gtan bzhi// ting 'dzin zhi ba
dga' bdasbyin byed thob gyur la// bsam gtan bde dang bsam gtan ting 'dzan thob btang ste// 'gro la snying brtse ldan pa phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug/ gal te byang chub
sems dpa' ting 'dzani bsam gtan gnas// dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo skyed na// mnyam pa'am bzhag rgod cing sems g.yedas
gyur pa ste// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs nyams mnyan pa gru zhig bzhin// gzhan yang gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dra dang ro// rig dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la brtson
gyur kyang// dkra bcom rang rgyal thog bral byang chub sems dga' na// dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam gzhag yin par shes par bya// sems can rnams dag sems can gang zag
gzhan gyi phyi'i// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin la brtson zhing rnam par rgyu// dper na bran ma bum thogs dbang med rje bo'i dbang// de bzhin dpa' rnams sems can kun
gyi dbang gis 'gro// spro ba byas sam 'on te rtag tu brtags kyang rung// branam rje ba la na zlog pa'i chog mi smra// bdag la desan gnod pa byas su 'ong snyam nas// shani
du skyag pa'i yid kyis 'jigs pas zil gyis non// de bzhin byang chub ched du byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ 'gro ba kun la bran gyur de bzhin gnas par bya// lung
gi yon tan rtogs pa yodas su rdzogs ma byed// shing las me byung ba yasashang de bsregs pa bzhin// bdag ga bde ba btang nas re ba med sems kyis// sems/
gzhan gyi dgos la nyin mtshan mngon par brtson// bu gcig lam na rim gro byed pa ltar// bsam pa thugs pas byad de skyo med gnas pa bzhin// sems can don dang
zhing sbyong brtson pa'i rnal 'byon pa// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod sems shing// skyo ba'i bla na rdul tsam gyi bar ma 'gyur ba// de ni g.yol med brtson 'grus
pha rol phyin la brtson// byang chub sems dpa' ma mkhas bskal pa bya grangs la// gal te ring bar 'dus shes sdug bsngal byang chub sgrub// chos sgrub byed pa'i cho na rab
du sdug bsngal 'gyur// de tshe brtson 'grus pha'il phyin nyamasal le can// zhi pa bla na med pa thob par bya snyam ste// byang chub mchog tu sems skyed theg mar
bskyod byas nas// nyin dang mtshan du de la yid gcig gnas byed pa// mkhas pa gsal ba brtson 'grus brtsams par rig par bya/ gal te la la 'daskadar ba
bshig la// phyi nas byang chub mchog thob bya zhes smras pa las// gal taskyo ba'i blo skyes ched du byed gyur na// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' le lo med par 'gyur// ci ste
cung zad 'di lta tsa smes blo skyes te// skad cig tsam la ri rab rtsal bar nag snyam na// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste// ring por mazigs
'dren par byang chub thob par 'gyur// yongs su s+sani bar byas la 'gro ba'i don bya zhes// gal te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson byed na//
bdag tu 'du shes gas pa la red 'gyur te// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las 'di 'gyur gnam sa bzhin// gang tshe lus dang sems dang sems can 'du shes med//
'du shes rnam par lag nas chos gnyis ma skyed pa/ 'di na byang chub ma nyams mchogazhi tshol ba yi// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ces phan pa mdzad pas gsungs// gzhan
las ngan du brjod pa'i tshig tshu la thos gyur nas// su skya su thos gang nas su la grang btang zhus// ma lus ma gu spyod byang chub soms dpa' mkhas pa de// bzod pa'i
rol phyin dang ldan pa mdzadas pa lani// myang chub sems dpa' gang zhig bzod pa'i legs chos ldan// gang zhig stong gsum ni chen bkang ste 'jig rten khams// sangs rgyas
rnams dang dgra bcom rang rgyal phul byas pa// sbyin pa'i phung pos de la bsod nams chad ma phod// bzod la gnas pa'i lus na yodas su dag 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gas
mtshan dang mthu stobs ba mtha' yas// sems can rnams la dad pa'i ches rab sgrog par byed// bzod pa mkhas la 'jig rten 'di nadaga' bar 'gyur// gal te sems
can la las tsan dan snyam bkang ste// bla ma 'a phangs pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang// gzhan zhig me mdag mgol 'thor pa gnyis ka la// de yis mnyam
zhung snyems pa'i yadin bskyed par bya// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas// sems bskyed de ni byang chub mchog tu yongs bsdos na// dpa'
bo bzod pas 'jig rten kun na dgra bcom dang// rang rgyal sems can khams kyi brjod kun zal myas non// bzod byed 'di snyam du yang sems ni bskyed bya ste// sems
dmyal dud 'gro gshAni rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal mang// 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyu yis 'dod gnod myong na// byang chub ched duca phyir du bzed ma bya snyam// lcag dbyig mtshon
dang gsad dang bcing dang rdug pa dang// mgi gnod pa dang rna ba rkang lag sna gtsod dang/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal janyid bdag gis bzed snyam pa// byang chub sems
dba'abazod pa'i pha rol phyin la gnas// zhu ba 'dod pa rnams ni khrims kyis byung ba yin// stobs bcu'i spyod yul gnasangashang tshul khrims nyams pa med// sdom
pa'i bya ba dzanyid kun gyi rjes su 'jug/ sems can kun la phan phyi de yang byang chub sde// gal terang rgyal dgra bcom byang chub 'dod skyed na// tshul khrims 'chal )
cing tshul mkhas de bzhin spyod pa nyams// ci ste byang chub zhi ba mchog tu yongs sngo na// 'dod yon brtson yang tshul khrims pha rol phyin la gnas// chos
gang nges pa'i byang chub yon tan 'byung med pa// de ni yon tan ches don ldan pa'i tshul khrims yin// chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa/ 'di ni tshul khrims
'chal ces rnam par 'drenapas gsungs// gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod yon lnga sbyod la// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs seng ste// sangs rgyas
'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed pa// mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas rig par bya// gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu// spyod cing rang rgyal dgra bcom
nyid la 'dod skyed na// de tshe tshul khrims skyon byung tshulakhrims nyams pa yin// sems bskyed de nang sa pham pas kyang shang tu lci// tshul khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs
snga la// de yas rlom sems med de bdag bstod ma byed cing// nga ya'adushes sems can 'du shes yongs sbyangs pa// tshul khris pha rol phyin gnas byang chub sems dpa'
brjod// gal te byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa// sems can 'di dag khrims ldan 'di dag khrims 'chal ces// sna tshogs 'dushes zhugs pa shin tu tshul
khrims 'chal// tshul khrims nyams shing de la longs dug tshul khrims med// gang la bdag gi'adu shes sems can 'du shes med// 'du shes 'dod chags bral la/
sdom pa ci phyir med// gang la sdom dang sdom pa ma yan rlom sems med// 'di na tshul khrims sdom pa'i rnam pa ru 'dren pas gsungs// sems can dag pa gang zhig 'di
lta'i khrims ldan pa// sdug dang ma sdug kun la lta ba med pa yin// mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang med// bdag pa thamasacad gtong zhung rtag tu
zhon pa med// chosa rnams rang bzhin bdag med ya ma b.rur shes nas// bdag ga sha yadu gtong zhing zhen pa'i sems med na// de las phyi rol dngos po gtong ba sgos
sridagos// gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas mni te// bdag dang bdug ga'i dngos po' 'du shes 'dod chags 'gyur// blun po rnams la gdeng ba'i glu lta ga la yod//
ser sna ya ngegs gnas su skye bar byed pa ste// rtse sa ma'i skyes na yang de tshadabul par 'gyur// de tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can dbul zhus na// gtong la/
mes par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhag pa gtong// gling bzhi lags par brgyan pa mchil ma'i thal ba 'dra// byin nas dga' bar 'gyur gyi gling thob de ltar min// byang
chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal pa sman byin na// san pa gsum gyi sems can ji snyedangasam byas te// de dag kun la snyon 'du phyin par gyur
cig sems// de yang 'gro ba'i den phyir byang chub mchog tu sngo// sbyin pa dran nas dngos por gnas par byed pa med// de na nam du'ang rnam par sman la re ba med// de ltar
gtong ba mkhas la thams cad gtong ba ste// chung ngugarta ngal dpag tu med pa mang por 'gyur// srid pa gsum na sams can ma lus ji snyed pa// yongs su brtag pa gzung
'tsho ste de dag thams cad kyis// 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcom rang rgyal la// bsal pa mtha' yas spyan byin nyan thos lcogs tshol na// byang chub sems dpa'
mkhas pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis// dudag pased nams bya ba'i dngos par yarenganas// sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs sbi na// yongs su sngo bas 'gro
ba thams cad zil gyis non// nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang// ban chen bi 'ad+ma gtsag dkun zil gyis non// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun// rjes
su yi rang byang chub sems dang sazalagyisanon// gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyin byinan// de la bdag ga'imabyid dngas pa 'phangs med na// de las dag pa'i rtsa ba mthu chen 'phel
[zo/ ]'gyur te// sprin med zla ba yar po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byang chub sems dpas sbyin pas yi dgasa'agro ba gcod// dbul ba dang na de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gcod// rnam par rgyu med
spyod mtha' yas yangs pa'athob// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems canasbyin pas yongs smin byed// khrims kyis dud 'gro 'gro bduma'i ngo bo srung// dusa rnams kun tu ma khom brgyad kyang rnam par sbang
bzod pas gzugs bzang dam brgya chen thob 'gyur to// gser mdogasdugatsang 'gro bas lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// brtson 'grus kyis dkar po'i yon tan 'grab ma'agyur//rgyal ba'i yang mdzad ye shesamatha' yas

thob par 'gyur// bsam gtan gyis 'dod pa'i yon tan smadu pa'adol/[u0f38]ga dang mngonapar shesadang tange 'dzin mngon par sgrub// shes rab kyis chos kyis rang bzhin yongs shes na//ngan song gsum po'i khams

gsum dag las shin tu 'da'// mi yi 'dren pa'i 'khor lo rin chenabaskor byas na// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyi'i 'gro la chosakyang ston// chos yongasardzogs byas nas byang chubusems dang ba de// yongs dag zhing dang

soms na dag pa yongs su 'dzani//sangs rgyas rgyud dang chos kyi rgyud kyang yongs su 'dzin// de bzhin dge 'dunargyud dang chos kun yongs su 'dzin// byang chub lam 'di shes rab bstan phyir brjod pa ste/'jag

rten dag zhand gso byed pa sman pa'i mchog/ ma ni yon tan thams cad sdud pa'i byang chub lam// lam 'dasems can thams cad kyis thob gyur cig/ shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyi ba khri brgyad stod pa las/ sdud pa
[♡ ]/tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o/// 'phags pa shasarapa pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bas pa lnga
bcu rtsa brgyud pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas/tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka'astsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ lags kyi bum
