gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chol bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rnagasakyi bu mo des/ji ltar byung chub sems dang 'aams dpa' chen po rtagotung/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa/

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asangs rgyas sgra dbyangs ma zad par sgrogs pa'i drang na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa 'di yongs
su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ljan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu ngu des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad yangs su tshol ba na/ jaltar yongs su btsal ba 'gas/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'dul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba na/ lus la ched che 'dzani/
srog la ma lta/ red pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshags su bcad pa dag la ma gnas par yongs su btsal bas longs su latsal to// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog
dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na/ bar snang las sgra thos par gyur te/ rigs kyakhu shar phyogs su song zhig dad/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/zhes lus ngal ba yadi labyed po/

ma skyed pa dang/ gnyid dang rmugs pa yadi la byed pam spyod pa dang/ bza' ba yid la byed pa ma skyed pa dang/ btung ba yadi la byed pa ma skyed pa dang/ mtshan mo yad la byed pa ma skyed pa dang/ nyin mo
yid la byed pa skyed pa dang/ grang bu yid la byed pa ma skyid pa dang/ tsha ba yid la byed pa ma skyid pade ltar song zhig/ nad dang phyi rol gang la'ang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi khu
g.yas g.yos su ma blta b.rasong zhig/ lce dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ steng dang/ 'og dang/ phyogs mtshams su'ang mabaltabar song zhig/ rigs kyi bu su nas 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma
g.yos pa dang/ tsa nas gzugs las kyang ma g.yosar dang/ ci nas tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltaraseng zhig/ gang las
g.yos par ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro// ca las nyams par 'gyur zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par gyur/
shug/ bden 'khor bal spyod do// gaba'akhor ba la sbyodapa da na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su ma 'thob bo// de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen po rtag tu dus/ smade la 'di skad ces saso// de bzhin du bya'o// de yi phyir zhe na/ bdag nasemasacan thams cad la snyad par byed par 'dod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ny+nyA thams cad bsgrubapar 'dod pa'i phyir ro//de skadaces smras pa dang/ sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tudu la 'di skad ces smas se// rtag tu ngu legs so legs so/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ang sgra thos te/'di skad durigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapa med pa'i chos dang/ la
mos ba bskyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o// khyed kyis mtshan ma yongs su sbyang bar bya/ dngos nga yongs su sbyang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongasasu snang

khya'o//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag spang bar bya'o/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ snyen pa med pa dang/ 'byung ba da nga/ maskyes pa dang/
wA dngos po med pa dang/ ma 'gags pa'i tshesams ston ba dag la bsnyen bar bya/bsten pa'i bya'o/ khasnyen bkur bya'o/'gas kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrubs na/ 'di ma thogs pa shes rab kyi
pha 'du zhi ba glegs bam du chud pa 'am/ dge slong chos skya pa'i las la yod pa thos pas 'gyur te/gas kyi bu gang la las shes rab kyi ra rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pade la zigs kyi bu khyod
kyis ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing/ khyod kyi phusal gzob dang/ byas pachor ba byas te/ gangalas shes rab kyi pha rol tun pa 'di zlos pa 'di ni de dag gi dge ba'i bshes gton yin te/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gis thos pas myur du sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir maldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams la sa sten pa 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin shegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// ma lomo pa rnams sprod par 'gyur ro// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thol
ba'agyur ro// rigs kyi bu phan yon da rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la/ dge slong chos sa pa la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang
ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud las/ dge slong chos sku pa'aphyi bzhi'i 'byung khar mkhyeki khyod kyis dge slong chos skya ba las don dugal ba dang 3 chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'bring bar
bya'o khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig canan cing chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro
bya@#// dang reg pa dag bsten pa dang/ bstan pa dang/ sbrad par bya ba'i phyi'i dpar bsgrub te/ de dag des zil gyis mnan nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing bstan pa/
dang bsnyen par byed pa'ang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyodakyis chos sna ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par ma bya'o// gzhan du na somasa'ad lhan paskyed par bya ste/ bdagan thabs mkhas pa de ma shes kyi//
wA 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rang du shes so// 'di'i sems can gyi tshulagyis sems can rnams kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir[]chos 'di dag la rten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyis/
byang chub sems dpasems dpa'achen pa rnams na gangala'ang chags pa 'am/ sgrib pa med kyis/ skad cig de nyin la 'gos kyi bu khyod kyis yang dag pa'i tshul se ser rtog par bya'o// rigs

kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshulagang zhen/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kun nas rten medas pa ma yin/ rnam par spyad pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad zhi ngo bshad kyis stong pa'i
phyir te chos thams cad ni sams can med pa/sog med pa// gang zag med ba/ sgyu ma lta bu / rmi lam lta ba/ brag ma lta bu / mag yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi buchos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar

rtogatsang chos smra ba'i phyir 'bar na/ radi peramathogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin paMl nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'gas kyi bu khyod bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal to

[/ ]chosasma ba dag ngashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rogs bu la bltos par byed cade ma sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyi'i dpyad par ma ba ste/ gzhan du na chos don duganyer ba nyid dad/
sa la gus par byedab[”]de dang/ yid ma skyo bas dge slong chos skya pa'i phu bzhin du 'phung bar bya'ozhes thos so// de nas byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/
sgra de larjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang/ 'di par ma pa na par de 'di snyam du sams te/bdag gis spu da lajo srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam nas/ das
phyogasad nyid na du zhing mya ngan byed de skye zhing 'dug go/ de sa phyogs de nyin zhag gcig 'dus par byed/ nyin zhag galtas sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ lta'am/bdun 'das kyang/ shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur kyi bar du/ lus ngal pa yadi la byed pa ma skyid/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yade labyed pa maspyod/ bza' ba yid la byed pa ma skyid/ btung ba yadi la rtsod pa cha
spyod mtshan mo yid la byed pa la skyid/ nyin mo yade la byed pa ma skyod/ grong ba yid la byed pa ma byed/ tsha ba 'di la bye dpag skyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dparan skyes bu la la zhag bu dag
pa'achi ba'i dus khyas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid ma bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ delta bu'i mngan gyi bu bdatsamu yade'akhyobacud bamagatogs par yid la khyad par gzhan gang yang
mi 'byung ngo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tsho/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam/
ba ma gtogs par yid la byed po gzhan gang yang ma 'byung ngo// rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du/de bzhonagasheg
ba'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byon te/ rigs kyi bu khyed tshig de skad smras pa legasas legasaso// jiltar khyod kyis de ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du ston gyi de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i

phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang/ spro ba 'di dang/ don du gnyer ba 'di dang/ 'dod pa 'di lta bu s rjes su 'brang zhing/ shar phyogasanyid du song zhig dang/ rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/
sbyos ldan zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas ba/ 'baram pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ bos rim pa bdun dang shing ta la'i 'phreng rin pa bdun gyis longs su bskor ba/tshur dpag tshad
bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa ) khyor ba/ rgyas pa/ bde ba la legs pa 2 skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ grong b.radad srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor
bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyams ma nga ba dang/ bar bar dag tuzam pa brtags pa/ grong khyer gyi khor yugazhu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun legs par byas shing bskor la//

rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba de dag gi mda' yab rnams ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa ) mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa/ mda' yapa thams cad kyi skyo ma las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing skyes
te rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing thog ga 'brasabu chags pa ) mda' yab las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang/ rin po che'i bla byungab mda' yab cig shos gzhanadang 'brel ba/ grong khyer
thams cad gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas khebs te/ gser gyi labugayer kha de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba/ 'di lta ste// dper na yan lag lta/
dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra 'jam zhing snyanal yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung bde bzhin du/ ril bu g.yer ba de dag la rlung gis btaban sgra'adzam

zhing snyamal yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de'i kho yug tu 'obs chu bab pas gang zhing/ chu ha cang yadam grang/ rda rung ba'o

bas gang ba dag yod do// chude la sngonagyirnam par smin pas grub pa'in po che snabadun gyi gru dag khod de/der sems can dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing rab tu rgyu'o// chu de thams cad kyang me tog ut+pal
sha@#// dang ku mu ta dang/ pad+madakar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog cigs che zhing bzang la dri zhim ba'i dad dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog ga regs las/ de na med pa gang yang med do// grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che snabadunalas byas pa/

zla rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug par sha stag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yodapa ) rdzing bu de dag gi khor yugathams cad nasarin
pochos bdun gyi me tog ut+pal dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs shing/ me tog ul dang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma dkar po

de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i pad la tsam ste/ sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bu r ston pa/ 'od g+hon po 'byung ba/ ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser po lta bu r ston pa/ 'od ser po 'gyur
ba dmar po/kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lta bu r stonab/ 'od damar bo'abyung ba/ dkar po/ khadog dkar po da dkar po lto bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do// rjed bu de dag thams cad
na ngang ngur dang/ khrung khrung dang/ bya ka ran da dang/ gzhan sgra'abyin pa dag yod do// skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing/ rigs su gcad pa med de/'di ltarasems
[o/ ]can dag yun ring bo shes rab kyis zol sbyin pa la spyod cing/ yun ring po chos zab mol mos pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam pa smin pas grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu grong khyer

de dag gi dbus kyi bzhi mdo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khad pa rin po che snabadun las byas pa/ khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa// rnam par bkra zhing blta/

na sdug pa/ rab zhim bdunang/ ta la'i 'phreng bdun gyis modas su bskor ba zhig yod do// khad pa de na khang pa'i yang srid du rtag tu phab dgatsazhes bya ba'i skyed mosatshal dad/ rgyadanamed ces bya ba dang/

mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang/ me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang/ skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re ma'ang/ nga bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang/ bzang mchog

ces bya ba dang/ dga' ba zhes bya ba dang/ dga' mchog ces bya ba dad bde ba zhes bya ba dang/ bde ldan zhes bya ba dang/ nges bzhes bya ba dang/ mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/rdzing bu de dag gi
ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ sa gnyis ni dngul las byas/ ngos gsum ni birma las byas/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/ nang gi sa gzhi la ni ke ke ru la byas ba'i bye mkhardal ba ste/ rdzing bu/
de dag re re la'ang them skasazem pa rinapo che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan po brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nasakyang 'dzamabu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa
dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mu da ngang 1 ut+pal dang ]badro dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing )pang dur dang/ khrung khrung dang/ bzhad rnams

skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gangashing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing de dag la rlung gis bskyod pa dang/ me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du ltung bas/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu

'datsan dan gyi drir phyogasashing kha dog dang ldan no// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'a 'gas 'kho'o dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stod dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang

ltar zhing 'byor te/ rtsedaga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de nasems can skyes pa dang/ bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam skyed bu dag ni rtag tu dga' zhing
'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur ba dado// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nape chos 'phags 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste dga' mgur spyod

cing/ de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa ston to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan du 'khod pa de dag kyang/ grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang/ dngul gyi rkang pa dang/ baiDUrma'i rkang pa dang/ shelagyi rkang pa btsugs pa gshing bal bting ba/ stananang tshangs can bting ba/ steng snying bo can du byas pa/ ka'i

ka'i ras bting ba 3 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng gi bar snapal ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing/ de ltar chos la gus bar byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang me tog kha
dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing/ sa phyogs de'ang skyes sna tshogs dang/ 'dug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed ba/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug/
nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag de lta bu r gus par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun
te/den gangadag nyan pa'ilha dang/ mi dang/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po// srog chags stong phrag mang po/ srog chagasa'abum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las/ la la ni klog slob/ la la ni 'dzin/
la la ni 'chad/ kha cig nib+bos/ la la ni lung nod/ la la ni kha ton byed/ lal ni yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yod la byed pas rtog par byed de/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang
leg par mi ltung ba'i chos can/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i
drud du sopazhig red/ de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos bar 'gyur// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring panas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yod dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub yang dag par ston ba/ gang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu des

kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba de bzhinadu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyen mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma gcad kha song zhig dang/ rid por mi
thogs pa za shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// denas budachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de thos nas dga' mgur yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing
dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes par gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis thog na yid la byed pa gzhan gyi skyesakyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa zug
du 'byin pa'i snyanapa bdag gis nam redasnyam sems pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tudu ang )gangabadagal shes rab kyi bcol tuphyin pa de thos par byed
cing : chos gang zos nas bag ga dmigs pa yid la byed pa song bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs bar chos gang yang yid la ma byedado/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ chos thams cad la mi gnas ba'i 'du shes bskyed nas/de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma na ngon du gyur pa 'di

lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi dobe nyidi la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bod mdamigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad mishes pa dang bral ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzinadang/ chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthob zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinadang/ chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes

bya kha'i ting 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad me reshes ba sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinadad/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i tid pa'adzin dang/ me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang/ chos thams cad bdag gi dngos bo ma sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzinadang/ sgyu ma rnam par spud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sbyabab zhes bya ba'i tid de

'dzin dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ choso thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su sengabazhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin dang/ skudad/ 'bu dang/ 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i teng 'dzin dang/ ma khengs pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dad/ mid dang/ nges ba'i sgra ngang/ 'bru zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad l rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad la sprib

sbu ba med pa'i mtha'azhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha'adwang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzugs kyi rdul sel bzhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang/ rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos kyi dbyings las des kha'abyung ba zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin dang/ shugs

'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang ) seng ge mngon par sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'a rten dang sems can thams cad zil gyis gnonaMbazhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rngul med pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bad+ma bkod bzhes bya ba ni nying de 'dzin dang/ nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sId po
thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhesabya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'don par shes pa dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa kho

bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes byakha'i ting 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad bye brag

med pa' ltakha zhes byakha'i teng 'dzin dang/ lta bar gyur pa'i thobs pa thams cad rnam par song ba sa bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin dpa/ mun pa dad bralab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad/

mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ le lo thams cad dang bral zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos zab mo'i
'od byed ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ mi'aphrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes khyu

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'jig rten bdasum la mngon par mazhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od kher sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
rnams mngon du gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamA na) sangs rgyasabcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dga' chen po dag la shes rab kyi kha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'batu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung bar mdzadade/tshig 'di dag kyang gsus

so/ rigs kyi khu ded kyi sa kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodabar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal to// yongs su tshol ba na'ang ting de 'dzomi'adi dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag
thob nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to// khyed kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngob

nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam par gzhag pa 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ byang chub tusbyod pa 'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dgapar rjes su ma mthong do// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi
byed ba la gas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'drab 'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang/ 'od 'dom gang ba dang/ sangs

rgyas kyi shes dang/ sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha
rol tu phyin pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang chod gzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bsan khyod kyis

tshos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang/ 'dun pas nus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang/ 'dunapa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub red par
dka' bas yin no// khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus kha bskyed bar bya'o// 'bangs par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis longs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyago/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rtag tu so 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags ) de dgagis ) del 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod yuna'ang banas byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po ches 'thags kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su gzung ste/ shes rab kyi b.rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas
bal khaslabs so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis/ sa khyod la ci bsob bzhin du zung zhig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa 'am/ bskal bganyis sam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang ma gol thod bzhin du thogs shing/ bde ba'i yo byad
thams cad kyis ma gro byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dridad/ bo dang/ reg ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang/ rigs kyi bu
0// khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu de'i ma/u0f74sa khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag red par gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs
la mkhas kha blos shing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par gyur to// denas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen po rtag tu du dbugs
sh+tsa byung nas mi snang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de'ang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/ las nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhinagashegs pa de dgagang nason/ de bzhin gshegs pa
de dag gang du bzhud su ma ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po tshos
'khags ni gzungs thobal/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste// bdag yos su 'dzin pa/ bdag gdage ba'i bshes gnyen yun ring po nas
sa bdag gi don byas ba yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos 'a lags kyi tung du mngon par song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegasab de dgagangs byon/de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam ma// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtagaca du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos 'phags la dga' badang/ dad pa dad/ rimo dang/ gus pas khyab nye bar gzhag ste/ nye bar bzhag nas 'a de snyamadu sems so// bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur sti bya bas/ byong
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdagani dbul te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ bdagabakur stir byakha'i
gos rin po che 'am/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DU'am/ dung ma/ man shel lam/ byi ru'am/ dbul lag/ sale sbram mam/ me tog gam/ spos sam/
me tog 'phreng ngam/ byug pa 'am) gdugs de lta bu'i nga bdag la med na/ bdaga'adi bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni/ bdag gis
tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am/ rangs pa'ang mi skye'o snyam sems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i
yon tan dag dad/ bla ma la gus pa med la byed pa dad ldan pas song nas/ mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang/ de'i grong bar dbus su 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag gis
lus btsongasal de'i rin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapa tshosa'aphags labakur ste go/ yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig ceng zad de btsongos la/ 'khor ba dpag tu
dmed ba na'adod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang/ 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'dilta bu'i sems
can chen bal 'akur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar du 'dug ste/ mi su 'dod mi su'adod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad
kyis bos go/ de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du semasate/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'adi ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdaganyid btsos nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byedacing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na/ myur du bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ thos brgyamatsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed/ sems can gzhan dag kyang pa'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/bdag gis 'di la bar chad
bya'o sAm nas/ bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mi su 'dod/ su nga rtobar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra ma shos
la 'gyur bde lta bu r shes su bsgribs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dugang gi tshe bdag nyob ma red pa de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi
ma byung ste/ 'di ltarab dag gi lus btsongs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags la bkur sti bya suman/ lus nyo ba'ang bdag gis ma red de/ kye ma bdag ni rungapa
ngan po re da dosnyam go/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'jug
galus mos su gtang ba lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs ba yin nam ma yin nga 1 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis bgar par bya'o sAn ste/ lha'i
dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po rtag tu yul 'di skad ces smras so// rigasakyi bu khyed 'di ltar ya de ma dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi ma 'byung ba ci nyes/ des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo ni tshos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid/
btsongs te chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de kho bas ma rnyed nas/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus
btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag galus nyo ba'ang
ma red do snyam mo// denas bram ze'i khye'u des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo la misani bya ba med kyis/ kho
bo mchod sprin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang/ khrag dang/ rus pa dang/ rkang dag kho bo la dgos na/ de'i rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rtag tu ngu 'di sumadu sems te/ gang bdag gsabram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang/ khrag drad/ rus pa dang/ rkang nyo ba red pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par red do// bdag ni
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa la yongs su rdzogos par gyur to snyam ste// de semams dga' ba dang/ sems bde ba dang/ sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u

la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin durtsi'adod sbyin nozhes byas ba dang/ des de la 'di
skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gad yongs su gtang ba de kho bo la byin cig/ denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po phyogs nas lag
ba g.yon pa phug ste khrag gzags so// bar g.yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'adzudarusod do// de nas tshong dbon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug
pades/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtagazhu du brla sha med par btogs nas/ rus pa gtsug cu lcag pa'i drud dusong ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyamadu sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di tsi'i

phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag khyed ba/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag cu dug lab
der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrug dang/ rus pa dang/
skapar des ci zhig bya/ rtag tu dus bu la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u 'dril btsungs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya'o/ 'phags pa byang chub semA dpa' sems dpa'
chen po tshos 'phags la'ang bsnyen bku'abya'o (de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod
'di ltar bdag gi srid dang/ khrag dang/ rus pa dad 1 nang ya nga btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur ste bya bar 'dod pa/khyongal yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des
de la snas ba/ bu mo rig kyi bu de ni gangal khe bas bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/ kho bos de labaslabs na/ bla na med pa yang//
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas nas/sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyikhadog lta bu 'ang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chenapo'i mtshan sum
cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'od 'adom gang ba dang/ 'od zeramatha' yas pa dang/ byams pa chen pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms tshon po dang/ ma'i dzegs pa bzhi dang/
ny+nyo so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lta dang/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/
ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sems can thams cad lakun tu bgo bsha' bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che'ang bcu thob bar 'gyur ro/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtab gtudul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po' de dag yongs su brjod pa ni

ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re'i'i phyir yang bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dulus yosasu gtang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su
brjodan/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur ste bya ba'igaser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ be rtama'am/ dal lam/ me tog gam/
bdug pa 'am/ spos sam )me tog 'a phrengs/ khyug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed/
bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags gal ba der dodol/ bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu/ 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos de dag thob pa'abya ba'i
phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i chakhyad mi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bo rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'daskad ces smras so// rigs kyi bukhyod de ltar yi dam la brten pa ni legs so legs so// 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhasab yongs su rdzogs par
mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngonapar rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// gas kyi bu kho bol snyade dang/ khrag dang/ rus pa dang/ rkang gi bya ba med kyis/ kho bos khyod sad
pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dam pa slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la dag pa jalta bu zhig sbyin par bya/ des de la smras pa/ brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos blon me da pa dag/
bdagal stsol cig/ brgyabyin gyis smas pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di kho bo'i yul du gyur ba ma yin te/ yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ dam pa gzhanaslos
shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dus sbas pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par khyaba'i gnas 'di la ni lha'i dbang pabartson pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha'i dbang pabadag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin
gyis brlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas
rgyas rnams kyis lung bstanacing/ bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen ce na/bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag galus sngon bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang/ skad cig thang cig mud

tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yos su dag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyis de bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya/
byin slobs pa med par gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul lan glan par slobs pam skyes nas/de nyid du ma snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi khu
mdos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu yul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ kho mo'i khyim gal ba dera'adong ngo// kho mos pha ma lus nor blangs te/nges shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur sti bya ba sbyin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
du dang/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas/ de rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo debadagagi khyim du phyin pas/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum gser dang/
dngul dang/ rin po che dang/ nor bu dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danadang/ la
mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo lnga brgya'adi dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsolaM/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag caga'aglog
te/byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ de'ang bdag cag lachos ston par 'gyur ro//
[/ ]bu mo de'i pha mas 'di skad ces smras so// bum byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de su zhig/ bu mo rigs kyi bu dedaltar gang na 'dug/ bu mos smras pa rigs kyi bu de da ltar
skol gyi rlung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu denelhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'dilta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag
rtam mchis pa las thar bar gyi ba 'tshal bas/ de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongos la/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur ste brgya bam 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyob su'ang ma byung ste/ desdug bsngal zhi yid mi bde nas/ ma dga' bar sems shing mas te/des pa'i lus
'tshong bar 'dod na lus skyob ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang/ brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ de la 'di skadadu rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis
pa dang/ rtag tu ngunges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags de la'ang bkur stabya// pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamA
nide las rag las pas/'dilta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang/ brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas 'di skad ces sas so// khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/ngamachod sprin zhig
byed pa der mi'i snying dang/ khrag dang/ rdus pa dang/ rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang/ rigs kyi bu des ma ma sad pa'i ril 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras pas/ de mtshon rnon bo thogs te zag/
galag pa phug nas khrag gzags/ b.ra'ishabatogs te/rus pa gtsug tu song nas/ phyogasagacig tu 'dug ste/rus pa dang rlung sbyin no snyam nas/de khreg gzugs pa bdag khang pa'i yang thob/
namachis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// mi 'de ci'i slad du 'di ltar bdaganyid lan tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad bgyisaso// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar
bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang/ de bdag la de skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang/ snying dang/ rus pa dang/ nang sbyin no//de ci'i phyi zhen/

ngani dbul te/ pal nor gzhan ci'ang med do zhes mchi'o// bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dag dbadag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
mchod par bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'ozhes mchanas/ bdag gis 'dik+kad bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tanagyi rnam ba 'am
khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams 'batu ston par 'gyur
go/ 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyurarozhes mchi// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsamagyis ma khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang/ rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas/'do/
snyam bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni shin tu dka' bar bgyid pa ste ngomatshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtodan/
bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen bo dag yod la/ ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa ma bgyi/ 'di ltabu'i gnas dgal smon lam pa'i phyi ma gdab snyam nas rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces
bgyi sas// rigs kyi bu khyod bdaganyidal 'di lta bu'i na tsha dgu ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa gang gis zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos 'phags la bkur su bya ba'i nor
mang bo dag khyod la sbyin no/ bdagakyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos 'bags ga la ba der mchi'o/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de lamachod par
bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o zhes bgyishing mchisan/lab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po bdag lastsal du
gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyid do// ka'aphags pa shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stodapa lasabam po lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa/// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas/bu mo de la 'di skad ces smAs so// rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bskrun
pa lasan/ chos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las bye bragachu ra lags pa/ sems can thams cad bdeb thob par byed ba len te/rigs kyi bu do'i phyir

de lta bu'i dka' kha'i gnas la spro bar byed na/ khyod red kyis gnang gis bu mo ded kyang khyod dang lhan cag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo tshes la bags blta zhing mchod du ded kya da'agros
ded 'gro ba'i skabs phye zhig/ de nas bu med byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lamachod par bya ba dang/ bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha mal 'di skad ces

smras go/ bdag ni dge ba'i phyog sagang gi'ang bar chad mi bgyid do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta la ra rgyabang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to//rgyan gyis
brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshanadang/ bdon dag glogos/ gser dang
gyi me tog dag thogs )rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag kyang thogs te/bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ myang bamang po mang du bskur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rtag tu dudang shing rta gcig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ pha mal sogs pa 'khor mang po dang/ shar phyogs la
der logs su dong ste/ mthar gyis sangob dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan 'ane bachos narnam par bkra babaltan sdug pa las
mkhan gyir ba rim pa bdun gyis bskorab/ rtababs 'dun med pada' bas 'omabadun dang/ tala'i 'phreng rim bdunagyas yag sgra kaud tal 'a pheng rim bdun gyis losasu bskorab tshu dpag tshad bcu gnyig/ zhed

dbag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/'byor cing rgyas pa/ bdeb/lo legs ba/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong b.radang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lta brgyudag gis ri mor bris pa bzhinadugatamA ba/khyogs
khri nyams mi nga ba dang/ bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa legs par byas pa mablong ngo// de'i dbus kyi zhimado nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achenapotshos 'phags chos kyi khrol 'dugab 'khor

brgya phrag du ma dang/ stong phrag du ma dang/ 'bum phragadu mas yongasasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos 'chad pa mthong ste dmathong mthag tu de dga' ba dang bde ba thob pa 'delta ste/dper na dge

[t]/ slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig yid lakhyed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/bdagashing rta'inang du zhugs bzhin du/ byang chub sem dpa' semAdapa' chen po chos
'bags kyi drud du 'gro ba ni bdag gis mi cha'o snyam nas/ denas shari rta de las babs pa dad/ tshod dpon gyi bu mo dang/ bumo lta brgyad dag mnyam du shing rta de las babs so// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen portag du/ chong dbon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bumol brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bkod pa tshad med pa dang/ byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen te
chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo/ 'i tsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che snabadun las
byas pa/tsan dan dmar pos brgyan cing/ mu tig gis dra bas g.yogs pazhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsogs bde'i grwa bzhin nor bu rin po che bzhag bar gyur te/de dag sgron me'i bya ba byed do///
'dug sposakyi snod dalalas byas tsabazhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te/'dilta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro'o/tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis 'dug par byed do// khang

ba brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs pa de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhibazhaganas/de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la/baiDUrlabazhugs
bris ba bcug ste/khang bu brtsegs pa dang don gyi chun bo sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag/

cadu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te bu ma lnga brgya dang bcas pas/ khang pa brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong/ lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong// lha'i dbang bo brgya byin ma lha'i
me tog man da ra dang/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ lha'i gser phye dang/ lha'i dal sil ma dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong// lha'i sil snyan dag kyang
thos so// mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu dus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po khyod lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag dang/ rin
bo'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'dil ce'i phyir me tog man da ra dang tsan danagyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing mngon par 'thob/ mngon par b tu 'bob/lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams bar snang

zla ci'i phyir rdung/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces gas so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shesarab kyil sogatu phyin
pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yun yongs su 'dren pa yin te/'dil bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achin bo dgayon tan thams cad kyi kha phol tu phyin pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du 'thob par 'gyub yin na khyod mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag/
cus/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la'adi skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugA/
brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de khad pa brtsegs pa 'de'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la be DUr bzhu bas bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rgya bdun gyis btab
nas bzhag ste/ nged kyis khyod la bstan par dka' 'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du/ tshod dpon gyi bu la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs
nas/ de dag gis me tog dang/ me tog 'phreng gi chun po dang/ gos rin po tshadang/ bdug pa dang/ spros dang/ me tog 'a phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gser dang/ dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas ti/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyirashasashas kyis bzhag go de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ me tog
@#/ 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ bye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyal mtshan dang 3 ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyis rol tu phyin bal sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byachub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga lab der dong ste phyin nas// chos la mchod ba nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spros dang/
me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ tsan dan gyi bye ma dang/ gser dang/ dngul gyi me tog dag gis gto'o man par
gto/ mngon par rab tu gtor te// de nas me togade dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phagasakyi spyi bo'i stengan me togagi khar babartsegAb zhig tu gyur to/
gser dang dngul gyi me tog dganam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'jug par gyur to// chos gos dang/ gos rin po che de dgakyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis+sen gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor ba 'jug la
gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtagatududang/ tshong dbon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lta brgya de dag gis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos bu gsakyi rdzu 'phrul
gyi 'a phul de lta bu mthong nas/de dag 'di snyam du sems te do'atshan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'khags 'di'adi ltar rdzu 'khrul mozhing/ de ltar mthu che/'diltar gzi ba deNe

ste/rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa zhan du rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa re 'dra bar
gyur snyam go// de nasatshong dbon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'bag la dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/de dag thams
cad kyis na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyedade/'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma'ongs pa'i dusan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodab na'ang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob bar gyur
bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodopa na'ang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sumadu gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la'ang 'di ltar khyodachub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
bo chos 'phags la bkur sti byedapa 'di bzhin du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du/
bdag cag kyang skye bo mang bol ston par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshes 'apagasa'adishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs
su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yodasasu rdzogs par shog cig ces smras go
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogasala'u ma lnga brgya de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal mchod pakhyas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa tshos 'thags la'ang bkur su byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'gas kyi rkang pa la mgo nges phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes byed nga
thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'jug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phagasal/ byang chub na masadapa' sems dpa'achen po rtag tudus

'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog gonapa lta phyin pa na sgra thos pa/gas kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gas sgra de khros nas shar phyogs ga la ba der logs su mchis nasa'adisnyamadubasams te/ bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mas bar bgyi/su las shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyinab mnyan ced red par 'gyur ba madris sa snyam ste/ des bdag mde mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas// sa phyogasade nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te// de ltar shin tu gdung bas

[o ]bras la sems pa nim byung gi/ gzhan na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa red par gyur sgra

de la ma dris so snyam pa dang/ de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku galcags shig byung ste/ de 'di skad gsung ngo// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang/ grong khyer spos ldan
zhes bya ba denabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te deb zhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag

gis 'di thos nas piltar gtams 'bazhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang/ rgyang ring mo zhiganas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste mthongam thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes
dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang bo la zhugs pa bzhin te/bdagadaga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba des khyab bar gyur nas/sa phyogs de nas mi bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos se/

de nyan pa na ting de 'dzin gyi sgo mang poskyes par gyur to// bdag den mchis pa naphyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasakyi dbugA dbyudabamadzad de/ rigs kyi bulegs so
legs so// khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag shes rab kyi bcol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/mi gnas pas red kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so zhes/ de bzhin gshegs
[: ]@#// bde dag gis bdag la gin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to// bdag kyang ti le'adzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas khyon
[】 ]dbazhin gshegs pa de dag gang dubazhudasam mo// denas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a phag sar chos 'phags ni sngon gyi rgyal bal 'gyib bgyis
la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrunal/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs mkhas pal shinatubaslabs pa lags te/ ded bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du
bzhud padebadagal ston par 'gyur ro snyamanas/rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshags ba de dag gang nason pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud babadag 'drin/canas bdag de bzhin

gshegA la de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa'atshal cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthod ba dang mi 'bral ya'a'agyur bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dgo na pa dang bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
pa[@ ]phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/rtag par rab tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o// de skad ces smos pa dang/ byang chub semA da pa' sems dpa' chen po tshos 'phags kyis//byang
chub semA da'asems dpa' chen po rtag tutu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs gyi bde bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/gang du'ang ma bzhud de/de bzhin nyidalas ma g.yos so/de bzhin nyid

gad yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegako/ rigs kyi bu ma skye ba la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba me dade/mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'o ba'am/'gro'amedade/mang dag pa'i/

mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi khu stong pa nyid la'ong ba 'am/'gro ba red de/ stod pa nyid gang yin pade ni de bzhin gsheg pa'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin 'ga'o dba'am/'gro ba med de/ ji lta
ga bzhin gang yin bden dbazhin gshegs pa'o// cigs kyi bu'adod chags dang bral bal 'od b 'am/ 'grokha medade/'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni dbazhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog
bal 'obasam 'gro ba med de/'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi khu nam mkha'i khams la 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba med de/nam mkha'i khams gang yin bden dbazhinagashegs pa/
gas kyi'u chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pagudan medade/rigs khyi'u chos 'di dgag bzhin dgang yin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gangayin pa'adi ni de bzhin nye dgacig pa ste//
rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyis su khya'amedo// rigs kyi de bzhin nyid gcig ste 'di lta ste/med ba'i phyir gnyis sam/gsum dbagrang ba sa 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dilta ste/ dper na mi
nyims gdug pas/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la/nyi ma gung gdusal bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgyugayo kha mthong nas/ der chub nga ngo de dang der rgyugan/rigs kyi bu'adirisnyam du sems te/tshud gang nas 'ongs/
sha da gang du song/ chu shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am/lho phyogs kyi rtsamatsho'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i ma/ byang phyogs kyi rgyum tshogar du song/ rtag tu dus smras pa/gas kyi bu smig rgyu
'chum mchisan/'dab 'am/'gro khag la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu mo nyi mas gdungs shing/ byis pa'i rang bzhin can/shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis smog mthong nas/ chu mamachis
pa la rgyus shes bskyed kyi/) la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchisaso// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// dede bzhinate/ de bzhin du rigs khyi'u gsu dag de bzhin gshegs pa la
gzugs sam/ smrar mngon par zhen par byed ba de dag ni/ bzhinagashegs pa la khyon pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog go/ gang de bzhinagashegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud bar rtog pa de dag thams
cad ni phyis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa rang bzhin can zhes bya ste// dper na mdachu med pa la chur 'ashes bskyed pa bzhin no//de ci'i phyir zhen/de'azhin gshegs panagazugs kyi skur
mi lta ste// de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid na 'o ba 'am/ 'gro' me dade/ rigs kyi bu dbazhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa 'am/bzhud ba medudo// rigs kyi bu

lho 'di la hU~M/per na sgyu masprul pa glang bo che'i tshogs sam/rta'i tshogs sam/shing rta'i tshogs sam/ bung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am/'grob med do// rigs kyi bde bzhin du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
skul 'od khyonab 'am/bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dadaper na skyes 'ganyid kyis log pa'i rnalamadude bzhinagashegs bgacigagar/dganyis sam gsul bzhi'am/lnga 'am/ bcu nas/nyishus/
sum cu'am/ bzhi'asu 'os/ lnga bcu 'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las/ sad pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthongon rigs kyi bu'adi snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
dag gang nas byon/ gang du bzhud/ rtag tu dus smras pa/rigs kyi bu melam yas gang yadagrub pa ma gda' 'o// lamaniTun te ya dgapa ma lags go/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/rigakyi bu
de de bzhin te chos thams cad ni de bzhinagashegs pas rmi lam lta bu zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang gudagade bzhinagshegs bas/ chos thams cad milam lta bu r yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du

bstan par mi shes pa de dag ni/ ming dang mtshan gyi sku dang gzugs kyi skur mngon bar zhen pa byedade/deltachos nyid mi shes pas de bzhinagashegs pa lakhyonapa dang/ bzhudakharartog go/ gang dag der zhe
gshegs pa la byon pa dang/ bzhud bar 'dod pa'i byis pa'i so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'grobacugakha'adong ba/'dongab/'dod bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad nisangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur ko/ yang rtags kyi bu gdadag chos thams cad rmilam lta bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
thams cad lam lha khuko/ zhes lad dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu bstan par shes ba de dag ni/chos gang la'ang 'odo ba 'am/'gro ba'am/skye ba'am/ 'gag pa mi rtog go/
gang dag chos nyid 'dakong ba'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am 'gagapar mi rtog pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pachos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab
cung shes pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par mi rtog go/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu 'bacu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinab la spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyi nyan thos de dag ni/ khul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yodapar za ste/de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi
spyin gnas go/ rigs kyi 'u'adi lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dgayodabani shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongos/lho dang nub dang/ byad dang/ phyogs mtshams dang/ skyed dang daleg

dang dogs pacu gang nas kyang ma 'os mod kyi/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas/ rgyamatsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag byung ste de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma yin mod kyi/ rgyu dang/

rkyen dad gzhi la rag las pa yin te brten nas byung ngo// mi kho tsho dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagang du'ang mi 'pho med kyi rkyenadi dag yod na rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do rkyen de dag med na
ri bo che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro// rigasakyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon bar grub 'go gang nas kyadam khyonadogs bcu'i 'jig rten gda'adam bzhud do//

rgyas bcom ldan ' sa de dag gi sku rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te/ston u0f7cbas yongs su grub pa min pas/ rgyu rkyen la rag las ba stonagyi 'phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyen

rnams go dan skumangon bapa'i grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub par sad mi snad do// rigs kyi khur te lta ste// dper na pi wang gi sgra byung ba'ang gnas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gag 'gang

lad me'agro/ gang du'ang ma 'a poste/parten nas 'byung brgyu la rag las da rkyen la rag las pa'o// 'delta ste/ li thang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ rgyud la brten/ shing bu la brten sgyurten

lakharten/mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas dogi wade las sgra byung ste sgra'ang pi wang gakhegapalas ma byung/ pags pa las ma byung/ rgyudalas mkhyung/ shing bulas nakhyud/ rgyud rten las la

byung/ ma las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra mkhyung mekyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgra grag la/ sgra de 'gag pa'ang gang du'ang ma 'gro ba de bzhinadu/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi sku longs su 'khrub pa 'ang rgyu la'ag lasal/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa btums yongs su grub pa yin te ) gcig gis ma yin/ rkyenagacig gis ma yin/ ge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis

[z/ ]@#// sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no// rgyudadarkyen mang po tshogs pa las 'byung ba yin te/de ni gnas kyang sa khyon te/rgyudang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang

gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag khyonapa dad bzhud pa de ltar blta'o/ rigs kyi bu tshos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'de bzhin du bod du chud par gyis

shig/ rigs kyi lu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na me da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyura'o// de bzhin gshegs khyonapa dang bzhud pa med pa 'bashad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo khachen po byung
ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pajug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ (gsangos/ rag tu la/yos// kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul
to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing su bkong bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ nags tshal jigyed yod pa de dag thams
cad: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags gal ba der logs su rab tu dad par gyur to// dus ma yin pa'i me tog kyad steng gibar snang las 'thor zhing ) me tog gi cha
dag kyakhab bo/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po bzhi dag kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtagatul lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/ lha'i me tog ga gi sher/ ton/
pa 'thor/ mngon bar 'ab skya'athor zhing/ tshig 'di skad ces gas kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang/ don dam pa las byung ba'i gtama'ajig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/gang
'jig tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan ba thos gozhes 'tsher to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' semA
dpa' chen po rtag tu sa 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyibs g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di rgyu gang pags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu bzhin gshegs pa rnams la/

khyon ma bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te kho'os bstan pas srog chags brgyad khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur ba dang/ khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu zla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu semA/
bskyed ba dang/ srog chagasag khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dris dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po

rtagatadu dga' ba dad rangs ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang/ bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas/sems can 'di snyed
kyi don byas ba'agyur ba ni bdag gse da ba legs par red do// 'di nyid kyis bdagakhan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med
wA bal de dag khar rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir tho con mi go/ bdag nithe tsom med par de bzhin gshegs po gra bcom pa ma dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur 'osAn ba dang/ dga' bdad 'das pa
de dang ldan pas tal bdunatsamadun mkha' la 'phags nas/ tala'adunatsamana'adug ste/bdag nam mkha' la 'duganas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo chos 'phagasal bkur ste khya'osam
du sems go/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgyabyin gyis/ byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ma donapar 'phags pa mthong nas/'i sems sems kyis shes nas/de la
lha'i me ga man da ra bdag byin te/'di skadu rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig/ 'di nings khyod yongs su gzung ba yin

te rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus srog chagasastod phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi 'gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro ba'i byed pa de lta bu r bskal pa gras med dpag tu med par spro bar byed
ba'i sems can de dag ni red par dkala'o zhes smras so/ de nas byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/lha'i dbang po brgya byin lam me togade dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chosa' khags la gtor/mngonob rnag tor mngon par rab tu gtor nas/bdag gi lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bka' ste/
tshig 'di skad ces smras// rigs kyi bu deng sman chadakhyod kyi rim gro dang zham rid bgyi ba'i smad du/ bdag ga 'us khyod la dbul lo// de bdag gnyis phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po chos 'bagA
kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/ de nas tshodad bon gyi lumado dad/ 'khor lnga brgya de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu yul 'di skad ces smras so//rigs
kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba las chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar
chen rnams la bkur ster khagyid/ dedag dad nye bar gyur par bgyi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tudus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lnga brgya la 'di skadaces smras so/ bu mo dgakhyed kho'i

la lhag pa'i bsam bas gnas bar byed/ kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang/ bu mo khyod kho bos blang ngo/ cu mo de dag gis smras pa// khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes

su mthun par 'jug go/ khyodal lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bulalo// denas byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa'achen po rtag tu ngus/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de/
ga rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanate/shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas/ de thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo tshos 'phags la phul te/rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor de dag
dad gdad lta khargya de dag spyad yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/rigs kyi khu legs
galegs go// de ltar byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtabar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bu s myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// deltar na chos smra ba bdag la mchod pa byas na/ shes rab kyi pha rtol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhinagashegs pa dgra

bcom pa yang dag b.ratshogs pa'i sas rgyas de dag gis kyang/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodab na/'di lta bu gatod bal gnas nas blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi b.ro'otu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa yongs su khrisas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshod dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa lta
brgya bo dog dang/ shing rta lnga brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tungu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blas te/blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtagacu lul byin no/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos 'phags snyanalas los te/bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub bar gyuranas/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen portag
tudu 'di snyam du sems par gyute/'diltar bdag tshos 'dod ba'i phyir 'os la 'dug pa 'am/nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mi cha la/ 'di nim legs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
chos 'a bags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyiram byung gi b.radu badrag 'gred ba dang 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du tang de 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lo bdun gyi bar du'adod ba'i rtog pa ma byung/ gnod sems kyi rtog
pa mu khyud/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog khan byud/ thol brkus pas skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshos 'phags nas sdang bar 'gyur/bdag cagag kyud byang chub sems/
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gangal rigs bya'i de 'dug nas chos ston par gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/bdag gis sa phyogasadi chag chag btab kyidalegApar byugal
me tog sna tshogs gtor te/sa skyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phye napa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dag tu ston par
gyur ba de legs par byug par bya'o sAm so// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bum lnga brgya de dag kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' semA dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing/ yum gnyis kyis sa
las bar khyedade/bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sa lha'i sgrathos te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags zhag bdun nyid de'adzin 'di las ldang skye langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes grags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lus lha'i sgra de

thos pa dang/ dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu mgu zhing/ dga' ba dang yid bade ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'o la sogs 'bu la brgya dang/ sa phyogs de phyagasanas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis smras
ba bshams sado/denas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gablagos budado/stan gangal byang chub sems dba' sems dpachenapotshes 3phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur bden bting ngo/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem dba' chen po rtag tus phyogs de chag chag gdab ba 'dodan/bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag/
chu tshol na chu ma red do// do nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dba'achen bo rtag tu ngu'adisnyamadu sems te/bdag gi lus las khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab go/ de ci'i phyi' zhen/
sa phyogs 'di'i rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po chos 'phags kyi lus la bog na mi rung na/ bdag gi lus gdonami za bar 'jig pa 'dis zhig
bya bdag gi lus 'dimabu'i bya ba lazhig pa ni sa'i/ nus ba med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khorab dgan bdag gi lus brgyan+tong mang bo de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni ci'i yang ma
rung do sAmamo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon pe blangs te/bdag gi lug kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs der khor yug tu chag chag gad
bo/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/tshong dbon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bumal brgyade dgazagasacad kyis kyang/ mtshon rnon pozlas te rang rang gi lus phuganas/rad

rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs dechag chag btab ste/gangade dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i glags rnyed bar mi 'gyur bar/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tududang/ bu mo de
dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do// de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin 'di snyam du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tudu 'di 'di ltar chos 'dod ba dang/

'di ltar yi dmal brtan ba dang/ 'diltar go cha chen khagos pa dang/ lus dang/ srog dang 'os sbyodo rnams la mi lta ba dang/ bla na med pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/'dilta

ste dran re dal gang dag khar rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par as rgyas nas/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med ba las sems can thar par bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i khasam la zhugs pa ni mtshan tsho

sAm dusems so// de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis khrag de dag tham cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyisaM brlabasas//lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/sa phyogs de kho khong nug/

tu dbag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar phris khyab bo//denasalha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis byang chub semA dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/rigs kyi bu legs so'i gso//khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam
gyis mi khyab bo//khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang/ chos yongs su tshol ba ban med do// rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyapalhag pa'i
bsam pa 'di lta bu dang/ brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang/ chos 'dod pa 'di lta bu s bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so// dad nas byang chub sems dpa' sel
dba' chen po rtag tu 'disnyam du sems te/bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi snyan ni bting sa phyogs 'di phyag bdar ni//chag chag ni btaban/bdag gis
me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'khags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar byab dang/ me tog de dag gang nas red par gyur snyam du
sems so// de nas lha'i bang bo brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tudu la 'di skad ces sas go// rigs kyi bu lca'i me togo mnadarab 'di dag long la/khyod kyis
sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram b.ragyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'jug pa la'ang gton cig ces/des dal lha'i me tog gnad
khal stod byin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu a me tog de dag blangs te/me tog kha cig gis ni phyogs des me tog bkramapa byas so//me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lag to to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'dus pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin de las la sa te/chos kyi snyan gang na

dab der 'ongs nas stanabating ba la 'dug ste 'khor brgya stod brag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi kha rtsol tu phyin pa stonato// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtagacus
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'bagasemagrod ma thag tu/'di lta ste dper nabasam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu de la khyed ba bzhin
du ba deb de lta bu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi phalo'o tu phyin pa ston pa 'di ni 'di lta ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid da sa shes rab/

khol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas/shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do//chos thams cad g.yo med pa nyid bas/shes rab kyi phal tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/
chos kams cad rlom sems med bde sa//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mos sems med pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs ba med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi ba'o tu byin ba khengs ba med pa nyid do// chos

thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha khol tuphyin ba ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid bas/shes

rab kyi pha lo khyen pa skye ba med pa nyid do/ chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha 'o tu phyin pa 'gag bamed ba nyid do// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pasumed

ba nyid do// rgya mtsho chu med pa nyid bas/shesa'ab kyi lag tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri ba sna tshogs panyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs gnyed do//nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/shes

rab kyis rol tuphyin pa rtog med pa nyid do/ gzugs su med pa nyid pas// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes lamu med

banyid bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa skyid pa// shes rab kyi pha rolanotu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khamasaumed pa nyid

pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid// roljolta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma dres pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'damigs
su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes 'bakyi pha'o tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pa sa/ shes rab kyi pha
'otu phyin pa byed ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bas/ shes rab kyi ba la tu phyin pa bas ma gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// denas byung chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar 'jug bzhin du/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting de 'dzin skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/
chos thams cad ga mo kha med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang/ chos thams cad 'og cig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad 'gag bzhed

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgyamatshonu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ba sna tshogs la zhes bya pa'i teng nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha' rtog pa

zla med ba zhes bya ba'i ting de'adzin dang/ gzugachu med ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sa'i

khams chu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ nam mkha'i khams su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdo rje lta bu zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs sun da pa zhes ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya

[/ ]ba'i ting 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad byed ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te/byang chub semA dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tuphyogs de
[o ]la sogrwa pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum khrag drug cu thob bar gyur to//shes rab kyi pha ro'o tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/tshos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad cu rtsa gno/

byang chub sems dpa' semA deb chen bo rtag tu dus ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'abum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu/shar phyogo dang lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshamA dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi

phyogs dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khas ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ged dag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing/ byang chub sim dang gi tshogs

kyis mdun du bltas te/tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang/ ming 'di nyid dad/ ya gi 'di nyid kyis// shes rab kyi bcol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong do//'di ltaste/dper na da lta nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i ri rig rtenagyi khamA

'din chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs chu bskor cing/ byang chub semA dpa'i tshogakyisam gyisawa nas/tshul 'di nyid dang/ ming 'di nyid dang/ yi ge 'di nyid kyis/ shesarab[©]la lol tu phyin pa 'di//
