'chad pa bzhin no// de na daru thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ thos pa rgya mtsholta bu dang ldan par gyur te/gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to// skye bathams cad du'ang gang dad

gang dus ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du gyur ba de dang de dag tu skye ste/tha na rmi lam du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang bral bar gyur te/ des mi khom pa thamA cad ni spangs/dal ba phun sum tsho/
( pa ni bsgrubs go/ thab 'byor rnam grangs 'dus kyi shes rab kyi 'khol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub semadapa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lcags dmakhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par reg
bar khya'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de 'gyud par bya//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par mo gu gzung ba'i phyir shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lung zhig
ngas shig lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan la nga rgya mor rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bodagag sazha

par bya/gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya/kun chub par bya/gdon bar bya/lunganodabar bya/bstan bar khya kha ton du bya/dbazhin gshog pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gleg bam chen po la yig gsal zhing
'batugs b.legA par bris te me tog dang/ khag pa dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ gos dung/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan da lo khor yugatum me 'bred bdag dang/ mdo brnag pa tshad
bos bkur stir bya bla mar bya/ri mor bya/mchod par bya/rjod par bya/gsolopar bya//kun dga' bo'adedi'i gdam ngag go/ de ci'i phyir zhen/kun dga' bo jisAmadu sem/de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa mi
nAm/ kun dga' bos gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags go/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi stonobal gago/deskad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa kun dag 'a 'ol 'dik+kad

sa bka' stsal to/kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gsheg ba la/kun dga' bo khyod kyi lus lasakhyams pa yid du 'ong ba dang/ ga ga las khyan ba mded bod pa dang/ 'dikyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas

sa grokhyis sa kun dga' bo de lta bas na da lta dang zhug te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis 'bad ba dang/ dad pa dang/ dus par bya la de bzhin du/ya'adasanas shesarang kyi bcol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byos
shig/ kun dag 'khoci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur la/canas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur ba khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum duyongs su gtad do// rjes su yongs sugatad

bo/kun daga'abashes 'ad kyi b.rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten duji srid du spyodab desrid du de bzhi gshegs bzhugs bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bodosrid deb kwin gshes gas bsachos nyon par gi pa'o bya'o//

kun dga' bongashes rab kyis 'od tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang/ 'dzin bdad/ 'a tshad ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ ratudonob dang/ yunganod ba dang/ skyonab dang/ kha ton du byedapa da/yig

ger 'dri ba dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sbos dang/ 'phred dang/ byug pa dang/ bye ma dang gos dang/ gags dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bodan dang/ kho'i khor yug gtumar me'i 'phreng ba dang/ mchod ba rnam bsadabo/
dag gas bkur stir byed de bla mar byed/ri mor byed/ mchod bar byed/rjed par byed/gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang/ dal ba'i chos mnyan
bdamal ba dang/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bralabar bya'o/ kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa'i drung na spyod bar rig par bya'o bcomaldan

'dus kyis skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang 'a chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bu dang/ tshedang ldan pa ma'u 'gal

gyi bu chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang/ tshodang ldan pa khyams ma'i bu gang ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA yananApa dang/ tshe dang ldan pas 'gags pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra
gcan zin dang/ tshe dang ldan bkun dga' bo dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten la ras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stongopa las/ longs su gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa bdunapa'o//

'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stodapa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ su'en bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
